title: Data Engineer
description: ['We are looking for a candidate with 1+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role. Having a degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field is a plus. They should also have experience using some of the following software/tools/platforms: Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++, Scala, etc. Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, etc. Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases, including Postgres and Cassandra. Experience with data pipeline and workflow management tools: Azkaban, Luigi, Airflow, etc. Experience with AWS/GCP/Azure cloud services. Experience with stream-processing systems: Storm, Spark-Streaming, etc. Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases. Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures, and data sets. Able to understand various data structures and common methods in data transformation Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency, and workload management. A successful history of manipulating, processing, and extracting value from large disconnected datasets. Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ data stores. Show more Show less']

title: ShopeeFood - Delivery Operations, Driver Data Analyst
description: ['Job Description  Work closely with Driver management team to get information and insight of ShopeeFood Drivers. Analyze data and insights to form new initiatives to improve current business processes and Driver performance in assigned area. Coordinate with relevant teams (Driver management, Product, Project Management Office, Communications and Community,…) to implement and follow up the initiatives running in team. Work closely with Team Leader on planning and executing Campaign (spike day, mini-spike day) and other big projects. Be in charge of tool setting for assigned area Be responsible for Driver performance report by weeky and monthly Other tasks assigned by Team Leader   Requirements  Able to adapt in an agile environment. High level of critical thinking, attention to details & numerical skill. Good communication skill and stakeholder management skill are must-haves. Proficiency in Office and Google applications is a must. Fast-learning and open to change. Good team player with can-do attitude. Passion to work in a fast-paced, ambiguous startup environment. Bilingual in English and Vietnam to facilitate cross-border discussions and collaborations with stakeholders from across the region. Previous research experience is a plus. Show more Show less']

title: User Insights, Servicing Experience
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['Job Description  Responsible for designing and executing initiatives to collect user insights across Servicing Journey, from Buyer Journey mapping facilitation and maintenance, buyer experience tracking execution to customer data analysis.  Customer Journey Design: facilitate the process of Servicing Journey design and maintain up-to-date user insights across the journey. Customer Data Analysis: define analysis approach to validate hypothesis of User behaviors, from which work with Business Intelligence for execution to gain user insights for business decision making. User Research Design: define research objectives and scope, target users and expected outcomes, from which provide detailed brief to the Research team for research design and execution. Buyer experience tracking: conduct different tests to track buyer experience during Servicing journey Subject matter expert for User Servicing Insights: share meaningful user insights for User communication design, recovery and improvement.   Requirements  Analytical, logical and structured thinking with detailed orientation. Good at problem solving and enjoy root cause analysis, especially in connecting the dots Experience in dashboard design, data analysis and visualisation is a Plus Enjoyed fast-paced environment, opened to learn and adapt. Good at writing and presentation in both Vietnamese and English. Show more Show less']

title: Data Engineer
description: ["You will be focused on working with our team to provide the best possible outcomes for our clients, and your key responsibilities will be to: - Use cloud-first serverless approaches to solve client’s data ingestion, processing & storage needs - Develop, construct, test, and maintain data ingestion & warehousing architectures - Build high-performance algorithms, prototypes, predictive models and proof of concepts - Discover opportunities for data acquisition and new uses for existing data - Develop dataset processes for data modeling, mining and production - Employ a variety of languages and tools (e.g. scripting languages) to marry systems together - Recommend ways to improve data reliability, efficiency and quality - Demonstrate prototype integrations for Google Cloud's products in customer/partner environments - Make recommendations on integration strategies, enterprise architectures, platforms and application infrastructure to successfully implement a complete solution, providing “best practice” advice to clients - Understand and translate complex business requirements into a functional technical architecture that can be implemented and activated by clients. - Manage delivery of solutions by working collaboratively with Google GCP teams, XPON Technologies teams, and delivery partners. - Develop and maintain product knowledge about core competencies of Google technologies, and other industry technology solutions - Document the current state of the client’s technology and outline systems enhancements needed. Serve as technical leader for XPON Technologies’s clients, with regards to Cloud Solutions. - Develop deep business partnerships and trusted relationships with both partners and decision-makers at the C-suite level  About you: You will have experience in big data, SaaS/PaaS/IaaS technologies, web development, DevOps infrastructure, enterprise networking, or virtualization/migration/configuration management, as well as develop Infrastructure As Code. You will also have experience in delivering cloud solutions, working with enterprise clients, and supporting technical challenges. You will be able to identify knowledge gaps and solutions to upskill client’s technical knowledge. You will work well managing and working with offshore teams.  Ideally you also have the following technical skills: - JS or Python - SQL and general knowledge about DBs (mostly relational) - Cloud experience or cloud certification or strong interest in cloud technologies (preferably GCP) - Apache Beam and Airflow - Understanding of data structures & data manipulation - Understanding of & experience with repeatable infrastructure (ie: infrastructure as code: Ansible, Puppet, Terraform, etc) - Comfortable with Linux / Bash / Shell - Understanding of containerisation (eg: Docker, Kubernetes, Docker-compose, etc) - Understanding of distributed serverless technologies (eg: GAE, Cloud Functions, AWS Lambda, Google Data Flow, etc) - Understanding of data warehousing - Scalable database storage systems & their use cases - ETL, ELT - Understanding of the use cases & benefits / disbenefits of various database technologies - Understanding of data preparation & transformation of data for various use cases including data science & marketing activation - Experience with SaaS solutions, i.e., productivity/collaboration suites and distributed/scale out architectures on IaaS and PaaS on public cloud.  Nice to haves: - Exposure to Google Cloud Platform - Good understanding of marketing systems & workloads - Understanding of Martech stacks and associated data processes - High-level Understanding of Machine Learning basics: - Feature Engineering - Training & Evaluation - High-level understanding of statistics & data preparation for data analysis - Understanding of orchestration systems such as Apache Airflow / Cloud Composer - Google Cloud Certified Data Engineer or Google Cloud Certified Cloud Architect Certification (if you don’t have this, we will help you get it as soon as possible after you start)  If you are interested in this role, please send us your updated CVs to email: hiring@xpon.ai Show more Show less"]

title: Business Intelligence Data Analyst
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['Ninja Van is a tech-enabled logistics company on a mission to provide hassle-free delivery services for businesses of all sizes across Southeast Asia. Launched in 2014, we started operations in Singapore and have become the region\'s largest and fastest growing last-mile logistics company, partnering with over 35,000 merchants and delivering more than 1,000 parcels every minute across six countries.  At our core, we are a technology company that is disrupting a massive industry with cutting-edge software and operational concepts. Powered by algorithm-based optimisation, dynamic routing, end-to-end tracking and a data-driven approach, we provide best-of-class delivery services that delight both the shippers and end customers. But we are just getting started! We have much room for improvement and many ideas that will further shape the industry.  This role will participate in the regular catchup with stakeholders to understand the changes on the business side and their data needs. Proactively monitor the trends in the existing reports and develop new business insights. Work together with data engineers and other analysts to explore new opportunities for analytics and take actions to drive analytical projects to support other departments’ decision-making with data.  Responsibilities  Business Intelligence: Provide stakeholders with database related understandings Design, update and optimize dashboards, tables, and others to give accurate insights and/or support operations Maintain and improve data integrity Plan and implement analytics projects And: 1. Analytics (50%) Insights: modeling & produce actionable data Descriptive stats: Measure operational efficiency & cost metrics and track SLAs adherence 2. Process & Systems (30%): Improve workflow Suggest and recommend changes in existing system and operating processes to improve productivity and stability of the service infrastructure Reduce manual work Prepare for scaling 3. Informational (20%) Source of information for other teams. Answering questions like “Is there a fast way to get data about xx?” Query maintenance IT support  Requirements  Experience: 1-2 years working as a data analytics professional. Technical skills: SQL, Data Visualization such as Tableau, Python is a plus Familiarity with cloud data tools is a plus Education / Qualifications: Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Information Systems  Working address: Ninja Van Vietnam Office, Tan Binh district, Ho Chi Minh city.  Salary And Benefits  Competitive income compared to the market "Tet" bonus , Performance review from 1 - 4 months Paid social insurance based on full salary 12 days annual leave, 5 days sick leave (with full salary) High-class AON Health Insurance for manager level. Year End Party, annual Townhall Ceremony Annual company trip Attractive team-building activities, regular internal activities Provide laptop for employees  Training And Developing  Participate in internal training courses: online/offline Opportunities to promote to higher positions: Senior, Team Leader, Manager etc.  Work Environment & Colleagues  Senior leaders are open-minded, respectful and ready to facilitate personal growth Young and dynamic working environment Scope of work is large, the company has more than 6000 employees, the company has operations spreading to 63 provinces/cities throughout the country.  Submit a job application  By applying to the job, you acknowledge that you have read, understood and agreed to our Privacy Policy Notice (the “Notice”) and consent to the collection, use and/or disclosure of your personal data by Ninja Logistics Pte Ltd (the “Company”) for the purposes set out in the Notice. In the event that your job application or personal data was received from any third party pursuant to the purposes set out in the Notice, you warrant that such third party has been duly authorised by you to disclose your personal data to us for the purposes set out in the the Notice. Show more Show less']

title: Data Engineer
description: ["EcoTruck - a tech-driven logistics company focusing on first mile trucking. We are proud to be the leading ecosystem for trucking in Vietnam.  We are looking for people who is talented and hardworking to join our force to bring the efficiency to the industry through innovative business model and unique way of operating  What you will do in this role  Analyze requirements, design and develop a secure and standard data storage system. Build data pipelines to convert and synthesize data from the company's existing system that can serve the queries and analysis quickly and easily. Build a system to collect info from different sources that provide data for business analysis and development. Collaborate with other software engineers, product owners, designers to build the product.  What we are looking for  Previous experience as a data engineer or in a similar role Understanding Extract, Transform, and Load (ETL) Familiar working with Restful API. Familiar with Linux development environments. Experience with SQL, NoSQL Experience with queueing and messaging systems. Knowledge about process developing feature Nice-to-have Experience with Elasticsearch. Experience with Docker.  Benefit  Performance bonus ESOP based on performance and contribution Social insurance and health insurance (on 100% of gross salary) Additional premium health care Paid annual health checkup Performance and salary review at least once a year Monthly team building budget, which does NOT roll over Birthday gift Company trips and other team building activities (encouraged to do marathon or triathlon) Office goodies including daily healthy snacks, good coffee and tea, healthy beverages, and a great office atmosphere  Show more Show less"]

title: Data Engineer
description: ['We are looking for an experienced Data Engineer to join the team.  You will use various methods to transform raw data into useful data systems. title: Data Engineer
description: ['Yêu cầu: 1. Có kinh nghiệm, am hiểu về Big Data, Data-Warehouse, BI, Analytics, Data Mining, Hadoop Ecosystems/tools. 2. Có khả năng lập trình chuyên sâu Java, Scala, Python. Ưu tiên: o Ứng viên đã thực hành, có trải nghiệm vận hành khai thác các thành phần trong Hadoop Ecosystem. o Có kinh nghiệm trong thiết kế, triển khai, tối ưu nhằm đảm bảo tính sẵn sàng (HA) của hệ thống/dịch vụ và tăng trưởng (Scaling) hệ thống/dữ liệu . o Có kiến thức, kỹ năng cơ bản về Thống kê, Đại số tuyến tính và các phương pháp kỹ thuật trong Học thống kê (Statistical Learning); o Có kiến thức, kỹ năng cơ bản về Phân tích Khám phá Dữ liệu (Exploratory Data Analysis) và Học máy (Machine Learning, Deep Learning). o Có khả năng lập trình về Java, Scala, R, Python (Pandas, Numpy, Scikit-learn). o Ứng viên thành thạo công cụ R, Python (Pandas, Numpy, Scikit-learn), chuyên sâu Scala/Java (Spark ML, Spark Streaming, H2O). o Ứng viên sử dụng/thực hành các ML Frameworks/tools (tensorflow, torch, pytorch, keras, …)  Nhiệm vụ: 1. Xây dựng hệ thống thu thập số liệu, tổ chức nhà kho dữ liệu, xử lý streaming data. 2. Tham gia phát triển, triển khai, vận hành các dịch vụ/giải pháp trên nền tảng dữ liệu lớn. 3. Tham tích hợp, triển khai, vận hành, hỗ trợ các dịch vụ khai thác số liệu. 4. Thiết kê xây dựng hệ thống phân tích số liệu thông minh (Analytics, BI) 5. Nghiên cứu, xây dựng các giải pháp, các mô hình thực thi (dự đoán, phân lớp, phân cụm, v.v.) trên nền tảng BigData và Machine learning. Show more Show less']

title: System Analyst (Cloudera/Hadoop/BDA/MSBI/QlikSense/Discovery/SAS/R/R-Studio/Python), Data
description: ["About UOB  United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand, as well as branches and offices.  Our history spans more than 80 years. Over this time, we have been guided by our values — Honorable, Enterprising, United and Committed. This means we always strive to do what is right, build for the future, work as one team and pursue long-term success. It is how we work, consistently, be it towards the company, our colleagues or our customers.  UOB Innovation Hub 2 (InnoHub 2) is a newly set up technology centre located in Kuala Lumpur as part of UOB Group Technology and Operations to deliver innovative financial technology solutions that enable business growth and technology transformation.  About The Department  The Technology and Operations function is comprised of five teams of specialists with distinct capabilities: business partnership, technology, operations, risk governance and planning support and services. We work closely together to harness the power of technology to support our physical and digital banking services and operations. This includes developing, centralising and standardising technology systems as well as banking operations in Singapore and overseas branches.  Job Responsibilities  You will be responsible for the end-to-end software development and support for all work transitioned from Group (which could be projects, quarterly change requests, L3 production fixes). This includes analysis and design to development, implementation, testing and support. You will be expected to work on enterprise data warehouse (EDW/DWH) and Data Lake.  You will also be responsible for quality assurance of the team delivery in conformance to the Bank-defined software delivery methodology and tools. You will partner closely with the Group domain team to plan and manage transitioned deliverables.  Other Responsibilities Include  Participate in application and solution design sessions Analyse user requirements and convert requirements to design documents Develop system documentation to capture key design decisions Communicate complex technical issues to business users in a language they understand Execute continuous service improvement and process improvement plans Create technical documents for the solutions. Compile timely, comprehensive, and accurate documentation and or reports as requested Perform design and development of applications according to change requests and project requirements Design and update software database/tables. This includes, but is not limited to: Software Applications, Data Communication Processes and User Interfaces Test, maintain and recommend software improvements to ensure strong functionality and optimization Work with production support team members to conduct root cause analysis of issues, review new and existing code and/or perform unit testing Compile and assess user feedback to improve software performance  Job Requirements  Ideal Candidates Should Have 9 Years Minimum Hands-on Experience OR 2 To 3 Technical Certifications In Any Of The Below Technologies  Cloudera Hadoop distribution or BDA-Big Data Appliance Teradata Inteliflex Informatica Data Integration suite of tools MS Business Intelligence QlikSense Discovery SAS R, R-Studio Python, Kafa, elastic-engine, PySpark  Experience or certification in the below technologies will be an added advantage:  CI/CD software, Testing Tools - Jenkins, SonarQube ETL/ELT & DI-DQ Tools Integration/Ingestion Framework – Informatica Virtualization Tools – Denodo or any equivalent tool Visualization Tools - Qlik Sense, Power BI, Splunk Data Analytics Tools - Qlik Sense Data Quality Tools - Informatica DQ Data Governance Tools (Data Lineage Tools, Data Dictionary, Data Glossary) - Informatica Metadata Manager Version Control Tool - Aldon+LMe, CA Endeavor Deployment Tool kit -J enkins Service or Incident Management (IcM) Tools - Remedy DB Monitoring Tools, Backup & Restore tool and Automation Tool - Geneos Source Code Repository Tool - Bitbuket Scheduling Tool - Control-M Defect Management Tool - JIRA Application performance Testing tool - Jmeter, Load Runner Capacity Management Tool - TrueSight AS400, Silverlake  Be a part of UOB Family  UOB is an equal opportunity employer. UOB does not discriminate on the basis of a candidate's age, race, gender, color, religion, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, or other non-merit factors. All employment decisions at UOB are based on business needs, job requirements and qualifications. If you require any assistance or accommodations to be made for the recruitment process, please inform us when you submit your online application.  Apply now and make a difference. Show more Show less"]

title: Data Engineer
description: ["Responsibilities:  - Design, create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture  - Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL, and AWS ‘big data’ technologies or Google Big Query  - Ability to build processes that support data transformation, workload management, data structures, dependency and metadata  - Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements.  - Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.  - Perform the data preparation for data model (data cleansing, data aggregation)  - Design and develop reliable, stable, and effective data marts to support business.  - Create ETL jobs and data pipelines  - Monitoring data quality to meet SLA  - Work with stakeholders including the Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs.  - Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader.     Requirements:  1. Educational qualifications  - Bachelor's Degree  - Graduated in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field is a plus.\xa0  2. Relevant experience  - Have at least 5 years working in Data Engineer role  - Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases including SQL and NoSQL databases  - Hands-on experience with SQL database design  - Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and data sets.  - Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++, etc.  - Experience with build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.  3. Required competencies  - A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.  - Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ data stores.  - Strong project management and organizational skills.  - Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.  - Good logical thinking, hard-working, positive attitude, good communication skills.     Benefits:  - Competitive salary w/ bonus on 13th month  - Paid premium healthcare insurance (PTI)  - Paid accident insurance (Hanwha)  - Laptop/ PC provided  - Two days off per week,12 days of annual leave per year.  - Company trip, team building every year  - Happy hours with free snacks, soft drinks, fruit, and coffee etc.  - Celebrating party: team lunch, birthday, welcome, other activities.     Show more Show less"]

description: ['About Agoda  Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 4,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,\u202fenhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world. This department is highly data-driven and focused on developing at-scale marketing programs that improve the lifetime value of Agoda customers through measurable marketing programs and channels. The team is a blend of the best analysts, marketing strategists, and data scientists in the world. title: Data Engineer
industries: IT Services and IT Consulting, Software Development, and Pharmaceutical Manufacturing
description: ['About us     POC Pharma is a startup that digitizes the pharmaceutical industry in emerging markets and helps pharmaceutical companies leverage data to grow their sales. Come join the coolest team and contribute to an exciting and fast-moving industry, using the best technologies!     Why do we want YOU?     Because as a Data Engineer, you will help us:  • Be a subject matter expert in analyzing and presenting data that provides important insights into customers behaviors and usage patterns\u200b  • Work with both developers and business stakeholders from diverse teams to understand business needs and determine optimal solutions while constantly evaluating the risks & dependencies\u200b  • Write and maintain sophisticated SQL queries to meet complex needs\u200b  • Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.\u200b  • Create processes to quickly test the accuracy of the generated datasets & reports\u200b  • Communicate regularly and directly with stakeholders and executive sponsors\u200b  • Develop business requirements documentation, process workflow diagrams, functional specifications, user acceptance test scripts and other supporting documentation for BI initiatives     Because you have what it takes to win and grow with us:  • 3+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, who has attained a Graduate degree in • Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field\u200b  • Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases, including MSSQL, with strong experience in building sophisticated SQL queries\u200b  • Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++, Scala, etc. or other technologies (e.g.: matching algorithm, Analytics Framework, etc.)\u200b  • Knowledge of business process management best practices & business intelligence concepts\u200b  • Ability to dive into technical details and design analytics solutions to meet business needs\u200b  • Experience with (one or more) BI/reporting tools and data storage platforms \u200b  • Experience with handling multiple projects in an open environment\u200b  • Exceptional verbal, written communication and presentation skills\u200b  • Experience in supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.\u200b     Why do you have to join US?     • Because SaaS and Pharma are hot spots and great experiences for you  • Because you want to work in a global environment with the potential for an international career, supported by an experienced leadership team  • Because you have ambitions and are not afraid of taking more responsibilities  • Because you want to see the impact your job has on your team & company  Show more Show less']

title: Data Engineer
description: ['Mô tả công việc:  Xây dựng cơ sở hạn tầng cần thiết để trích xuất, chuyển đổi và tải dữ liệu tối ưu từ nhiều nguồn dữ liệu khác nhau. Phát triển hệ thống cơ sở dữ liệu phục vụ cho các hoạt động Game Marketing và Game Product của công ty. Phối hợp với bộ phận Data Analyst, Marketing, Game Designer để xây dựng các công cụ hỗ trợ công việc báo cáo. Tối ưu và đảm bảo tính chính xác, sự ổn định và bảo mật của dữ liệu. Luôn cập nhật tình hình các thư viện hỗ trợ lấy dữ liệu (Firebase, Google Analytics, 3rd Party Ads API…). Các công việc khác theo yêu cầu của cấp trên.  Yêu cầu công việc:  Ít nhất 3 năm kinh nghiệm về Data Engineer (ưu tiên có kinh nghiệm về mảng Game Mobile và Blockchain). Tốt nghiệp đại học chuyên ngành về Khoa học máy tính, Thống kê, Tin học, Hệ thống thông tin…\xa0(ưu tiên tốt nghiệp các trường đại học Quốc gia). Sử dụng thành thạo ngôn ngữ lập trình Javascript, SQL, app scripts. Sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ thuộc hệ sinh thái Google như: Google BigQuery, Google Sheets, Google App Scripts, Google Data Studio… Kinh nghiệm xây dựng và tối ưu hóa các kiến trúc và tập dữ liệu lớn. Kinh nghiệm xây dựng các quy trình hỗ trợ và chuyển đổi dữ liệu, cấu trúc dữ liệu, siêu dữ liệu. Kinh nghiệm về thực hiện phân tích nguyên nhân gốc rễ trên dữ liệu để xây dựng hệ thống hoàn chỉnh. Kinh nghiệm sử dụng các dịch vụ đám mây Google Cloud, AWS, EC2 .. Xử lý công việc độc lập và khả năng làm việc nhóm tốt. Kỹ năng tư duy phản biện, thuyết trình tốt. - Đọc, hiểu tài liệu tiếng anh tốt.  Quyền lợi được hưởng:  Lương: Upto 2000$. Kèm bonus siêu to: Thưởng KPI, quý, lễ,thâm niên, dự án, đặt biệt thưởng Bcoin siêu hot. Thưởng cuối năm theo HĐKD (năm 2021: Thưởng lên đến 08 tháng lương). Hỗ trợ cơm trưa: 50.000 đ/ngày. Bảo hiểm xã hội được công ty đóng 100%. 15 ngày phép năm, được hoàn tiền phép dư. Miễn phí gửi xe tại tòa nhà. Các bữa tiệc hàng tháng, team building, du lịch hàng năm, cùng nhiều sự kiện thú vị khác để gắn kết nhân viên. Nhiều khu giải trí dành cho bạn xả stress: Máy chơi game Ps4, Bi Lắc… hoặc thả hồn trong những khu vườn thơ mộng tại Farm Club Senspark. Sẵn sàng tạo điều kiện, khai thác tiềm năng để nâng cao giá trị của mỗi nhân viên. Show more Show less']

title: Chuyên Viên Dữ Liệu Data Analyst (Offer Đến 20 Triệu)
company: Công Ty TNHH Phát Triển Aroma
description: ['Mô tả công việc Trợ lý cho ban điều hành: Nhận các đầu việc từ ban điều hành, thực hiện và phối hợp với các bộ phận liên quan. Phân tích dữ liệu hoạt động các bộ phận để nêu ra các vấn đề đang tốt, không tốt và các nguyên nhân, giải pháp tương ứng. Phân tích quy trình, nghiệp vụ vận hành các bộ phận, từ đó đưa ra các đề xuất cải tiến và triển khai áp dụng các quy trình mới. Dự báo tình hình hoạt động của doanh nghiệp và đưa ra kế hoạch. Kết nối hoạt động của các bộ phận bằng dữ liệu và quy trình làm việc, tối ưu hiệu quả hoạt động của nhân sự. Hoàn thành các công việc được cấp trên phân công. Làm việc tại LukLak - công ty công nghệ với sản phẩm chính là các ứng dụng hỗ trợ quản lý công việc cho đối tượng doanh nghiệp và người đi làm (Công ty cùng hệ thống AROMA).  LukLak bắt đầu ở thị trường ở thị trường Việt Nam để hoàn thiện sản phẩm, và sau đó mục tiêu hướng tới sẽ là thị trường toàn cầu. Địa chỉ: Xã Đàn 2, P. Nam Đồng, Q. Đống Đa, Hà Nội.  Yêu cầu ứng viên Tốt nghiệp Cao Đẳng trở lên. - Ưu tiên ứng viên trên 2 năm kinh nghiệm. - Ưu tiên ứng viên thành thạo Excel hoặc Power BI. Có kiến thức về phân tích dữ liệu. Tư duy logic, chủ động. Khả năng viết tài liệu, trình bày vấn đề tốt. Cẩn thận, nhanh nhẹn, tinh thần trách nhiệm cao. Có laptop cá nhân. Thành thạo tin học văn phòng. Quyền lợi Mức lương: 5.000.000 10.000.000 VNĐ (fresher-junior) hoặc 10.000.000 20.000.000 VNĐ (senior). Có cổ phần sáng lập cho cấp quản lý, trưởng nhóm khi vào làm việc trong giai đoạn đầu. Có cổ phần ưu đãi ESOP cho các nhân sự có năng lực và kết quả tốt. Hưởng đầy đủ các chế độ theo quy định của Nhà nước như BHXH, BHYT. Hưởng chính sách phúc lợi: Nghỉ lễ tết, nghỉ phép năm, teambuilding,… Học tiếng anh miễn phí tại AROMA Tiếng Anh Cho Người Đi Làm. - Được đào tạo kiến thức, kỹ năng cơ bản và nâng cao. Môi trường trẻ trung năng động, tạo điều kiện phát huy giá trị cá nhân. Show more Show less']

title: Data Engineer
description: ["• Bachelor's or advanced degree in IT/ Statistics/ Math or related fields.  • More than 3 years of experience in data technology.  • Knowledgeable and experience in both relational databases and NoSQL databases (eg: MongoDB).  • Experience in ETL tools or data pipeline languages such as Python, Scala, cloud-based infrastructure (eg: AWS, GCP, Azure…).  • Experience with visualization tools such as Tableau, PowerBI.  • Knowledge in business analysis and data modeling.  • Fluent in English speaking/ writing with excellent interpersonal skills.  • Team player with good management skills.     What are great to have:  • Familiar with software development process and culture.  • Experience with Big data and data warehouse concepts and methodologies  • Experience with third party libraries and APIs.  • Experience with data pipeline and workflow management tools: Azkaban, Luigi, Airflow, etc     Salary: Negotiable  Show more Show less"]

place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
industries: IT Services and IT Consulting, Telecommunications, and Biotechnology Research
description: ["Opportunity to work on cutting edge technologies|A strong and diversed talent team across the globe.    About Our Client  As part of this role, responsibilities will include developing deep product knowledge for assigned markets and monitoring & evaluating Product initiatives. The role will be expected to maintain sufficient analytical and Data set-up for assigned market to support market leads and work with moderate supervision & directions.  Job Description  Responsibilities:  Build, develop and maintain profit and growth intelligence to monitor overall health of our business Partner and collaborate with the broader East Economics team to evaluate key initiatives' impact on our business Develop deep market/product/competitiveness insight for designated market(s), support market leads to drive meaningful recommendations for profitable growth, and enhance data driven tools for comprehensive business decision process Work closely with East Economics market leads and in-country partners, identify and develop targeted actions to improve performance through analytics and market insight Partner with in-market and global teams to facilitate quality and efficient data access for Economics Build strong relationships with in-country partners to further advance the global operation model   The Successful Applicant  Qualifications:  Proven math and analytical skills, as normally acquired through the pursuit of an FCAS or master's degree in Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, Actuarial Science, or related field with minimum 2-3 years of relevant experience P&C Insurance industry experience preferred; Contact: Van Anh Le  Quote job ref: JN-012022-5242056 Show more Show less"]

title: Data Engineer
industries: Fundraising, Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals, and Investment Management
description: ['Introduction:     Our client is a well-established independent asset manager with some US$ billion in listed equity, clean-tech, fixed income and real estate for international pension and sovereign wealth funds and endowments. They are now searching for a Data Engineer based in HCM city.     Main job purpose:     The Data Engineer will support our software developers, database architects, data analysts and data scientists on data initiatives and will ensure optimal data delivery architecture is consistent throughout ongoing projects.     Key responsibilities:     • Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture  • Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements  • Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.  • Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and Azure ‘big data’ technologies  • Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency, and other key business performance metrics  • Work with stakeholders including the Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs  • Keep our data separated and secure across national boundaries through multiple data centers and Azure regions  • Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader  • Work with data and analytics experts to strive for greater functionality in our data systems     Skills and qualifications required:     • Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems, or another quantitative field  • Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases  • Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets  • Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency, and workload management  • A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets  • Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ data stores  • Strong project management and organizational skills     Experience required:     • 3+ years of experience in a similar role  • Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures, and data sets  • Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement  • Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment     Advantages but not a Must:     • Experience with relational SQL and NoSQL databases  • Experience with data pipeline and workflow management tools  • Experience with Azure cloud services  • Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, C++, C#, etc     Note: This position is only open to local candidates, and we shall be contacting shortlisted candidates, apologize for that.  Show more Show less']

title: Data Engineer (Mid-level)
place: Quận 4, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['Become Data Engineer at Digitas, where brilliant minds come together to bring to life bold, data and technology-driven marketing solutions for the world’s leading brands.    We are looking for a talented and passionate individual, someone who can process large Consumer data sets to enable analytical usage for the Business. As Data Engineer you’ll build the strategic and tactical foundation for data-driven marketing efforts for our Clients including CRM & Loyalty, Commerce and Media.    Sound like you? Read on.    What you’ll do:    Develop and implement data architecture, management framework and solution Design database schema to manage and optimize data processing and storage Manage operations of scheduled data ingestion and processing (ETL) Optimize data connectivity and retrieval, develop multichannel and multi purpose dashboards with key metrics, reports and other visualizations using BI solutions Continuous improvement on enhancement of data quality and integrity Design and apply privacy and regulatory requirements on PII data and manage access Collaborate and communicate with multiple internal and external stakeholders  \xa0      Qualifications    Great candidates often have:    3+ years overall experience in data engineering, at least 1 year of experience with SQL, Data Design, Data Architecture and managing a PII Consumer database Hands on experience with managing large data sets and ETL experience Experience with designing and rollout of data schema Relevant experiences with Google Big Query, Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Google Data Studio, Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Microsoft Power BI, Python, R, Java… Comfortable in a fast-paced, multi-stakeholder and deadline-driven environment Passion for data and technology in the business and marketing contex Good communication skills in Vietnamese and English with internal and external stakeholders at a variety of levels  Got what it takes? Apply now!    Show more Show less']

title: Junior Capabilities & Insights Analyst - Banking & Financial Services (open for both Hanoi and Ho Chi Minh City Based)
industries: Banking, Financial Services, and Investment Banking
description: ["Qualifications  University degree in commerce, mathematics, statistics or economics 2+ years of work experience in banking or consulting Strong understanding of financial and business concepts. Basic understanding of banking domain concepts will be a plus Strong written and verbal communication skills in Vietnamese and English Professional attitude and service orientation Ability to work independently as well as in a team Superior problem-solving, analytical, and quantitative skills Willing to work in a highly demanding and result-oriented team environment  What You'll Do  Your primary responsibility will be collecting, analyzing and synthesizing information that serve as critical inputs to client service teams.  In this role, you'll focus on developing expertise in a particular industry/function and assigned to projects as a knowledge professional either remotely or on-site. On-site staffing can be frequent and could be domestic or global in nature.  You will be expected to possess and build a good understanding of industry trends/issues and have distinctive areas of expertise in your area. Additionally, you will work directly with clients, consultants and fellow researchers on analysis that requires in- depth research, data modeling and client-ready presentation material.  You will be able to develop knowledge and help support the continuous improvements of our knowledge assets and also collaborate with global knowledge network to deliver knowledge and best practices.  There is flexibility to hire as a junior analyst based on candidate experience, skillset and qualifications.  Who You'll Work With  You will be based out of our Hanoi or Ho Chi Minh office as a part of our Panorama Financial Institutions and Insights consulting (PFIC) team. You will work directly with clients, consultants and fellow researchers on analysis that requires in-depth research, data modeling and client-ready presentation material.  PFIC is one of the largest knowledge and analytics teams globally and part of the McKinsey's Financial Institutions Group, with ~225 members and a global footprint across 24+ countries focusing on financial services domains such as retail banking, corporate & investment banking, wealth and asset management, payments, fintech and insurance. Show more Show less"]

title: Data Engineer
industries: IT Services and IT Consulting and Software Development
description: ['Job Function  Cloud & Software Services  Why SoftwareONE?  SoftwareONE is a leading global provider of end-to-end software and cloud technology solutions , headquartered in Switzerland . With an IP and technology-driven services portfolio , it enables companies to holistically develop and implement their commercial, technology and digital transformation strategies. This is achieved by moderniz ing applications and migrate critical workloads on public clouds , while simultaneously managing and optimizing the related software and cloud assets and licensing. SoftwareONE’s offerings are connected by PyraCloud , its proprietary digital platform, which provides customers with data-driven, actionable intelligence . With around 7,700 employees and sales and service delivery capabilities in 90 countries, SoftwareONE provides around 65,000 business customers with software and cloud solutions from over 7,500 publishers . SoftwareONE’s shares (SWON) are listed on SIX Swiss Exchange. For more information, please visit https://www.softwareone.com/e .  SoftwareONE Holding AG, Riedenmatt 4, CH-6370 Stans  The role  Responsibilities  · Analyze and organize raw data.  · Build data systems and pipelines.  · Evaluate business needs and objectives.  · Interpret trends and patterns.  · Conduct complex data analysis and report on results  · Prepare data for prescriptive and predictive modeling.  · Build algorithms and prototypes.  · Combine raw information from different sources  · Explore ways to enhance data quality and reliability.  · Identify opportunities for data acquisition.  · Develop analytical tools and programs.  · Collaborate with data scientists and architects on several projects.  Requirements  What we need to see from you  · Previous experience as a data engineer or in a similar role (3+ years)  · Technical expertise with data models, data mining, and segmentation techniques.  · Knowledge of programming languages (e.g. Java and Python).  · Hands-on experience with SQL database design.  · Knowledge of Azure Data Platform is a plus.  · Knowledge of Apache Spark, Apache Kafka, Databricks is a plus.  · Great numerical and analytical skills.  · Degree in Computer Science, IT, or similar field; a Master’s is a plus.  What You Should Really Know About Us.  Strip away everything. Strip away our brand, strip away our buildings, strip away our offices. What are we left with? Our people. This is what makes SoftwareONE successful.  Passionate people who live and breathe our values every day, who delight our customers, every day, and who go above and beyond, every day. Our culture is unique, and I believe that having the right people, and empowering them to succeed, is the absolute key to our success.  Patrick Winter, Founder.  What We Expect From Our Employees  Success at SoftwareONE is not defined by what you do for yourself, but by what you deliver for our customers, the business and for the employees around you. SoftwareONE employees are energized, agile and are laser focused on delivering world class Customer Satisfaction and results. Our leaders motivate and inspire their teams and provide a working environment that delivers incredible levels of Employee Satisfaction. We are Humble, have a very high degree of Integrity and are simply not interested in politics.  Our leaders operate with a high levels of Discipline but are able to work at Speed manage change in a global economy.  “SoftwareONE is an equal opportunity employer. With employee satisfaction as one of our core values, we are passionate about diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all of our employees. We want every employee to have the greatest experience of their career.”  Show more Show less']

title: Business Data Analyst Team Lead
description: ["At GeoComply, our mission is to empower the future of digital trust. We operate at the center of a new generation of cybersecurity companies, leveraging today's geolocation data to make better risk-based decisions. Working as a critical piece of the security infrastructure for some of the world’s largest tech companies like DraftKings, FanDuel, the BBC and Akamai, we are the global market-leader for compliance-grade geolocation data and a critical piece of the decision engine. We have big plans in the next few years, including a targeted US IPO and various M&A opportunities.     At the heart of it all is people - we are deeply committed to creating and sustaining a world-class experience for our employees, customers, and partners.     Job Summary     The Business Data Analysis team contributes to GeoComply’s success by developing reports for customers, providing them with intel regarding their users based on information and data gathered through the back office of our systems. This Business Data Analysis Team Lead position reports to Business Intelligence Manager on a day-to-day basis.     In this role, you are expected to take accountability for business data and products in the Business Data Analysis team that continuously contribute to the business goals of the company     What You Will Be Doing     Work with stakeholders throughout the organization to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive business solutions. Lead and further develop vision, mission, and strategies with KPIs for all products/data in Business Data Analysis team Lead, inspire, and further develop a team of Business Data Analysts in BI team. Utilize existing scripts/tools to acquire data from different sources and produce ad-hoc reports Manually review test reports Collaborate with internal teams to understand reporting requirements and derive key metrics Ensure that reports are up to standard in terms of both data quality and presentation Stay informed of database changes to ensure that reports are produced as expected Contribute ideas towards team development Apply team process in all tasks Develop dashboards to enable easy tracking and communication of data and reports. Develop and maintain a thorough understanding of the company’s technologies, products, processes, data, and teams     About You  5+ years of experience manipulating data sets and building statistical models, with a Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science or another quantitative field from any of the top-tier colleges. Data-oriented personality. Strong problem solving skills with an emphasis on product development. Great communication skills with customer-mindset. Excellent written and verbal communication skills for coordinating across teams. Good leadership and team management skills. Critical thinking and problem solving skills and demonstrated progress management and planning skills Good applied statistics skills such as distributions, statistical testing, regression. Good scripting and programming skills. Experience using statistical computer languages, Python, PySpark, SQL to manipulate data and draw insights from large data sets. Experience with common data science toolkits such as NumPy, Pandas, Seaborn, Matplotlib, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Keras, etc. Experience with data visualisation tools such as Tableau, PowerBI, Superset, Kibana. Proficiency in using query languages SQL. Experience with NoSQL databases such as MongoDB, Cassandra, HBase is a plus. Experience with distributed data/computing tools like Map/Reduce, Hadoop, Hive, Spark is a big plus.     Our IDEALS:     Impact. At GeoComply your voice matters and your work and ideas have a direct impact on our business. Dynamic. We are a hyper-growth company with a fast-paced work environment that propels your professional and personal growth. Exposure. We have a flat hierarchy so you work closely with our executives and contribute to projects across teams. Acceptance. We believe in equal opportunity for all and welcome your unique contribution. Learning. We provide extensive training to our people so that you can develop new skills and achieve your career goals. Support. We help each other so that you feel supported and free to do your best work.     Our Benefits:     Competitive Salary: High salary and attractive bonus system (13th month, business performance, dividend and internal shares program) Learning & Development: We provide an annual budget equal to 1-months’ salary that can go towards professional or personal development or sport. Equity Plan: As employees of GeoComply, we’re all “owners”. Our unique equity and bonus plans give you the opportunity to share in our company’s success. Fast career path within the company. Premium healthcare insurance (Bao Viet/Liberty) 20 days annual leave Weekly English classes with a native teacher Modern stand-alone office building in the center of Saigon. Free motorbike parking. We're always stocked up on snacks and coffee and have free lunches monthly Frequent social and team-building events     At GeoComply, we live our value of building it right. Our workplace is built on mutual respect and inclusion. We know that diversity of experience and thought has led to connection, innovation, and our company’s success. We welcome applicants of all backgrounds, experiences, beliefs, and identities.     Now What? Send us your resume and a cover letter. We Can’t-Wait To Meet You.  Show more Show less"]

title: Data Engineer
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ["Sieu Viet is one of the leaders of online recruitment platforms in Vietnam. We own popular sites such as ViecLam24h, TimViecNhanh, ViecTotNhat and MyWork. We’ve just started on our journey of transforming the entire organization, from products to culture. We are growing rapidly with a mission to become a companion to both job seekers and employers on their journeys, and to equip them with best-in-class tools that help them along the way.  Responsibilities  Possess an understanding of the data structures and governance. Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources. Design and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture. Assemble large, complex data sets to build data mart that meet functional/non-functional business requirements. Communicate effectively with Developers and Business users to understand and clarify requirements. Support internal training and proper documentation ensuring the successful onboarding of new team members. Implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc. Develop efficient software code for multiple use cases leveraging Spark and Big Data Technologies for various use cases built on the platform.   Requirements  3+ years’ experience working as a Data Engineer role, ETL with large amounts of data. Experience with data warehousing architecture and data modeling, ETL data pipeline. Experience with using the following software/tool in the big data field. Big data tools: Hadoop, Apache Spark, Presto, Kafka,... NoSQL and OLAP database: MongoDB, Elastic search, etc. Data pipeline and workflow management tools: Airflow. Good at programming languages: Scala, Python, Java. Experience with SRE, Patching & Automation: Kubernetes or Docker & Containerization Experience in the data testing process. Experience in performing root cause analysis, identify problems and propose recommendations for improvement. Strong organizational and multitasking skills with the ability to balance competing priorities Fundamental knowledge of modern cloud computing platforms and concepts is a plus (AWS/GCP)   Who we are looking for?  “Attitude is more important than aptitude”: we greatly value people who possess the 3 personal traits:  Growth mindset Curiosity Automation   Benefits  Working environment:  Flexible working hours (Mon - Fri only), 15-day leaves/ year (12 Annual, 3 sick leaves). Work From Home One day a week. Flat, open, fast-paced working environment with the best support from stakeholders. Challenging working environment where every new idea is welcomed.   Benefits:  Attractive remuneration package (salary, allowance - lunch, parking, telephone, etc.). Fully compliant with Social Insurance (health, social, and unemployment). Extra Accident Insurance for all employees, Premium Health Care Insurance for Manager and above level. 13th-month policy, Incentives, Bonus - subject to company performance. Performance & Salary review twice per year. “Bonding Policy” – for team engagement. Company's congrats gifts on birthday, Wedding Day, Children's Day, Woman's Day, Independent Day, Company's birthday, and other special occasions. Annual Health Checkup (once per year). Variety of corporate events, from sports competitions, monthly birthday parties, team building to Year-End Party etc.   Why you should join us:  The opportunity to work in 2nd player in the HR Tech Market with huge ambition and mission in the labor market. A great chance to impact millions of Vietnamese life through job opportunities and more. Passionate & talented colleagues. Show more Show less"]

title: Data Engineer
description: ['About VNPAY     VNPAY is Vietnam’s leader in financial technology with the mission to bring excellent quality products and services to promote cashless payment habits and encourage the development of digital commerce. VNPAY has a client portfolio of 40+ banks, 5 airlines, 5 telcos, a hundred of thousand companies, and millions of retail customers.     In this very fast-growing digital services era, VNPAY has a rapid growth of customers and challenges. With the mindset “Every challenge is an opportunity”, we are investing massively in data capabilities- the key engine for customer-centric product strategy, market expansion, resources optimization, and risk minimization. Many projects are finished, many are ongoing, and many others are in queue for development. Our environment highly promotes the full lifecycle of launching innovative products, so data and tech enthusiasts will have great chances to flourish and directly impact the economy     Our Culture  • All for one, and one for all  • Data first, decision second, and evaluation third  • Only the “Can Do” mindset  • Mistakes are there to embrace success  • Curiosity, curiosity, and curiosity  • Being the master of your fate     Responsibilities     Data Architecture  • Evaluate current complex data architecture in the organization and identify mandatory  improvements  • Define strategies for data infrastructure to fulfill data analytic and utilization needs of the  organization  • Manage and drive the upgrades to systems and storage to accommodate business and product requirements for data operations  • Design and deliver data infrastructure and functionalities with the most suitable technologies for data analysts, data scientists, and other business roles to monetize data and fulfill the strategy of VNPAY     Data Integration  • Strategically explore and obtain data and information from various sources within the ecosystem and external partners into VNPAY’s core platform  • Ensure data assets are organized and stored most efficiently for mining purposes  • Design, build and maintain optimized data pipelines and ETL/ELT solutions as business support tools in providing analysis and real-time analytics platform for critic  al decision making.  • Proactively collaborate with data users to understand data requirements, build and deploy optimized data  solutions     Management  • Manage project conflicts, challenges, and dynamic business requirements to keep operations running at high performance.  • Resolve people’s problems and project roadblocks,  • Conduct root cause analysis to help the team continuously improve processes and procedures to ensure maximum productivity  • Mentor and grow junior Data Engineers  • Identify and encourage areas for growth and improvement     Qualifications  • Bachelor\'s or Master’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Quantitative Analysis, Computer Science, Software Engineering or Information Technology     Work Experience  • 5+ years of relevant engineering experience with at least 2 years focus on data engineering  • Proficiency in SQL and programming language  • Deep experiences in optimizing ETL tasks, designing and building dimensional data models  • Deep experiences with big data ecosystem (e.g. Hadoop, Spark, Flink, Kafka, Hive, Delta Lake)  • Experience working in Agile teams to lead successful innovative projects with a cross-functional team  • Experience architecting, coding, and delivering high-performance microservices and/or delivering solutions serving millions of users  • Experience with cloud solutions is a plus     Benefits  • Working in a fast-moving team, fully supported by BOM  • Working in a team ready to take risks and challenge "best practices"  • Negotiable salary according to qualification (13th-month salary + KPI Bonus)  • Full benefit with social insurance. Annual health checks and PTI insurance under the company’s policy  • Employee Relationship: company trip, monthly team building  • Leave Paid: 12 days for annual leave & 6 days for sick leave (max 18 days)  Show more Show less']

title: Data Engineer
