title: Production Support (AS400/iSeries/COBOL400/COBOL ILE/RPG400/RPG/ILE), Cash and Payments
description: ["About UOB  United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand, as well as branches and offices.  Our history spans more than 80 years. Over this time, we have been guided by our values — Honorable, Enterprising, United and Committed. This means we always strive to do what is right, build for the future, work as one team and pursue long-term success. It is how we work, consistently, be it towards the company, our colleagues or our customers.  UOB Innovation Hub 2 (InnoHub 2) is a newly set up technology centre located in Kuala Lumpur as part of UOB Group Technology and Operations to deliver innovative financial technology solutions that enable business growth and technology transformation.  About The Department  The Technology and Operations function is comprised of five teams of specialists with distinct capabilities: business partnership, technology, operations, risk governance and planning support and services. We work closely together to harness the power of technology to support our physical and digital banking services and operations. This includes developing, centralising and standardising technology systems as well as banking operations in Singapore and overseas branches.  Job Responsibilities  You will be responsible for managing the end-to-end software development and support for all work transitioned from Group (which could be projects, quarterly change requests, L3 production fixes). This includes analysis and design to development, implementation, testing and support.  As the production support team lead, you will also be responsible for quality assurance of the team delivery in conformance to the Bank-defined software delivery methodology and tools. You will partner closely with the Group domain team to plan and manage transitioned deliverables.  Other Responsibilities Include  Act as the focal point of contact for technical resolutions while managing the incident, problem and knowledge management processes for the applications in scope Provide comprehensive support to internal customers; achieve resolution to outstanding problems or issues Manage 3rd party product vendors and integration partners to ensure application code fix deliveries are timely and good quality Design appropriate metrics for reporting on key performance and quality indicators Work with business stakeholders to manage and prioritize the overall book of work in terms of problem remediation Contribute to improvement initiatives relating to methods, tools, people, architecture, project management and governance Providing technical leadership for the squad and enforce the Definition of Done Acting as a servant leader that encourages collaboration and open communication Enabling the squad and removing impediments and blockers for the squad Providing insight, measurement, accountability and a positive working environment  Job Requirements  At least 9 years’ experience in software development, preferably in cash and payments Senior software engineer with experience in AS400 iSeries, COBOL400, COBOL ILE, RPG400, RPG ILE Knowledge of Java programming language and Oracle DB Familiar with Agile processes and practices Experience in leading squads/teams in terms of task management as well as technical decisions Extensive knowledge of DevOps practices and CI/CD tooling Have good experience and understanding of Banking domains Strong communication and organization skills to collaborate effectively within the squad and with other stakeholders  Be a part of UOB Family  UOB is an equal opportunity employer. UOB does not discriminate on the basis of a candidate's age, race, gender, color, religion, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, or other non-merit factors. All employment decisions at UOB are based on business needs, job requirements and qualifications. If you require any assistance or accommodations to be made for the recruitment process, please inform us when you submit your online application.  Apply now and make a difference. Show more Show less"]

title: Natural Language Processing Engineer
description: ['Aimesoft là nơi quy tụ những chuyên gia ứng dụng AI nhằm giải quyết những vấn đề thực tiễn. Sứ mệnh của Aimesoft là đồng hành trong đời sống con người thông qua các ứng dụng trí tuệ nhân tạo đa thể thức chân thực và sống động. Tài sản lớn nhất của Aimesoft là đội ngũ hơn 50 chuyên gia và kĩ sư nghiên cứu với nền tảng lập trình vững chắc và kinh nghiệm thực chiến các dự án “khó nhằn”. Dưới dự dẫn dắt của TS. Nguyễn Tuấn Đức (CEO) và cố vấn của các chuyên gia đến từ Đại học Tokyo, Nhật Bản, Aimesoft đang có những bước chuyển mình mạnh mẽ nhằm khẳng định vị trí số 1 về cung cấp giải pháp ứng dụng Trí tuệ nhân tạo. Hiện tại, Aimesoft đang tìm kiếm\xa0NLP Engineer (Fresher/Junior/Senior)\xa0và nhiều vị trí khác để tham gia vào đội ngũ kĩ sư tài năng của chúng tôi.     Mô tả công việc:  Nghiên cứu và ứng dụng các mô hình NLP vào hệ thống lớn của khách hàng. Tham gia xây dựng sản phẩm chiến lược của Aimesoft như các phần mềm người ảo AimeReception, Aime AIShop, AimeHotel, AimeTalk,... Trực tiếp nghiên cứu, phát triển các thuật toán NLP mang tính ứng dụng cao, đồng thời triển khai hệ thống phần mềm giải quyết các bài toán nổi cộm hiện nay như Medical, Question & Answering System, ChatBot,...     Yêu cầu:  Có kiến thức cơ bản về Xác suất thống kê, Học máy thống kê, Xử lý ngôn ngữ tự nhiên. Hiểu rõ về mô hình ngôn ngữ (language model), các bài toán core của NLP, các thư viện thường được sử dụng trong NLP tiếng Việt, Anh. Có kiến thức về Information Retrieval, Information Extraction. Có kiến thức về Deep Learning như: DNN, LSTM, CNN, ... và có khả năng ứng dụng trong NLP. Thành thạo Linux, Git, các cơ sở dữ liệu thường dùng như MySQL/SQL, Redis, MongoDB,... Biết sử dụng nhiều Toolkit hỗ trợ lập trình và trong NLP.     Quyền lợi:  Lương $700-$2000/tháng hoặc trao đổi thêm dựa trên kiến thức và kinh nghiệm thực tế. Thưởng Tết và lương tháng 13. Bảo hiểm, chương trình khám sức khỏe. 3 tháng review 1 lần xét duyệt thưởng/ tăng lương. Bạn được đảm xây dựng lộ trình phát triển sự nghiệp và kỹ năng ngay tại công ty, 3 tháng review 1 lần để cập nhật tiến độ phát triển và điều chỉnh khi cần. Được đào tạo, training với các khóa đào tạo miễn phí của công ty bởi các giảng viên, chuyên gia hàng đầu. Tham gia teambuilding, du lịch hằng năm. Thời gian làm việc từ thứ 2 - thứ 6 (8h30 -18h00). Không OT.     Email: huechi@aimesoft.com  Mobile: 0986 828 032  Address: 3F Hoang Ngoc Building, No.4, Ln.82 Dich Vong Hau, Cau Giay, Ha Noi.  Show more Show less']

title: AEM Developer
description: ['QUALIFICATIONS: • Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or related work experience • Must have the ability to follow verbal and written communications and; communicate effectively with public and coworkers • Expertise in AEM foundational concepts, including the CRX repository, the AEM platform, the use of core frameworks such as Apache Sling and Apache Felix • A solid understanding of all AEM building blocks including templates, components, dialogs, widgets, Content Fragments and Experience Fragments, etc, and the AEM development and AEM deployment process • Deep understanding of Generic Java technologies J2SE, Java EE, Servlets, JSP, JSTL and Tag libraries • Experience of Components OOTB, Templates, Taxonomy, metadata management, forward and reverse replication, workflows, content publishing and un-publishing, tagging, deployment Maven and Jenkins, and content migration/ planning • Experience working with AEM Forms and integrating with AEM end to end solutions. • Experience in the building using pom.xml & maven deployment methodologies. • 3+ years of development experience. • 3+ years’ experience developing web-based applications using CQ5/AEM • 3+ years’ experience using JavaScript frameworks such as jQuery • 3+ years’ experience integrating with web services • Experience in other Content Management Platforms (DNN, Sitecore, Drupal) is a plus. • Good to Have Adobe Target, Adobe Campaign and Adobe Analytics Integration  SALARY AND BENEFITS: Package Salary: 800M - 1.2B per Year for Expert Level Successful candidates will be part of a friendly, motivated and committed talent teams in FPT Software HCM (FSOFT) with various benefits and attractive offers: • Be able to work in major projects with big customers and exchange knowledge with specialists and experts from top IT corporations • Be supported preferential buying a department with Senior. • COMPETITIVE SALARY PACKAGE based on your competent plus Annual Bonus and Project Performance Bonus “FPT care” health insurance provided by AON and is exclusive for FPT employees. • 12 Annual leave, Up to 30 days of Sick Leave • Annual Summer Vacation: 1-6 Million Cash, 1-3 Leave holiday • Annual health check-up • Udemy Premium account for one year • English class, sponsor for taking certification as PMP, AWS… • 13th-month Salary • Other allowances: transportation allowance, lunch allowance, working on-site allowance, etc. • Company shuttle buses provide a convenient way of transportation for all employees. • F-Town Campus provides many facilities for FPT Software employees such as a football ground, basketball & volleyball, gym & yoga centre, restaurant, cafeteria, etc.  CONTACT: Recruitment Department FPT Software Workforce Development Contact Person: Ms. Nguyễn Ngọc Sương Phone Number: 0767263727 Email: SuongNN@fsoft.com.vn  Show more Show less']

title: Remote BACKEND (PYTHON+SQL) Developer at Clue (getclue.com)
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['Def GetPythonRockstars(candidate)  skills = ["ADVANCED_PYTHON", "ADVANCED_SQL"]  work_interests = ["BIG_DATA", "TELEMATICS", "APIS", "OTHER"]  experience >= 3*365  company_type = ["USA_STARTUP", "REMOTE_WORK"]  url = ["https://www.getclue.com"]  linkedin = ["https://www.linkedin.com/company/clueinsights"]  if all(elem in skills for elem in candidate.get("skills")) \\  and candidate.wants(work_interests) \\  and candidate.likes(company_type):  candidate.seePostAndContact()  If Candidate.isHired()  candidate.monthlySalaryRange(2000-3500, "USD")  return True  return False Show more Show less']

title: Wordpress Developer
description: ['Designing and implementing new features and functionality Conducting analysis of website and application requirements Establishing and guiding the website’s architecture Ensuring high-performance and availability, and managing all technical aspects of the CMS Helping formulate an effective, responsive design and turning it into a working theme and plugin.   Qualifications   Have advanced experiences in Wordpress (If possible, show us several WP projects you worked before). Have deep knowledge of Wordpress themes, plugins and can create Wordpress theme, plugins Can customize, optimize Wordpress plugins. Well understanding of Woocommerce plugins. Good understanding of front-end technologies, including HTML5, CSS3 Experience building user interfaces for websites and/or web applications Experience designing and developing responsive design websites Comfortable working with debugging tools like Firebug, Chrome inspector, etc. Ability to understand CSS changes and their ramifications to ensure consistent style across platforms and browsers Ability to convert comprehensive layout and wireframes into working HTML pages Knowledge of how to interact with RESTful APIs and formats (JSON, XML) Understanding of code versioning tools   Additional Information    Benefits:    Good work environment and good colleague (parties, holidays, team building activities) Free Kindergarten for staff’s kids 13th salary Premium\xa0Healthcare Insurance Lunch Allowance Tea, coffee, milk Work on the latest technology Two-day weekend: Sat and Sun 20 annual leave days alongside Vietnamese public holidays Always new challenge (Training provided) Self-organize project team Work with high profile multinational companies Competitive Salary and career evolution based on your performance defined every year Show more Show less']

title: System Engineer, DevOps
description: ['This is a key role that should have the engineering knowledge, production experience and hands-on implementation ability. You will work with Chotot Site Reliability Engineering as well as the bigger regional tech group that Chotot is a member of.     What will you be doing?  Ensure the highest levels of production system performance, availability and scalability. Automate the provisioning of infrastructure (on-premise and cloud), system and software. Design and operate the build & release, configuration management, code deployments to multiple environments. Work closely with the development team to integrate new deployment processes and strategies. Seek out problem or opportunity in the critical high impact area and solve them.     What do you need for the role?  Hands-on in Python and any of Bash/Perl/Golang. Hands-on experience in the Cloud (GCP or AWS) ecosystem and tooling. Hands-on experience in Terraform or similar software like Ansible/Chef. Have foundation and knowledge of operating systems, database and distributed systems fundamentals. Understanding and full experience in DevOps development culture, principle and practices. Experience with Cloud networking. Self-motivated, detailed oriented and responsible. Very well command of English in both reading and writing.     Would be great if you are also:  Production experience in using and operating software services that utilize: Kubernetes, Kafka, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, ElasticSearch, Prometheus. Ability to drive sound architecture, implementation & technical investigations through hands-on development plus systematically planning and execution. Enjoy learning and ramping up on new technologies quickly. Professional Certification preferred, ideally in Google Cloud Platform and Amazon. BSc, MSc in Computer Science or Engineering or equivalent.     What’s in it for you?  Join plenty of Sharing and Learning activities as part of our initiatives to contribute to the tech community in Vietnam Get 15 days of annual leave and 5 days of sick leave per year Health insurance for employee and their family members Get a Macbook Pro as your workstation Get 13th month salary and annual performance bonus Participate in regular team building activities and company parties Get opportunities to attend training courses abroad Most importantly, the code you write will be impacting the lives of millions!     Thank you for taking your time to read our job description and thank you in advance if you decide to apply for this position. Shortlisted candidates will be contacted within 2 weeks since application, otherwise we might meet when another chance arises.  Show more Show less']

title: IAM Engineer
description: ['What you’re going to do     For our continuously growing subsidiary Adnovum Vietnam, we are currently recruiting IAM Engineers to\xa0relocate for working in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.  \ufeff  As an IAM Engineer, you will work on a wide variety of challenging IAM solution implementation projects for renowned clients from different industries.     In your daily work, you will  Implementation of functional and non-functional requirements (availability, security, performance, etc.) of IAM solutions according to specification, by installing and configuring IAM/Security products Integrate business applications into implemented IAM solutions Write documentations (requirement, design, test, guides, etc.) Design and provide estimation of technical solutions Develop Unit Test and SIT Test Cases Develop integration modules, extensions or customizations for IAM/Security products Develop scripts and tools for data migration (data checking, cleansing, transformation, merging, loading, reconciliation) Support and maintenance Collaborate with other Adnovum employees in international cross-functional teams to achieve goals     What we’re looking for     To master this job, you should have  at least 1 year of experience in professional software\xa0development/implementation Good communication skills in English. Hands-on technical project experience in\xa0any/ some\xa0of the following technologies: IAM software products (e.g. Microsoft Azure, Okta, ForgeRock, OneIdentity, Oracle, Sailpoint, IBM) Java/J2EE software development (Backend) including Javascript/HTML/JSP/JSF/ Angular/Etc (Frontend) Web Server (e.g. Apache HTTPD, IIS, Oracle HTTP Server, IBM HTTP Server) installation, configuration, hardening and performance optimization Application Server (e.g. Weblogic, Websphere, JBoss/WildFly, Tomcat) installation, configuration, hardening and performance optimization Database (e.g. Oracle Database, Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL) installation, configuration, hardening and performance optimization Active Directory or LDAP (e.g. OUD, IBM SDS, CA Directory, Active Directory, Active Directory LDS) installation, configuration, hardening and performance optimization Development or configuration experience in integration technologies such as SSL/TLS, REST and Web-Service (SOAP) High-availability implementation and configuration in IAM products, web servers, application servers, directories and database servers Performance testing and tuning in IAM products, web servers, application servers, directories and database servers     Strong plus if candidate has\xa0any/ some/ all\xa0of the following:  Security related certifications (e.g. CISSP, CRISC, SSCP) Cloud related certifications (e.g. Microsoft Azure, AWS, GCP) Practical experience in IAM solution integration and implementation Process and concept knowledge in IAM areas such as access management, multi-factor authentication, strong authentication, SSO, session management, federation, identity management, credential/ password management, role management, privilege access management, cloud application access integration     Sharp minds, good vibes  We are the sharp-minded IT experts who tackle the trickiest software and security challenges. With more than 630 employees in our locations in Zurich (HQ), Bern, Lausanne, Budapest, Lisbon, Singapore, and Ho Chi Minh City, we make the digital business of our clients work.     As a great team, we empower each other to share, grow and succeed. The unique Adnovum spirit across locations stands for helping each other at any time, having an open door and contributing to an appreciating and trustful atmosphere. We always enjoy having a laugh, a coffee or a drink together!     Apart from our unique «one Adnovum» spirit, we offer a solution-oriented engineering culture with flat hierarchies, which gives you the opportunity to contribute with your opinions and ideas. We embrace flexible working, like the possibility to work part-time and a hybrid work model. Your continuous education and development are key to us. Therefore, we actively encourage and support individual training opportunities.\xa0     We offer  different customer projects using technologies like Java\xa08, Java EE, EJB, JPA, Hibernate, Spring, JUnit, Mockito, Eclipse RCP, WebServices (RESTful, SOAP), JavaScript, Cordova, JSF, Angular (2), HTML5, CSS 3, JQuery, etc. project assignments according to your skill set and development goals. working side by side with highly skilled and experienced software engineers. collaboration with colleagues in Switzerland, Hungary, Portugal and Singapore. friendly working atmosphere in a well-equipped and professional IT environment. long-term and stable job with flexible working hours. a competitive salary plus a performance based bonus, a premium healthcare plan and free English classes.     For data privacy reasons, we only accept applications submitted via our online portal:  https://boards.greenhouse.io/adnovum/jobs/3675914     Applications received by e-mail cannot be processed. Thank you for your understanding.  \ufeffAdnovum accepts only direct applications. Any applications submitted by recruitment agencies without contractual agreement will be treated as direct applications.  Show more Show less']

title: Finance Business Intelligence Analyst (ShopeePay)
description: ['Job Description  Perform a bridging role between the finance and data science team Create reporting frameworks for new product features in financial reports Provide solutions in extracting relevant data and information to represent the financial reporting requirements accurately Troubleshoot system-related issues through essential communication, walkthrough and testing Document process workflows and business logics Manage stakeholders’ needs, concerns and problems regarding changes, enhancements or fixes Think strategically and analytically about business, product and technical challenges Ensure the reports are delivered in time with the highest level of accuracy   Requirements  Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, Business Administration and/or Business Analytics Knowledge of SQL is a must; experience dealing with database is an advantage Robust data analytics and/or visualization skills, preferably with Python and/or Microsoft Power BI Effective team player and passion to serve Versatile and results-oriented in a fast- pace environment Strong analytical thinking and problem solving Excellent verbal and written communication and project management skill Keen sense of ownership, drive and determination Dependability and a strong work ethic. Show more Show less']

title: JUNIOR DEVELOPER - Dubai, UAE
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ["Starting salary of\u202f55,000 USD per annum\u202fin a zero-tax environment.  Fast progression for strong performers.  Job location:\u202fDubai, UAE  About us:  Cobblestone Energy is a proprietary trading firm that specializes in the wholesale electricity market across Europe. Electricity is fundamental to the world's economic activities. We trade enough electricity every day to power a small country, and in doing so, we help to address the mismatch between electricity generation and consumption.  Job Description\u202f  At Cobblestone Energy we are on a mission to build the most advanced European electricity trading and analytics platform, with our technology being used by our teams of commercial traders to create significant value. We are looking for enthusiastic and resourceful developers who are passionate about building exceptionally reliable and performance\u202fdata processing solutions. You want to help the commercial team make data-informed decisions, have a curious mindset, and are motivated to understand our business better. Developing a strong domain knowledge of our industry over time is key to long term success in this role.\u202f  If you have excellent programming skills, strong problem-solving skills, and a passion for developing and improving applications utilizing cutting edge technologies, then we would like to meet you.\u202f  What we offer in this role\u202f  Competitive remuneration, with fast progression for strong performers. A challenging but exciting, open, and fun work environment. An opportunity to work with remarkably talented colleagues. Vast growth potential in every aspect. 15% target bonus with further upside. Employee share scheme participation International relocation support Opportunity to be embedded within a commercial team for those with strong commercial interest   Responsibilities\u202f  Write software applications and programs for backend/frontend purposes.\u202f Analyse programs and apps to improve their features and functionalities.\u202f Test & debug programs and fix any reported bugs.\u202f Collaborate with the tech team to improve the performance, efficiency, and scalability of our tools.\u202f   Requirements\u202f  BS/BE in Computer Science/Computer Engineering.\u202f Programming experience of 1 to 2 years in Python language.\u202f Expertise in at least one popular Python framework (like Django, Flask ...).\u202f Experience of 1 to 2 years in front-end technologies such as HTML5, CSS,\u202fJQuery, JS, ...etc.\u202f Knowledge of APIs and webservices.\u202f Knowledge of Relational Databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server ...) and SQL language.\u202f Knowledge of NoSQL databases is a plus.\u202f Knowledge of AWS is a plus / Knowledge of data visualization tools, mainly Tableau, is a plus.\u202f Ability to work in a team environment.\u202f Strong problem-solving skills and analytical skills.\u202f Resilience and a determination to\u202fsucceed.\u202f Independent thinkers with growth mindset.\u202f Must be\u202fpassionate,\u202fself-motivated,\u202fand able to learn quickly.\u202f Strong sense of integrity.\u202f\u202f Personal values that match our company values.\u202f Show more Show less"]

title: AI Engineer
description: ['MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC:  - Nghiên cứu, xây dựng phương án, lập trình, thử nghiệm và tối ưu kết quả các bài toán trí tuệ nhân tạo thuộc các lĩnh vực:  · Phát triển các mô hình AI dựa cho phát hiện đối tượng, OCR, nhận dạng khuôn mặt,...  ·\xa0Xử lý ngôn ngữ tự nhiên: Chatbot, Text Normalization …  ·\xa0Các bài toán về Smart Camera …  - Phối hợp với nhóm phát triển sản phẩm để tích hợp các sản phẩm nền vào các ứng dụng thực tiễn dành cho ngân hàng, tài chính  YÊU CẦU:  - Có ít nhất 1 năm kinh nghiệm tham gia vào các dựa án liên quan đến Học Máy (Machine Learning) và xử lý ảnh, OCR  \xa0- Có kinh nghiệm với 1 trong các ngôn ngữ lập trình sau: C/C++, Python.  \xa0- Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với một trong các framework Tensorflow, Pytorch, Keras; Scikit; DL4J; …  - Có kiến thức chắc về học máy, CNN, RNN.  - Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng GIT, JIRA.  - Khả năng tư duy tốt, tinh thần trách nhiệm và ý thức về chất lượng cao.  - Khả năng làm việc độc lập, tích cực, chủ động trong công việc, luôn luôn tìm tòi học hỏi những kiến thức và bài toán mới  - Khả năng đọc hiểu tiếng anh tốt.  QUYỀN LỢI  LƯƠNG: 20-35NET  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Hỗ trợ trang thiết bị làm việc;  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Được hưởng đầy đủ chế độ bảo hiểm theo quy định BHXH, BHYT, BHTN;  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Hỗ trợ phụ cấp, công tác phí, phụ cấp thâm niên;  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Được hưởng chế độ nghỉ phép 12 ngày/năm, các ngày nghỉ phép khác theo quy định của Luật;  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Thưởng các ngày Lễ lớn trong năm như tết Dương lịch, 30/4….  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm;  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Được đào tạo chuyên môn, kỹ năng thường xuyên;  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Xét điều chỉnh lương, đánh giá theo năng lực định kỳ, 2 lần/năm;  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Lương tháng 13  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Được làm việc trong môi trường năng động, nhiều cơ hội thăng tiến;  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Đội ngũ kĩ sư, nhân viên tài năng, giàu kinh nghiệm  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Làm việc với các đối tác lớn: MB Bank…  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Tham gia các hoạt động du lịch và teambuilding, sinh nhật… do Công ty tổ chức;  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Làm việc từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6; nghỉ thứ 7, CN.  Cơ hội phát triển:\xa0  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Làm việc trong lĩnh vực Banking cùng các chuyên gia trong và ngoài nước  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Được tham gia các khóa đào tạo về chuyên môn theo nhu cầu  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Cùng nghiên cứu và thử thách với những công nghệ mới và các hot tech trend trên thế giới thông qua các buổi training hoặc các cuộc thi nội bộ và có phần thưởng cho các cuộc thi này  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Được tham gia các chương trình training về kỹ năng công nghệ và kỹ năng mềm, phương pháp làm việc (Agile, Scrum...).  ·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Được tư vấn và chia sẻ về phát triển năng lực và nghề nghiệp bản thân.  ĐỊA ĐIỂM: MB Bank 18 Lê Văn Lương, HN  \xa0  \xa0  \xa0  Show more Show less']

title: Cloud Engineer (Azure)
company: NAB in collaboration with Positive Thinking Company in Vietnam
description: ["TOP 03 REASONS TO JOIN US  Attractive compensation & benefits package Private health care for family Join a company that invests in you     ABOUT THE JOB  You are an experienced Cloud Engineer who approaches Cloud technologies through a DevSecOps lens and works comfortably with Agile Scrum methodologies.\xa0Responsible for onboarding asset teams into a managed Cloud environment, you develop and manage automation frameworks to provide monitoring, patch management, release management, security and data retention.\xa0In addition to this you will support and develop DR strategies, provide guidance and consulting around DevOps best practices and collaborate with other cloud teams to support delivery.  \xa0     YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE     3+ years’ extensive experience of DevOps or Cloud Engineer\xa0across all Phases of the software lifecycle Background in supporting Azure cloud services with a healthy knowledge in Windows and/or Linux system administration Good understanding of Azure as a cloud platform or advantage to have experience with Terraform deployment, Azure Log Analytics, Azure Backup, Azure Automation Update Management and Microsoft Endpoint Configuration Manage. Experience supporting Azure foundational services (Virtual Machines, SQL managed instance, NSG’s, ASG’s, LB etc.) Experience using cloud native tools (i.e. Azure Log Analytics, Azure Update Management, Azure Functions etc) to review metrics, manage and monitor system/service health and utilisation of our cloud services A keen interest in automation and an ability to utilise tooling to improve efficiencies and repeatable tasks but also improve the day to day reliability and performance of our cloud managed services Working as infrastructure-as-code development and deployment Specific experience with cloud related automation concepts and tooling such as Azure Automation, Powershell Functions, TFE, Azure DevOps, Jenkins, Git, Artifactory, Jira) Understanding of good cloud change management practices with an awareness of compliance and security standards. Ability to manage and develop in-life security patching, manage backup and disaster recovery processes Experience in fine tuning virtualization, storage configuration, and replication for specific workloads Excellent engagement skills, managing and coordinating between partners, acknowledging Security, Network, Architecture and Service Management requirements. You will be expected to provide out of hours support (rotated through a team roster) for cloud services as part of our 24x7 coverage agreement.     A career with NAB is about more than money. You'll have our backing to develop and our encouragement to explore, realise and apply your potential.  Show more Show less"]

title: ERP System Analyst / Senior System Analyst (Singapore Based, Relocation Provided)
description: ['About Us  Sea Limited (NYSE: SE) is a leading global consumer internet company founded in Singapore in 2009. Our mission is to better the lives of consumers and small businesses with technology.  We operate three core businesses across digital entertainment, e-commerce, as well as digital payments and financial services, known as Garena, Shopee, and SeaMoney, respectively. Garena is a leading global online games developer and publisher. Shopee is the largest pan-regional e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Taiwan. SeaMoney is a leading digital payments and financial services provider in Southeast Asia.  As part of the Finance Systems team based in Singapore, we are looking for a Senior System Analyst / System Analyst to work in the day to day operation support and project roll out of enterprise resource planning applications.  Job Responsibilities   Responsible for the support, maintenance and project roll out of finance systems (Oracle EBS R12). Responsible for the maintenance of user and technical level documentation. Document changes and create troubleshooting guides. Assist in the development of finance systems, robust testing of new functionality, processes and setups and preparation of related documentation for sign off. Work with Finance teams to clarify business requirements, map them to systems capabilities, and recommend technical solutions. Convert business requirements into technical solution. Provide cover for other team members to share the workload. Take on projects from time to time. This involves leading project meetings and working with other teams in Finance and IT, keeping the appropriate teams regularly informed of progress and developments. Propose solutions (or improvements) for future and current requirements using any of the existing or new tools   Requirements   At least Bachelor’s degree in computing, business and accountancy or a similar field of study. Around 5-10 years of working experience or at least two full cycle project implementations in some of finance modules (GL, AP, AR and FA). Knowledge in programming language (e.g. SQL, PL/SQL, and JavaScript) is a plus. Ability to grasp finance and technical concepts quickly, develop expertise while on-the-job training. Strong interpersonal and team building skills; ability to work with a diverse team and influence/drive change across functional and business boundaries. Excellent communication skills with ability to grasp complex concepts and ability to communicate internally with all stakeholders. Strong problem solving and analytical skills. Team player and able to work and learn independently when necessary. Hardworking with acute attention-to-detail skills. Initial work location will be based in home country; relocation to Singapore will happen once Covid-19 restrictions eases. Show more Show less']

title: Cloud Engineer
description: ['LINKBYNET is a leading provider of private and public cloud computing solutions, associated with full managed services.  Accenture (NYSE: ACN) has completed its acquisition of Linkbynet in Juy 2021,  Founded in 2000, Linkbynet is based in Saint-Denis, France, with additional offices in Belgium, Canada, China, France, Luxembourg, Mauritius, Singapore and Vietnam. The company’s team of more than 900 highly skilled professionals holds 400 certifications from major cloud providers such as Alibaba, Amazon, Google and Microsoft.  Linkbynet will further enhance the global capabilities of Accenture Cloud First. Powered by 70,000 cloud professionals and a $3 billion investment over the next three years, Accenture Cloud First group brings together unmatched depth and breadth of cloud expertise, industry cloud solutions, ecosystem partner capabilities, and assets that help clients realize greater value from cloud at speed and scale.     To join our dynamic team in Viet Nam, we are currently looking for the below role:  Cloud Engineer     Conduct discovery on customer applications as candidates for migration to Cloud Services (“in-scope applications”) Co-ordinate to conduct the assessment of the current client’s IT environment Identify technology contributors and constraints that may impact migration of the in-scope applications Review in-scope applications’ application code, binaries and data for migration to Cloud Services and provide recommendations Co-ordinate to design cloud architecture Develop migration patterns for in-scope applications (Rehost or Replatform) Develop application migration criteria Assist migration of the in-scope application to the Cloud Landing Zone Assist acceptance testing for in-scope applications and provide recommendations Develop migration plan for cutover activities Provision a cloud platform for client (preferred using IaC processes)     Knowledge, Skills and Abilities Required  OS  At least 5 years of experience in Windows or Linux/Unix administration  Cloud  At least 3 years of experience in Cloud (Azure or GCP)  § IaaS, PaaS services  § Migration strategies, methodology and tools  Virtualization (Vmware/Hyper-V or Openstack) and containers (kubernetes, docker)  Automation  At least 2 years of experience with terraform, ansible, chef and CICD tool. Scripting (Perl / Python / Bash / Powershell)  Certificates  ITIL V4 Foundation is a plus Any certification in System management Cloud management certificates such as Azure /GCP (professional level)  Others skills:  You are defined by the following autonomous, curious and technologic enthusiast. You can take ownership of projects and drive them to completion. Self-organized, skill in prioritizing and balancing multiple tasks. Skill in establishing and maintaining cooperative working relationships and promoting teamwork Customer-oriented approach Communication: advanced English proficiency (written and spoken); French is a plus Very good knowledge in the following technologies:  OS:  Managing patching and version update, users and permissions. Monitoring CPU, memory, disks and filesystems, OS-level networking  Internet solutions:  WEB: Apache, Nginx, Varnish, CDN: Akamai, CloudFront Applications: PHP, FPM, Common PHP frameworks, Magento, WordPress, Hybris DB and storage applications: MySQL, Cloud RDS, Redis  Internet protocols:  DNS, HTTP, SSL/TLS Open Source solutions Knowledge of container, micro-service, database data model You know what production is, what’s to manage incident and you want to avoid it at all cost Show more Show less']

title: Senior Knowledge Analyst
description: ["Qualifications  Bachelor’s or master’s degree from a reputable institution in related fields such as business, economics and engineering, with excellent academic standing 3+ years of experience in research, consulting or corporate strategy roles Experience in macro-economic development work or multi-sectoral business exposure through ecosystems, diversified businesses and conglomerates will be highly desirable Good knowledge of the Vietnam market with solid understanding of economic, sectoral and business concepts and terminology Superior problem-solving, analytical and quantitative skills Strong written and verbal communication skills in English and Vietnamese Self-standing with good time-management skills and a flexible attitude, with ability to meet tight deadlines and handle simultaneous work streams Collaborative team player, with ability to work effectively with people at all levels in an organization and in client facing engagements  What You'll Do  You will leverage on your solid understanding of macroeconomic and industry trends and issues to deliver synthesized, actionable facts and insights, which goes towards solving our client's business issues or as part of a new knowledge effort.  In this role, you will use both primary and secondary research tools and perform a variety of analysis such as market sizing, trend identification, opportunity scan, growth projection, industry and corporate profiling, etc. The synthesized insights will subsequently help in your problem solving discussions in client engagements. You will also have opportunities to develop and codify knowledge on new and emerging topics of relevance to the Vietnam market and the Firm more broadly.  As you grow in the firm, you will be exposed to diverse and challenging opportunities. You will build deep sectoral and country knowledge spikes related to the Vietnam market, and become a true knowledge thought partner for consultants and clients. Opportunities are also abound for you to enhance your people leadership and management skills through mentoring opportunities, as well as involvement in functional priorities such as evaluation, recruitment and training for the Southeast Asia Client Capabilities team.  Who You'll Work With  You will be based in our Hanoi office as part of our Southeast Asia Client Capabilities team. You will work with research and consulting colleagues and clients.  The Southeast Asia client capabilities team specializes in the region's local knowledge/content expertise. The team undertakes country and industry research for high impact client engagements and the firm's knowledge development effort.  Our more than 2,500 client capabilities professionals across the globe work alongside our consultants to deliver Change that Matters to our clients. They support our consultant teams, both remotely and at client sites, in an agile and targeted way. Further, they are core to our firm’s R&D, developing new knowledge and building and refining proprietary capabilities (e.g. assets, data sets), as well as curating, managing, and maintaining them. Our portfolio includes state-of-the-art research, asset-backed and rapid diagnostics, benchmarking, and workflow support. Our professionals have deep expertise and are able to apply a broad range of methodologies for specialized on-demand analyses. Show more Show less"]

title: Software Engineer (SAP)
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['WHO ARE WE LOOKING FOR?  From infrastructure to security and supply chain operations, Technology specialists drive growth through top-flight hardware, software, and enterprise applications. Simply put, without Nike Technology, there are no Nike products. The Air Manufacturing Innovation (AirMI) Technology team needs a strong BSA with experience working in an agile environment, who’s focus will be to deliver the right solution to customers with the highest quality and shortest lead time.  WHAT WILL YOU WORK ON?  In partnership with Architects, Business Stakeholders, Customers, and Product Owners you will implement the Product/solution vision and be responsible for the configuration of Air MI’s SAP instance with a focus on meeting the needs of the Air MI’s Viet Nam Polaris Facility. Your work will include technical analysis related to advanced data analysis, data mining, and source to target mapping. Creates and maintains complex context process and system diagrams. You’ll work with remote groups such as vendors, other Nike facilities, and or departments to gather and document tactical requirements from the business. From there, you’ll coordinate and communicate functional requirements of business unit and technical solutions with IT capability resources by designing and documenting advanced functional specs. Working with systems personnel to implement design, you’ll participate in the development of project plan/timeline. You may create reports and configure package solutions to unique business requirements and perform testing activities, including construction of test plans/scripts including the expected results and the validation of test results. Once implemented, you’ll communicate and document system changes to the business, translating system functionality into business relevant language.  WHO WILL YOU WORK WITH?  You’ll be the point person for Technology at the Viet Nam Polaris facility and report to the Oregon based SAP Engineering Manager. Day to day, you will be supporting a large, diverse team of Nike people with a variety of management styles, as well as coordinating outside suppliers and vendors. A key part of your role will be to work with the NA based Air MI Technology organization to deliver solutions that meet the needs of your stakeholders. People appreciate your ability to be resourceful in the face of ambiguity and to find solutions on your own. WHAT YOU BRING  Bachelor’s Degree and minimum of 2 years directly relevant work experience Direct experience in a multi-site Manufacturing Environment Demonstrated understanding of best-at SAP implementation particularly with ECC and Advanced Planning (APO, IBP, etc.) with proven experience with PP/SD modules and master data required. Some experience in FI/CO, MM, QM, PM, WM preferred Able to solve complex problems and take a new perspective on existing solutions while developing innovative solution designs for the future, rooted firming in business value and ROI Excellent oral, written and presentation communication skills with the ability to influence others internally and externally. Experience resolving issues with higher levels of management Proven ability to respond to and prioritize changing demands effectively coupled with the ability to anticipate customer needs Proven track record of being self-directed, results orientated with demonstrated ability to achieve aggressive goals despite ambiguity and multiple priorities Show more Show less']

title: [HN] Cloud Engineer (AWS)
description: ["Responsibilities:  - Build, map and optimize delivery of the Continuous Delivery Pipeline (CDP) by addressing key elements like: process time, lead time, delay time and percent of completion and accuracy.  - Analyze the needs of units and consult, design, deploy cloud-based solutions, consider potential effectiveness and risk of solutions.  - Identify risks and coordinate with related units to propose methods to measure and minimize risks in operations.  - Make recommendations, improvements and enhancements through continuous assessment of security threats and vulnerabilities in the cloud.  - Ensure the cloud solutions align with service quality, comply with the Bank's regulations and policies.     Requirements:  - 3-5+ years of experience building and maintaining Cloud infrastructure.  - Strong understanding of how to secure Cloud environments and meet compliance requirements  - Experience with Puppet and Ansible for configuration management  - Hands-on experience deploying and managing infrastructure with Terraform  - Solid foundation of networking and Linux administration  - Experience with Kubernetes, Docker, GitHub, Jenkins, ELK and deploying applications on AWS  - Ability to learn/use a wide variety of open source technologies and tools     Location: Hanoi     Contact:  Ngô Linh Chi - IT Recruiter  Email: chinl.rpo@techcombank.com.vn  Mobile: 0981221292  Show more Show less"]

title: Remote (Full-time) - Software Engineer
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ["INTRODUCTION a. About Fetch: Fetch Technology Vietnam is a comprehensive global provider of HR and Talent Acquisition Services, focusing primarily on the technology fields. Founded in 2016, Fetch Technology Vietnam helps foreign companies of all types and sizes reach their potential by providing the talent and support to efficiently build and scale a high-performing, distributed workforce in Vietnam. Our mission is to offer Vietnam’s most talented technologists a platform to connect with some of the world’s leading tech companies and build their expertise on a global scale. Over 4 years, Fetch has built a good reputation and is trusted by many Vietnamese and foreign companies; And Fetch will continue its good work to bridge the divide between the World and the Vietnam Tech sector. b. About our client At this company, they believe that the future of healthcare is online and at home rather than in the clinic or in the pharmacy. They run two specialised digital health brands that make good healthcare accessible and affordable for all. Meet A and B — the telemedicine platforms of the 21st century. About A & B A is Singapore’s first digital men’s health platform. It’s an inclusive, discreet space that provides treatment for stigmatized yet common conditions in sexual health, aesthetics, and overall well-being. B is a supportive and judgment-free platform that empowers women to take charge of their overall well-being, including everything from sexual health to aesthetics, hair and mental health. RESPONSIBILITIES Developing and directing software system validation and testing methods. Directing our software programming initiatives Overseeing the development of documentation. Working closely with clients and cross-functional departments to communicate project statuses and proposals. Analyzing data to effectively coordinate the installation of new systems or the modification of existing systems. Managing the software development lifecycle. Monitoring system performance. Communicating key project data to team members and building cohesion among teams. Developing and executing project plans. Applying mathematics, and statistics to problem-solving initiatives. Applying best practices and standard operating procedures. Creating innovative solutions to meet our company’s technical needs. Testing new software and fixing bugs. Shaping the future of our systems. REQUIREMENT A bachelor's degree in computer science, software engineering, or another related field. 2+ years of software engineering or software development experience, open for all of the tech stacks. Hands-on programming experience using relevant languages. Experience using relevant tool suites. Strong written and verbal communication and interpersonal skills. Creative problem-solving skills. Experience managing the software development lifecycle. The ability to prioritize activities and deliver projects on time and within budget. Experience working with clients and business partners. A comprehensive understanding of computer science concepts. Excellent coding skills. Extensive knowledge of agile methodologies. Strong team-building skills. The ability to travel as necessary. WHY YOU‘LL LOVE WORKING HERE They are made up of a bunch of creatives, entrepreneurs and tech-\xaddriven individuals. They’re far from the straight\xadlaced corporates that you might imagine pulling the strings behind healthcare companies. They represent a new breed of healthcare companies, at the forefront of revolutionizing how people receive medical treatment. They were founded in the midst of COVID\xad19, and in a matter of 6 months, they've grown to thousands of patients and hit over 7 figures in Annual Run Rate. They have also been featured on Augustman, FM91.3, Vulcan Post, e27, etc. They see themselves continuing to grow to all new heights and therefore are looking for someone with the skills to help us meet the technological demands that come with it. You will be joining a young startup in a growth phase and you will also be working remotely (they don't intend to get an office anytime soon). This means a couple of things: Flexible schedule. You will have a more flexible schedule but you will also have to be prepared to fight fires at odd hours when you least expect. Pull your own weight.There'll be no hand-\xadholding and they expect you to pull your own weight \xad like everyone else. Things get messy. There's no sugarcoating this. Things are unstructured and processes might be lacking. They're not where they want to be but they're getting there. You must be able to thrive in ambiguous situations (see point above). You are willing to put in the time to get the most out of any opportunity. Building a strong team is key in our ambition to thrive as a company, as co\xad-workers, and as individuals. Therefore, they are looking for someone similarly dedicated and passionate, willing to put their best foot forward (go all stakes in) and take pride in what they do, because they do too. If you are interested in joining us at this point in our journey and are someone who enjoys sticking their hands in the dirt and putting in the work to see something grow, then you’re one of us. Show more Show less"]

title: MLOps Engineer
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['The About Knorex  Founded in 2009, Knorex (https://knorex.com) is a technology company that provides programmatic advertising products and solutions to marketers to connect in real-time to their desired audience worldwide. Through its flagship universal marketing platform, Knorex XPO unifies the connectivity to each of the major marketing channels including social media, search, connected TVs/OTTs, video, audio, display/native, and email, in one place, while simplifying execution and optimization across these channels through AI automation. Knorex operates across the US and APAC.  Why Knorex  We are constantly on the lookout to recruit the best and the brightest - from engineering to sales to account management to operations and HR.  Knorex offers you many different opportunities to scale your ambition and creativity far and beyond. We embrace a dynamic and pragmatic way of doing things, setting ourselves up for long-term achievement yet relentlessly focused on delivering the short-term goals. If you love the joy of building stuff and seeing them grow, growing yourself and others in the process, and challenging yourself to do stuff that you once thought impossible, we invite you to explore a career with us.  Job Description  Knorex develops a cloud-based, highly scalable, all-in-one advertising and marketing platform called Knorex XPO™ (https://xpo.knorex.com/) where Advertisers, Agencies and Publishers can easily create, optimize & publish Dynamic Ads worldwide with speed and ease. As part of the platform offering, anyone can traffic their Dynamic Ads programmatically via automated buying through our in-house real-time bidder and optimizer.  Real-time bidding (RTB) is a means by which advertising inventory is bought and sold on a per-impression basis, via programmatic instantaneous auction, similar to financial markets. The entire process generally takes place in less than 100 ms. Owing to the large and real-time stream of data, coming up with efficient and pragmatic solutions and algorithms to challenging problems will become imperative. At Knorex R&D, we apply large-scale machine learning (ML) models to optimize the return-on-investment of our advertisers’ budget. Tasks we work on include user interaction prediction, bidding optimization, contextual targeting, etc.  We are seeking MLOps Engineers with the zest and passion to work on our in-house machine learning platform, which covers the whole life-cycle of machine learning, from data collection and augmentation pipeline, to model training and serving, to monitoring and analysis. You will be joining our R&D team working closely with Data Scientists, Research Scientists, and Software Engineers to build a highly scalable system that can handle billions of requests per day, all delivered in milliseconds.  In this role, you will work on large-scale and low-latency ML systems. You need to acquire a deep technical understanding of the platform, work with our cross-country team located regionally to learn about the business and technical analytics requirements, and translate them into production system.  Key Responsibilities  Plan, design and develop components in the data pipeline to enable various machine learning models in production. Work closely with Data Scientists and Research Scientists to translate the state-of-the-art to production systems. Develop metrics to measure the outcome/impact of your introduced solutions. Investigate the existing pipeline, identify bottlenecks and optimize the throughput and latency of ML components. Document and improve the solutions over time. Evaluate and identify new technologies for implementation. Communicate with our business and technical teams to understand the analytics requirements. Respond and follow up to incorporate feedback and draw new insights. Prioritize tasks to meet multiple deadlines.   Requirements  Strong knowledge of Java is a must; Strong knowledge of Python is a must; Strong knowledge of algorithms and data structures; Strong in analytics and problem solving technique; At least 2-year working experience as ML/Data/Software Engineer or equivalent; Prior experience with Elastic Search is a strong plus; Prior experience with machine learning and NLP is a strong plus; Understanding of online advertising technology and RTB is a strong plus; Possess at least a Degree or Diploma in computer science / IT related; Willingness to learn and able to pick up new technology or new concepts fast; Able to work independently as well as in collaborative mode with minimum supervision; Work productively even under pressure; Possess good work ethic, attitude with good follow-through; Reasonable communication in written and spoken English.   Benefits  Competitive remuneration package including quarterly bonus payout. SHUI as law stipulated, 14 days AL MacBook provided Comprehensive benefits scheme such as W3F (Work, Wellbeing, Welfare) Fund for courses, materials, personal health and wellbeing. Work from home benefit. Quarterly recognition program and long service reward. Career growth and personal development scheme. You will have the advance to influence and drive the changes, at Knorex we welcome good ideas and accept any possibility to make our company great. We offer great learning opportunities, you will have exposure in cutting edge performance marketing and advertising technology. Opportunity to work cross-country and with variety of projects of a different nature. Show more Show less']

title: Big Data Engineer
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ["At GeoComply, our mission is to empower the future of digital trust. We operate at the center of a new generation of cybersecurity companies, leveraging today's geolocation data to make better risk-based decisions. Working as a critical piece of the security infrastructure for some of the world’s largest tech companies like DraftKings, FanDuel, the BBC and Akamai, we are the global market-leader for compliance-grade geolocation data and a critical piece of the decision engine. We have big plans in the next few years, including a targeted US IPO and various M&A opportunities.  At the heart of it all is people - we are deeply committed to creating and sustaining a world-class experience for our employees, customers, and partners.  Job Summary  We are looking for an experienced Big Data Engineer to join the team and help us build world-class scalable and efficient data storage. Which is to improve the overall performance of GeoComply products. If you enjoy working with large data sets, finding the best in class solutions to satisfy Business requests, and love challenging problems you are very welcome!  As a Big Data Engineer with GeoComply, you will help design and develop a world-class data management platform. You will maintain open communication with your team members and cross-functional stakeholders.  What You Will Be Doing  Selecting and integrating any Big Data tools and frameworks required to provide requested capabilities. Implementing ETL process to transform data from OLTP databases to OLAP DB and Data Lake using event streaming platforms such as Kafka. Develop, transform large datasets and maintain robust data pipelines that can support various use cases with high performance. Monitoring performance and advising any necessary infrastructure changes. Defining data retention, data governance policies and framework  About You  At least 5 years experience in Java or Scala programming languages. At least 5 years experience with Big Data, Java Spring, Kafka Streams, Spark Streams frameworks. Experience in large scale deployment and performance tuning. Experience with schema design and dimensional data modeling Experience with non-relational and relational databases (MySQL, MongoDB) Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and data sets. Experience with data pipeline and workflow management tool Fluent written and spoken English. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.  Bonus Points if You  Have experience with Delta Lake technology. Good Docker/Kubernetes knowledge is a plus. Good Kibana, Elasticsearch ELK stack knowledge is a plus.  Our IDEALS  Impact. At GeoComply your voice matters and your work and ideas have a direct impact on our business. Dynamic. We are a hyper-growth company with a fast-paced work environment that propels your professional and personal growth. Exposure. We have a flat hierarchy so you work closely with our executives and contribute to projects across teams. Acceptance. We believe in equal opportunity for all and welcome your unique contribution. Learning. We provide extensive training to our people so that you can develop new skills and achieve your career goals. Support. We help each other so that you feel supported and free to do your best work.  Our Benefits  Competitive Salary: High salary and attractive bonus system (13th month, business performance, dividend and internal shares program) Learning & Development: We provide an annual budget equal to 1-months’ salary that can go towards professional or personal development or sport. Equity Plan: As employees of GeoComply, we’re all “owners”. Our unique equity and bonus plans give you the opportunity to share in our company’s success. Fast career path within the company. Premium healthcare insurance (Bao Viet/Liberty) 20 days annual leave Weekly English classes with a native teacher Modern stand-alone office building in the center of Saigon. Free motorbike parking. We're always stocked up on snacks and coffee and have free lunches monthly Frequent social and team-building events  At GeoComply, we live our value of building it right. Our workplace is built on mutual respect and inclusion. We know that diversity of experience and thought has led to connection, innovation, and our company’s success. We welcome applicants of all backgrounds, experiences, beliefs, and identities.  Now What? Send us your resume and a cover letter. We Can’t-Wait To Meet You. Show more Show less"]

title: Cloud Infrastructure Engineer
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['Netcompany is currently looking for a Cloud Infrastructure Engineer to join our international Cloud Infrastructure team, which is a part of Netcompany Operations, on a permanent basis. You will join our strong and dedicated team based in Ho Chi Minh City, where you will have the opportunity to work closely with skilled colleagues in Vietnam, as well as our colleagues in Europe.    You will become part of an ambitious team, which ensures our operation and support of client solutions as well as internal systems.    Your daily work will contain:    Creating and maintaining the infrastructure of Azure solutions, e.g. setting up VMs, VNets, NSGs and other various resources Security hardening of Azure subscriptions Internal customer service requests, change requests, incidents, event management alerts, etc. based on ITIL practices Cooperation with your international team, already based in Poland\xa0and Denmark. This includes daily standup, reporting, knowledge sharing and other meetings. Participate in various Scrum-based ceremonies Automate processes and solutions   Qualifications    Are you experienced, ambitious and ready to take your career to the next level?    As a minimum, you must have the following technical competencies:    Experience with Microsoft Azure Experience writing scripts in PowerShell Experience with cloud infrastructure and servers Good understanding of cloud security\xa0principles Good understanding of general networking (TCP/IP, DNS, etc.) Good understanding of databases and SQL Proficient in English, both written and spoken  It is also important that you:    Have an IT – related Degree Are able to plan and manage your time Have the ability to create technical documentation Have at least two years of working experience Have the ability to present your ideas to others Have a great customer service mindset  It is a plus if you:    Have experience with Development Have experience with DevOps/Infrastructure as Code Have experience with Docker or Kubernetes Have experience with AWS Have experience with CosmosDB and PostGressSQL Are certified in Azure or other relevant Microsoft areas.  As a person you are:    Independent and self-driven, you are ready to take responsibility from day one. You’re also a great team player, ready to go the extra mile for your colleagues. You like to be up to date with new technologies and knowledge-sharing is important for you. You are structured, able to organize your time and document your work.      Additional Information    In Netcompany we believe that a diverse and inclusive workplace is central to our success, which is why all qualified candidates are invited to apply regardless of gender, sexual orientation, disability, age, religion and belief, ethnic background, nationality, gender identity or culture. We are committed to live out a culture where we provide equal opportunities for all.    Show more Show less']

title: Vietnam/Thailand/Malaysia/Philippines - Full Stack Developer
description: ['Your Role  - Take part in the Technical team and deliver the required items, including Technical Specification, Code package, Unit Test, etc.  - Cooperate with Business Analyst to make sure the Customer requirement is satisfied  - Cooperate with DevOps team for configuration management and release/ deployment management  - Ensure the quality of the product along with Quality Assurance office  - Able to provide guidance and support to junior team members  - Able to communicate in English with team members/ customer (if required)     About you:  - Experienced in React JS and Node JS is a must (prefer 3 - 5 years of experience)  - Experienced with Microservices architecture  - Familiar with AWS services, especially DynamoDB, Lambda, etc.  - Able to communicate in English  - Good teamwork and cooperation  - Good understanding/ experienced with Scrum team     Why us? Show more Show less']

title: Magento Developer
description: ["Magento developer (PHP) – 3500$  Company Our company was founded in 2007, and today more than 100 people work here. The development office is in Ukraine, with the sales office located in the USA. We have been closely working with Magento since 2014, and today Magento team has about 30 people. Before COVID-19, working from the office was mandatory. Now the vacancy is remote and we are open to foreign candidates. Moreover, we can provide you with both full (monthly salary) and part-time employment (wage per hour). About our Magento directions:  Primary requirements: • PHP5, MySQL, JS, Magento 1, 2 We work with many different clients on various projects. Thus, our developers may choose the projects that suit them in terms of their skills level and which they find the most comfortable. Conventionally, our Magento department work may be divided into the following areas: 1. The first direction may be the most interesting for the guys who prefer pretty challenging tasks and switching between them. We are an exclusive partner for a number of companies that develop their own extensions and solutions for Magento. We receive a lot of challenging leads both for revising the existing modules and creating the new ones. The most challenging tasks we have been involved in recently are: \uf0b7 cryptocurrencies integration; \uf0b7 non-trivial payment systems integration; \uf0b7 POS terminals integration; \uf0b7 mobile solutions development (PWA, cross-platform and native); \uf0b7 working on marketplaces. 2. The next direction may be suitable for the guys who prefer to be involved in a well-defined development process We are involved in a number of long-term enterprise projects, e.g. we work with the companies that: \uf0b7 wholesale air conditioners (wholesale only) and employ more than 100,000 people; \uf0b7 design and manufacture orthopedic mattresses, and sell them all over the world (this year 30 new countries have been covered); \uf0b7 own a large store in Canada that sells equipment to corporate customers only. Working on such projects is carefully planned, all tasks and processes are documented and the team is divided by their tasks. 3. The following direction is good for people who prefer to work on a well-known source code. Since we have a lot of projects to support, their working processes are well established. Emergencies are extremely rare, while global changes are usually planned and carried out at the usual pace. 4. One more direction is aimed at people who would like to work on a project from the ground, starting from the original task, developing the architecture, and delivering the project turnkey. This is due to the fact that our sales are focused on Magento direction and one of their searching vectors is convincing customers to migrate from other e-commerce platforms to Magento.  About our projects: We work with numerous clients under white labels. However, some customers insist on strict NDA, and we are not able to disclose any information about particular projects. Here you may find some projects we can tell you about and which we are especially proud of: bit.ly/M_projects About projects not related to Magento: Apart from Magento skills, we highly appreciate a desire to delve into new technologies and frameworks. So, for example, now we have a number of projects on Robotium, Apple TV (TVMLJS), and Go. Some developers switched to these projects from PHP / JS. \uf0b7 Some teams work according to Agile methodology. \uf0b7 Some developers work as Dedicated to a specific project/client. \uf0b7 Some work on Fixed Cost base. \uf0b7 Some teams require communication with clients via E-mail / Ticket system. \uf0b7 In some teams, verbal communication is required (a PM helps in case developers have difficulties with English) \uf0b7 In some teams, all communication goes through the PM and one does not have to communicate with the client directly. Thus, the working environment in the teams is different, since we try to provide the most comfortable conditions for our developers inviting them to those projects/teams which they find the most enjoyable. We do not usually insist on direct communication between developers and customers. However, we are glad to provide our developers with an opportunity to communicate with customers directly. Benefits \uf0b7 Working time: EU time zone. We are 5 hours ahead of you ~ 1 PM - 9 PM Vietnam time (later is better). Though if the guy is onboarded to the US or Au clients, he might work closer to Vietnam working time \uf0b7 Annual leave day: For the local developer, we provide a full set of hardware when/if necessary. Though with the abroad devs it might be a problem, cause sending the hardware abroad won't have a benefit. There is a place for negotiations, though (e.g. I may compensate hardware) \uf0b7 We offer paid sick leaves \uf0b7 14 working days of the vacation (if not used, then compensated at the end of the year) \uf0b7 Constantly salary grow and bonuses \uf0b7 We pay courses if they are preliminary agreed Interview process: 1 round with Technical Lead  How to apply  Sent Cv and resume to: th.hienhr@gmail.com Zalo: 0336596120 / Phone : 0981127348  Show more Show less"]

title: 【英語力を活かす】ソフトウェア開発等を行う企業でPM兼Webディレクターを募集中！
description: ['Job Workplaces  ホーチミン - ベトナム  Occupation  専門職・コンサルタント  Position  一般社員  Salary  月収 1,500～2,600USD (額面)  Salary Type  額面  Job Description  Web制作依頼のあったクライアントに対し要件定義を行い、社内エンジニアの進行管理から納品までを行っていただきます。  クライアントへの要望ヒアリング〜要件定義、企画提案、見積 社内、社外ベトナム人エンジニア、デザイナーへの指示出し、進行管理（※英語を使用します） 外注管理（※案件次第で外部委託の場合もあります） （経験者や希望される場合は）新規クライアントへの営業活動 開発環境：PHP, Python, Vue.js, React JS, WordPress, AWS, Git, Slack, Chatwork等 【福利厚生等】  賞与・査定 労働許可証、ビザ取得サポート 医療保険 月一回チームビルディング（食事など）  Job Requirements  営業や接客業など顧客対応の経験3年以上 IT業界での就業経験 英語：日常会話レベル 【その他、望ましいスキルと経験など】  Webディレクション/PM/エンジニアの経験 SEOやライティングに関する知識 ]]> Show more Show less']

title: Big Data Engineer
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ["We are an AI Fintech company specialized in assessing credit profiles of consumers in emerging markets combining pioneering AI with large alternative data sources. In 2020 we reached our ambitious milestone of credit profiling 1bn consumers spanning 4 countries - Vietnam, Indonesia, India & the Philippines - and building a platform for the wider industry and the financial services industry in particular to provide the 'un & under' served access to credit. At the core of this initiative has been our strict and unwavering adherence to the norms of consumer data privacy and consumer data rights.  But we're not satisfied as we embark on the next leg of our journey to deliver 100 million credit lines to consumers in the markets where we operate. Although this goal is ambitious, we truly believe that by harnessing the power of AI & Big Data we can deliver financial access at unprecedented scale.  As a firm, we're audacious problem solvers motivated by our impact on society. We deeply espouse the values of ownership - of our actions and initiatives, integrity in all we do and agility in execution.  We place great importance on doing what is right, what is best and what is innovative. And we are seeking people to champion these values and beliefs as we grow. Trusting Social is looking for 2 Big Data Engineers. If you are smart, driven and want to make a difference in the world with the most advanced and fascinating technology, come join our team. We can satisfy your desire to explore new territory and give you the runway to really make an impact.  What You Will Do  A Data engineer in TrustingSocial works on the data pipeline infrastructure that is veritably the backbone of our business. In a day's job you would be writing elegant functional SCALA code to crunch TBs of data on Hadoop clusters, mostly using Spark. In a week's job, you would be owning a data pipeline deployment to clusters : on-prem or on-cloud (AWS or GCP or more). In a month's job, you would be managing Hadoop clusters right from security to reliability to HA. Did we mention we are building a pluggable,unified data-lake from scratch? Time to time you have new challenges for automating and scaling tasks for Data science team. We constantly look to improve our framework and pipelines, hence learning on the job is sort of a given. This is the big picture of our big data system. Our expertise and requirements include but are not limited to Spark, Scala, HDFS, Yarn, Hive, Kafka, Distributed Systems, Python, Datastores (Relational and NoSql) and Airflow.  What You Need To Have  Experienced with Java/Scala (Python is a plus). Experienced with Big Data stacks: Hadoop, Spark (Must have), etc. Knowledge of various ETL techniques and frameworks, such as Spark, Yarn, Airflow, Oozie, etc. Understanding of distributed computing principles Experience with NoSQL databases. Experience with various messaging systems, such as Kafka or RabbitMQ  What You Will Get  Opportunity to work and learn from one of the best and brightest technology teams in Vietnam Be part of a winning team with exponential growth regionally, experience recruiting world-class talents Top market rate pay Generous benefits: health insurance package for family, Free Food at the office - All Day, Grab for work allowance  Learn More About Us Here  Additional Info  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=inAEDGvOcL8&t=29s Show more Show less"]

title: [RDM1] System Engineer with SCCM skill
description: ["Providing Incident and Service request support to customer such:\xa0Client Deletion, Container Creation/Modification, Parameter Setting, Site change through SCCM System Software Management – software configuration and deployment by automating the processes of installing Patch Management – Provide Unified patch management for all Delivery Locations Image Management – Task Sequence creation Process & Troubleshooting Image Deployment Issues Driver Management – Install and troubleshooting Troubleshooting – SCCM Client/ Agent troubleshooting, Application software, Patch & OS Deployment issues from server side as well as client side. ITIL based Ticket handling and documentation   Qualifications   Hands on experience in installing Drivers, Software Applications, Manual installing of OS image using SCCM Deep Knowledge in\xa0Active directory Structure Good Knowledge in\xa0Windows, Linux \xa0system administration Experience in handling large roll outs of software and patches to clients Experience in routine administration, troubleshoot distribution server issues and maintenance activities in SCCM environment Knowledge in Incident/ change & Problem Management Knowledge on service management ticketing tools such as BMC Remedy, HP Service management, JIRA etc. Excellent written and oral communication in English language ITIL certified is an advantage   Additional Information    Why BOSCH?    Because we don't just follow trends, we create them.    Because together we turn ideas into reality, working every day to make the world of tomorrow a better place. Do you have high standards when it comes to your job? So do we. At Bosch, you will discover more than just work.    Benefits and Career Opportunities    Working in one of the Best Places to Work in Vietnam Join a dynamic and fast growing global company (English-speaking environment) 13th-month salary bonus + attractive performance bonus (you'll love it!) + annual performance appraisal 100% monthly basic salary and mandatory social insurances in 2-month probation Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments 15++ days of annual leave + 1 day of birthday leave Premium health insurance for employee and 02 family members Flexible working time Lunch and parking allowance Various training on hot-trend technologies/ foreign language (English/Chinese/Japanese) and soft-skills Fitness & sport activities: football, badminton, yoga, Aerobic Free in-house entertainment facilities and snack Join in various team building, company trip, year-end party, tech talks and a lot of charity events Show more Show less"]
