title: Magento Developer
description: ['<Mô tả công việc>  1. Phát triển các tính năng mới trên hệ thống phần mềm nền tảng Magento  – Tham gia thiết kế và phát triển các ứng dụng web trên nền tảng magento 2  – Phát triển các tính năng mới đáp ứng yêu cầu người dùng.  – Phối hợp với nhân sự trong nhóm để phân tích, thiết kế phần mềm ..  2. Duy trì hệ thống phần mềm  – Đảm bảo vận hành liên tục các hệ thống phần mềm được giao.  – Đảm bảo vận hành thông suốt các kết nối giữa các hệ thống phần mềm.  – Phối hợp các bộ phận trong khối CNTT đảm bảo an toàn thông tin các hệ thống được giao.  – Phối hợp các bộ phận chuyên môn kiểm soát dữ liệu hệ thống     <Yêu cầu công việc>  Tốt nghiệp Cao đẳng hoặc tương đương trở lên, Chuyên ngành CNTT Tối thiểu 1-3 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí tương đương Có kiến thức tốt về Ngôn ngữ lập trình PHP, đặc biệt là Magento 2, thành thạo HTML/CSS, Git, Rest API, Mysq Có kinh nghiệm về Modunlar Developement, quen thuộc với kiến trúc MVC, có kiến thức vững về lập trình hướng đối tượng  <Quyền lợi chung>  Thử việc: 02 tháng, hưởng 100% lương và toàn bộ phụ cấp Thời gian làm việc: 44h/tuần (WFH các buổi sáng thứ 7/tháng) Ngày nghỉ:- 12 ngày Nghỉ phép theo Luật định + tối đa\xa006 ngày nghỉ phép cân bằng cuộc sống (có hưởng 100% lương)/năm Phúc lợi:- Thu nhập dựa trên nguyên tắc “cạnh tranh, công bằng, hợp lý” và dựa trên kết quả công việc của cá nhân, Thử việc hưởng nguyên lương – Thưởng: Thưởng hiệu quả công việc (OKR), thưởng kết quả kinh doanh, thưởng ý kiến sáng kiến, thưởng thành tích vượt trội, thưởng thâm niên…, Phụ cấp khác :- Phụ cấp ăn trưa; – Các chế độ khác: Quà tặng dịp Lễ Tết lên đến 4tr/năm, Nghỉ cân bằng công việc & cuộc sống (6 ngày/năm), khám sức khỏe định kỳ, ưu đãi mua hàng,… – Tham gia các chương trình Teambuilding Phát triển đội ngũ, happy hour, Hội CANIFA Vì cộng đồng, CLB Bóng đá, Hội khuyến học …  Địa điểm làm viêc: 170 La Thành, Đống Đa, Hà Nội  Show more Show less']

title: Web Developer
description: ['I) Mô Tả Công Việc  • Tham gia xây dựng ứng dụng Web bao gồm Web phục vụ cho khách hàng và Web phụ vụ cho nhân viên.  • Cải tiến và nâng cao hiệu suất của các hệ thống Web hiện tại.  • Nghiên cứu và áp dụng một số công nghệ Web hiện đại vào các dự án.\xa0\xa0  II) Yêu Cầu Công Việc  • Trình độ Đại học – Chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin  • Sử dụng thành thạo HTML5, CSS3, Javascript. Biết Typescript, Tailwindcss là một lợi thế.  • Hiểu được các khái niệm về SPA, SSR. Có khả năng xây dựng ứng dụng bằng Reactjs, Nextjs. Biết về React Saga, Material-UI\xa0là một lợi thế.  • Sử dụng thành thạo Git,VsCode.  • Ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm liên quan.  III) Lương: thỏa thuận  IV) Phúc lợi  • Phụ cấp ăn trưa  • Thưởng: Thưởng tháng 13 và Thưởng theo KPI  • Team building  • Khám sức khỏe định kì  • Bảo hiệm tự nguyện ACB care  • Cho vay lãi suất ưu đãi.  • Thưởng sinh nhật, lễ, Tết…..  • Hỗ trợ chi phí đào tạo.  V) Địa điểm và thời gian làm việc  • Địa điểm: 107N Trương định, P.6, Q.3  • Thời gian làm việc: thứ 2- thứ 5 ( từ 8:00 - 17:00)  Show more Show less']

title: Junior Devops
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['The key responsibilities you will take: Overseeing the devops team day to day Striving to automate our CI/CD pipeline, from development to deployment and release flow. This also includes automating tests, code analysis, and reports. Exploring new technology standards to perfect our devops cycle Managing our infrastructure including servers, security rules, networking Envisioning and deploying cloud monitoring, logging and alerting solutions to ensure continuous operation of our products Maintaining good documentation of our infrastructure, deployment of services, configurations, and change logs. Collaboration with other teams for operational issues Desired experiences + years in DevOps position for Web & Mobile product companies Strong understanding of software development life cycle, continuous integration and delivery methodologies, automation and testing Strong understanding of networking, operating systems and related security requirements Familiar with Java ecosystems, monitoring and optimizing the JVM Experience with build tools such as Gradle, Maven, concepts like artifact repositories, automation tools such as Ansible. Experience with build/continuous integration tools such as Jenkins and GitLab. Full proficiency with Git. Having open source experience on GitHub is a plus. Experience in setting up monitoring and log collecting systems, for example, ELK stack, fluentd, Nagios, etc... Experience with using containers in both development and production setup. Knowing tools such as Kubernetes, Docker Swarm, or microservice architect is a plus. Why you’ll love to work with us  Bi-annually bonus  Training subsidy for your IT and English courses (10.000.000/year)  UNIC healthcare and full-salary based insurance  Flexible working hours  Annual company trips Oversea, VN  Regular sport and outing events to keep everyone energized and relaxed  Flexi-claims program to cover that lovely gift you always wanted (3.000.000/year)  Well-stocked pantry with snack customized to your liking  Personal laptop allowance (25.000.000)  14 days annual leave + 1 happy birthday + 3 sick leave  Micro bonus for great things you do daily Show more Show less']

title: Blockchain Developer
description: ['1. Mô tả công việc: - Tham gia thiết kế, xây dựng và phát triển dự án Blockchain với vai trò Lập trình viên chính - Học hỏi, nghiên cứu, tìm kiếm các công nghệ mới - Hỗ trợ, phối hợp với các bộ phận khác đảm bảo hoàn thành công việc đúng tiến độ  2. Quyền lợi khi làm việc: - Nhận mức lương hấp dẫn up to 2000$ theo năng lực - Thử việc hưởng 100% lương - Lương tháng 13, Thưởng dự án hàng Quý (Package 14 - 15 tháng lương/năm) - Lộ trình thăng tiến rõ ràng (review tăng lương 2 lần/năm) - Làm việc 5 ngày/tuần (nghỉ thứ 7, chủ nhật) - Làm việc trong môi trường năng động, đội ngũ nhân viên trẻ nhiệt huyết - Nhiều hoạt động bonding gắn kết nhân sự hàng tháng, Teambuilding 2 lần/năm, Quỹ thưởng liên hoan team/division hàng Quý, Happy hour mỗi ngày - Quản lý Support kịp thời và hướng dẫn tận tình. - Cơ hội tham gia vào ban điều hành Division và hưởng cơ chế thưởng cao theo kết quả kinh doanh của Division (Package min 16 tháng lương/năm)  3. Yêu cầu: - Có từ 1 năm kinh nghiệm lập trình Blockchain - Thành thạo 1 trong các ngôn ngữ: NodeJs, Solidity - Nắm vững kiến thức lập trình hướng đối tượng (OOP) - Sử dụng thành thạo ít nhất một hệ quản trị cơ sở dữ liệu: MySQL, MariaDB, PostgreSQL - Có khả năng đọc hiểu tài liệu bằng tiếng Anh - Kỹ năng tư duy logic và thuật toán tốt, phân tích và giải quyết vấn đề  🏠 Để ứng tuyển: Ứng viên gửi CV về địa chỉ email: trang.trinhthu@powergatesoftware.net Với tiêu đề: [Vị trí ứng tuyển] - Họ tên ứng viên Show more Show less']

title: [EDA5] Embedded System Engineer (C++, Matlab, UML)
description: ["Do you want beneficial technologies being shaped by your ideas? Whether in the areas of mobility solutions, consumer goods, industrial technology or energy and building technology – with us, you will have the chance to improve quality of life all across the global.    About us    We are on a mission to turn the latest technology into outstanding Bosch products and services. Advanced Driver Assistance Systems (ADAS) brings intelligent solutions to enrich driving experience with greater comfort and safety.    When you are the kind of person with deep software engineering background and a passion to ‘make it happen’, let us have a more detailed connect    - As a System Engineer you are key player in system design and implementation of ADAS functionalities    - You will contribute in architectural design and technical analysis of the system    - You will be responsible to interact with customer to build system specifications    - You will play a key role in function development and enable other function developers to use your framework in development    - You will have an opportunity to analyze real life problem scenarios on the vehicle and contribute innovative ideas to find resolutions      Qualifications    Education: Graduate or Masters in Computer Science / Electrical and Electronics or an equivalent engineering discipline    Mandatory skills:    Good design experience and hands on experience of designing tools (Enterprise architect , UML diagrams etc) Experience with Matlab-Simulink modelling Good programming, debugging and problem solving skills (C, C++ language) Experience of ECU communication protocols (e.g. CAN) Experience in requirements elicitation and requirements analysis Good knowledge in basic electronics and microprocessors Problem solving skills  Optional skills:    Experience with database management tools e.g. DOORS, requirements base lining, change request handling Good experience in multiple stakeholder handling for Requirements Engineering Good overview and understanding of project life cycle and involved activities like customer requirements management, internal requirements, change request process and change request management Experience with configuration management tools (e.g. MKS) Experience in automotive domain  Soft skills:    Good analytical & communication skills Good customer interaction and technical presentation skills Strong\xa0coordination, organization, teaming and problem-solving abilities Good English written and verbal communication. Having exposure with Chinese / Japanese language would be an added advantage   Additional Information    Why BOSCH?    Because we don't just follow trends, we create them.    Because together we turn ideas into reality, working every day to make the world of tomorrow a better place. Do you have high standards when it comes to your job? So do we. At Bosch, you will discover more than just work.    Benefits and Career Opportunities    Working in one of the Best Places to Work in Vietnam Join a dynamic and fast-growing global company (English-speaking environment) 13th-month salary bonus + attractive performance bonus (you'll love it!) + annual performance appraisal 100% monthly basic salary and mandatory social insurances in 2-month probation Premium health insurance for employee and 02 family members Flexible working time 15++ days of annual leave + 1 day of birthday leave Lunch and parking allowance Various training on hot-trend technologies/ foreign language (English/Chinese/Japanese) and soft-skills Onsite opportunities: short-term and long-term assignments Opportunity to work in global projects of fast developing company and being a part of innovation team contributing initiative ideas to the hi-tech world. Engage in our diverse training programs which surely help strengthen both your personal and professional skills Clear career path for employee from fresher to expert , project management and line management Fairness and trust working environment Safety environment is the 1st focus of company \xa0for current Covid situation – can work from home. Show more Show less"]

title: Python Developer
description: ['Mô tả công việc  Tham gia phát triển các dự án Tham gia phát triển hệ thống quản lý. Thực hiện và phối hợp công việc theo nhóm dưới sự phân công của quản lý dự án.  Yêu cầu ứng viên  Yêu cầu bắt buộc:  Có hiểu biết cơ bản về cơ sở dữ liệu và hệ thống. Có kiến thức về lập trình hướng đối tượng. Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với ngôn ngữ lập trình Python từ 1- 4 năm. Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với cơ sở dữ liệu No-SQL: MongoDB, Cassandra, ElasticSearch,… Có kiến thức HTML, Javascript, CSS là 1 lợi thế.  Yêu cầu khác:  Có khả năng đọc hiểu tài liệu tiếng Anh. Có tư duy lập trình tốt, khả năng nắm bắt nhanh công nghệ. Có khả năng phối hợp theo nhóm tốt. Năng động, sáng tạo, nhiệt tình và chịu được áp lực cao trong công việc.  Quyền lợi  Mức lương: Từ 12 - 27 triệu/tháng (Tuỳ kinh nghiệm và kỹ năng làm việc); Package lương: 13 tháng lương cố định/năm, thưởng hiệu quả chung vào cuối năm (tuỳ tình hình kinh doanh hằng năm). Có cơ hội được đánh giá điều chỉnh thu nhập 1-2 lần/năm; Chế độ đãi ngộ cạnh tranh:\xa0 Chế độ thai sản đặc biệt cho nhân viên ( 20 triệu/1 CBNV sinh con);\xa0 Đóng bảo hiểm sức khoẻ hàng năm (Bảo hiểm VBI 4 – 8 triệu/CBNV/năm);\xa0 Chính sách đào tạo từ 10 – 15 triệu/CBNV/năm;\xa0 Chế độ thăm hỏi ốm đau, hiếu hỉ, du lịch, các ngày lễ, các hoạt động tri ân, chăm lo đời sống tinh thần nhân viên và thân nhân;\xa0 Đóng bảo hiểm y tế, bảo hiểm xã hội theo quy định của Nhà nước….; Môi trường làm việc: Chuyên nghiệp, thân thiện, cởi mở, tạo điều kiện phát triển cho CBNV; có cơ hội được làm việc cùng với những đồng nghiệp có nhiều năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực công nghệ. Show more Show less']

title: Remote (Full-time) - Frontend Developer
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ["INTRODUCTION a. About Fetch: Fetch Technology Vietnam is a comprehensive global provider of HR and Talent Acquisition Services, focusing primarily on the technology fields. Founded in 2016, Fetch Technology Vietnam helps foreign companies of all types and sizes reach their potential by providing the talent and support to efficiently build and scale a high-performing, distributed workforce in Vietnam. Our mission is to offer Vietnam’s most talented technologists a platform to connect with some of the world’s leading tech companies and build their expertise on a global scale. Over 4 years, Fetch has built a good reputation and is trusted by many Vietnamese and foreign companies; And Fetch will continue its good work to bridge the divide between the World and the Vietnam Tech sector. b. About our client At this company, they believe that the future of healthcare is online and at home rather than in the clinic or in the pharmacy. They run two specialised digital health brands that make good healthcare accessible and affordable for all. Meet A and B — the telemedicine platforms of the 21st century. About A & B A is Singapore’s first digital men’s health platform. It’s an inclusive, discreet space that provides treatment for stigmatized yet common conditions in sexual health, aesthetics, and overall well-being. B is a supportive and judgment-free platform that empowers women to take charge of their overall well-being, including everything from sexual health to aesthetics, hair and mental health. RESPONSIBILITIES They are hiring a front\xadend engineer to help build the most iconic digital men’s clinic in Southeast Asia and reach our beautiful potential. The mission is to provide men with a safe haven for all things men’s health, whether it’s making discreet, affordable, and convenient alternatives to receiving treatment more accessible to men, or raising awareness and acceptance of some of the more private conditions that men may feel embarrassed about. You’ll be involved in building the most ambitious digital healthcare platform in the region. You will work with the marketing team to create marketing assets (e.g. landing pages on web flow and marketing emails) REQUIREMENT At least 2-\xad3 years experience in frontend development Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, SASS, and Javascript/Typescript. Good English communication. Startup experience. You will have a huge passion for startups and fast\xad growing teams. You will have been part of the journey of a successful startup. WHY YOU‘LL LOVE WORKING HERE They are made up of a bunch of creatives, entrepreneurs and tech-\xaddriven individuals. They’re far from the straight\xadlaced corporates that you might imagine pulling the strings behind healthcare companies. They represent a new breed of healthcare companies, at the forefront of revolutionizing how people receive medical treatment. They were founded in the midst of COVID\xad19, and in a matter of 6 months, they've grown to thousands of patients and hit over 7 figures in Annual Run Rate. They have also been featured on Augustman, FM91.3, Vulcan Post, e27, etc. They see themselves continuing to grow to all new heights and therefore are looking for someone with the skills to help us meet the technological demands that come with it. You will be joining a young startup in a growth phase and you will also be working remotely (they don't intend to get an office anytime soon). This means a couple of things: Flexible schedule. You will have a more flexible schedule but you will also have to be prepared to fight fires at odd hours when you least expect. Pull your own weight.There'll be no hand-\xadholding and they expect you to pull your own weight \xad like everyone else. Things get messy. There's no sugarcoating this. Things are unstructured and processes might be lacking. They're not where they want to be but they're getting there. You must be able to thrive in ambiguous situations (see point above). You are willing to put in the time to get the most out of any opportunity. Building a strong team is key in our ambition to thrive as a company, as co\xad-workers, and as individuals. Therefore, they are looking for someone similarly dedicated and passionate, willing to put their best foot forward (go all stakes in) and take pride in what they do, because they do too. If you are interested in joining us at this point in our journey and are someone who enjoys sticking their hands in the dirt and putting in the work to see something grow, then you’re one of us. Show more Show less"]

title: Nhân Viên PHP
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC  Phát triển các sản phẩm của Công ty. Xây dựng và phát triển các dự án web, app theo yêu cầu Xây dựng, bảo trì, nâng cấp các website trong hệ thống của công ty bằng ngôn ngữ PHP & cở sở dữ liệu MySQL. Lập trình và phát triển ứng dụng web, web service trên nền tảng PHP, MySQL Tham gia phân tích và phát triển hệ thống trên nền ứng dụng web; phần mềm Phối hợp với các thành viên khác, đảm bảo chất lượng sản phẩm. Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ khác do Leader/PM giao. Có thể độc lập xử lý các sản phẩm của cty cũng như tham gia cùng với team. YÊU CẦU ỨNG VIÊN Thành thạo ngôn ngữ PHP (từ 1 năm kinh nghiệm trở lên) Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các framework của PHP như: Laravel, CakePHP, FuelPHP. Thành thạo về xử lý HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery. Kỹ năng làm việc nhóm, chịu áp lực cao. Có kỹ năng tổ chức, quản lý công việc; tự nghiên cứu, xây dựng và quản lý tài liệu kỹ thuật. Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với CSDL (Oracle, MS SQL Server,My SQL,PostgreSQL,..). Có kĩ năng đọc hiểu và viết tiếng Anh. Tư duy lập trình tốt, có kỹ năng phân tích giải quyết vấn đề. Có kỹ năng làm việc theo nhóm, chịu được áp lực trong công việc và tinh thần trách nhiệm. CHÍNH SÁCH ĐÃI NGỘ Thu nhập thỏa thuận theo năng lực Làm việc trong môi trường trẻ chuyên nghiệp, năng động. Được hướng dẫn trực tiếp bởi đội ngũ lập trình dày dặn kinh nghiệm Tham gia bảo hiểm và các chính sách theo Quy định chung của nhà nước Thời gian làm việc trong tuần từ T2 – T6 (9:00 AM – 5:30PM) và T7 đầu tiên của tháng (9:00AM – 12:00PM) Có lộ trình thăng tiến rõ ràng Có 2 ngày phép trong quá trình thử việc. Chế độ phúc lợi: Du lịch, dã ngoại, nghỉ lễ,… Show more Show less']

title: AWS Operation Engineer
description: ['Company Description  Do you want to take your career to the next level and be part of one of Northern Europe’s most successful IT Companies?  Netcompany is one of Northern Europe’s most successful IT Companies. Besides our office in Vietnam we have offices in Denmark, Norway, UK, Poland and Netherland. Globally Netcompany employs more than 3000 of the most skilled IT Consultants and Developers.     Job Description  Netcompany is currently looking for an AWS Operations Engineer to join our international Operations team, which is a part of Netcompany Operations, on a permanent basis. You will join our strong and dedicated team based in Ho Chi Minh City, where you will have the opportunity to work closely with skilled colleagues in Vietnam, as well as our colleagues in Europe.     You will become part of an ambitious team, which ensures our operation and support of client solutions as well as internal systems.     Your daily work will contain:  Designing, implementing, and maintaining AWS infrastructure. Participating in project work, as a part of development cycle, providing high level of availability of applications and systems based on SLA requirements Reporting internally on tasks, activities, and SLA goals. Responding to customer requests, change management cycle, incidents etc. based on ITIL practices.     Qualifications     Are you experienced, ambitious and ready to take your career to the next level?  As a minimum, you must have the following technical competencies:  Knowledge of AWS and other Cloud Solutions Experience with setting up and maintaining cloud infrastructure Good knowledge of best practices in cloud infrastructure Good understanding of Cloud Security principles You need to be proficient in English, both written and spoken     It is also important that you:  Have an IT-related Degree Are able to plan and manage your time Have the ability to create technical documentation Have at least two years of working experience Have the ability to present your ideas to others Have a great customer service mindset  It will be a plus if you have experience with Linux.     As a person you are:  Independent and self-driven, you are ready to take responsibility from day one. You’re also a great team player, ready to go the extra mile for your colleagues. You like to be up to date with new technologies and knowledge-sharing is important for you. You are structured, able to organize your time and document your work.     Are you hooked?  The start date is as soon as possible, and we hold ongoing interviews. If you have not received an answer to your questions, you are always welcome to contact us via recruitment.vn@netcompany.com.     In Netcompany we believe that a diverse and inclusive workplace is central to our success, which is why all qualified candidates are invited to apply regardless of gender, sexual orientation, disability, age, religion and belief, ethnic background, nationality, gender identity or culture. We are committed to live out a culture where we provide equal opportunities for all.  Show more Show less']

title: Python Developer (All Levels)
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['Công ty TLTEK là Công ty Công nghệ trực thuộc Tập đoàn Thanh Long - Tập đoàn hàng đầu Việt Nam trong lĩnh vực Xây dựng - Logistics - Phân phối VLXD. Trong suốt quá trình hoạt động, TLTEK luôn nỗ lực với mục tiêu cao nhất là mang lại sự hài lòng cho khách hàng thông qua những dịch vụ, sản phẩm và giải pháp công nghệ tối ưu nhất. TLTEK sẽ tiên phong cung cấp dịch vụ chuyển đổi số toàn diện cho các tổ chức, doanh nghiệp trong lĩnh vực VLXD trên thị trường Việt Nam.  Mô Tả Công Việc  Thiết kế, phát triển và bảo trì các ứng dụng Python theo kiến trúc Micro-services. Phát triển các API Services với Python. Phân tích, thiết kế dự án, phân tích nghiệp vụ và triển khai các quy trình phát triển dự án cho phần mềm ERP. Mở rộng, cải thiện và sửa lỗi phần mềm hiện có. Tham gia thảo luận kỹ thuật, công nghệ và xây dựng kiến trúc dự án cùng với đội nhóm. Tham gia lên kế hoạch công việc cho đội nhóm. Nghiên cứu công nghệ mới và tích hợp vào phần mềm.  Thời gian làm việc: 9h00 - 18h00 (Thứ 2 - Thứ 6).  Yêu Cầu Công Việc  Có kinh nghiệm về Python framework. Có kiến thức tốt về HTML/CSS/Javascript. Có kiến thức xây dựng hệ thống bằng kiến trúc Micro-services. Có kiến thức tốt về Python, OOP. Có kinh nghiệm quản lý source code bằng Git.  Kinh nghiệm điểm cộng  Chủ động và tích cực trong công việc để đưa ra những ý kiến cải tiến phần mềm. Sẵn sàng học cái mới. Có kinh nghiệm lead dự án là một lợi thế. Có kiến thức về DevOps như Docker, Kubernetes, Google Cloud, AWS là một lợi thế. Có kinh nghiệm tham gia dự án về ERP là một lợi thế. Có khả năng đọc hiểu tiếng anh là một điểm cộng. Có kinh nghiêm và kiến thức tốt về Odoo, ORM, Postgresql là một điểm cộng.  Tools  Agile/Scrum Gitlab  Phúc lợi  Cơ hội thăng tiến, phát triển, ổn định. Mức lương cạnh tranh và hấp dẫn - từ $600 - $3000 hoặc thương lượng theo năng lực Môi trường trẻ trung, năng động, thú vị kết hợp giữa hệ thống truyền thống và công nghệ. Có nhiều trải nghiệm và được làm việc với những người giỏi hàng đầu trong lĩnh vực bán lẻ, phân phối, logistics. Được hưởng đầy đủ chính sách theo quy định: BHXH, BHYT, các phúc lợi khác theo luật. Xét tăng lương, chế độ du lịch hàng năm, mức tăng lương thưởng tùy theo năng lực nhân viên và sự tăng trưởng của công ty. Môi trường với nhiều thử thách thú vị, đồng nghiệp trẻ, khoẻ mạnh. Free lunch và nhiều quyền lợi khác  Địa điểm làm việc  Công ty công nghệ TLTEK Địa Chỉ: Lô 17/II Đường 2F, Xã Vĩnh Lộc A, Huyện Bình Chánh, TP.HCM (Gần sân bay).  Cách thức ứng tuyển  Apply Online hoặc gửi CV về địa chỉ: hr@tltek.io Show more Show less']

title: DevOps Engineer

title: System Analyst (Java/Spring Boot/Microservices Architecture/Adobe Forms and Sites), Digital Bank
description: ["About UOB  United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand, as well as branches and offices.  Our history spans more than 80 years. Over this time, we have been guided by our values — Honorable, Enterprising, United and Committed. This means we always strive to do what is right, build for the future, work as one team and pursue long-term success. It is how we work, consistently, be it towards the company, our colleagues or our customers.  UOB Innovation Hub 2 (InnoHub 2) is a newly set up technology centre located in Kuala Lumpur as part of UOB Group Technology and Operations to deliver innovative financial technology solutions that enable business growth and technology transformation.  Job Responsibilities  You will be responsible for managing the end-to-end software development and support for Customer Management and Compliance (which could be projects, quarterly change requests, L3 production fixes). This includes analysis and design to development, implementation, testing and support.  As the production support team lead, you will also be responsible for quality assurance of the team delivery in conformance to the Bank-defined software delivery methodology and tools. You will partner closely with the Customer Management and Compliance leads to plan and manage transitioned deliverables.  Other Responsibilities Include  Other responsibilities include:  Analyse user requirements and convert requirements to design documents Evaluate and analyse existing interactions and processes to identify potential downstream impacts Create technical documents for the end to end solution design with accurate details and clear indication of system dependencies Work closely with Solution Architects and developers and drive application design sessions Communicate complex technical issues to business users in a language they understand Participate in Sprint Planning activities and conduct Defect Triage Test, maintain and recommend software improvements to ensure strong functionality and optimization Work with developers to conduct root cause analysis of issues, review new and existing code and/or perform unit testing Execute continuous service improvement and process improvement plans Ensure complete documentation with full traceability and change management  About The Department  The Technology and Operations function is comprised of five teams of specialists with distinct capabilities: business partnership, technology, operations, risk governance and planning support and services. We work closely together to harness the power of technology to support our physical and digital banking services and operations. This includes developing, centralising and standardising technology systems as well as banking operations in Singapore and overseas branches.  Job Requirements  At least 5 years’ experience in software development, preferably in digital banking Minimum 1 year of experience in driving technical/systems requirements lifecycle, from abstract product vision to detailed system requirements Strong business and technology knowledge in retail banking, credit/debit cards, ATM and payment systems as well as internet and mobile banking domains Proficient in end to end solution design and technical documentation Experience in development, preferably full stack with experience in React, Java, Spring Boot and microservices architecture Familiarity with web content management systems, Adobe Experience Manager Forms and Sites and/or TeamSite would be good to have Strong analytical skills and detail-oriented Able to analyse and verify that user requirements are technically feasible, and suggest alternatives or improvements Experience in Agile practices Strong communication skills to communicate with both business users and technical teams Experience in troubleshooting issues and defects, performing root cause analysis and providing solutions Experience in service management/production support  Be a part of UOB Family  UOB is an equal opportunity employer. UOB does not discriminate on the basis of a candidate's age, race, gender, color, religion, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, or other non-merit factors. All employment decisions at UOB are based on business needs, job requirements and qualifications. If you require any assistance or accommodations to be made for the recruitment process, please inform us when you submit your online application.  Apply now and make a difference. Show more Show less"]

title: Infrastructure Engineer
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
job_function: Information Technology, Product Management, and Engineering
description: ['Job Description:  Life at Grab  At Grab, every Grabber is guided by The Grab Way, which spells out our mission, how we believe we can achieve it, and our operating principles - the 4Hs: Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility. These principles guide and help us make decisions as we work to create economic empowerment for the people of Southeast Asia.  Get to know the Team  The Foundations team is a new team team responsible for cloud engineering and developer tools at Grab. We make an impact by building the automation and tooling that enable our platform and development teams to effectively and securely operate. Our team is made up of devops and infrastructure engineers. If you are looking for cloud infrastructure, devops, or devsecops opportunities, then you should join our team!  Get to know the Role  We are looking for an engineer to automate management of cloud infrastructure and developer tooling. We believe a successful candidate has experience with one or more cloud environments, knowledge of devops concepts and practices, some scripting/coding ability and ideally some experience working in platform or CI/CD teams delivering functionality to developers, but if you believe you have what it takes then we’d love to hear from you either way. This role is required because we have a large developer community and an ever more sophisticated set of tools and automation requirements. In return, you will get an opportunity to expand your skills into a number of different areas - from systems administration through to backend coding, integration with vendor systems, cloud automation and security, SRE and more.  The Day-to-Day Activities:  You are responsible for automating common cloud operations - account/subscription creation and management You spend time with security ensuring that their needs are built into automated guardrails for developer resources You support the developer community in their needs, always with a view to self-service and automation where possible You are responsible for the roll-out of new cross-cutting technologies - container clusters and service mesh, secrets management, monitoring and logging solutions and more You are involved in the design and implementation of new configurations for cloud resource use You bring a knowledge of new ways of doing things and can clearly articulate technical solutions both within and outside the team  The Must-Haves:  You have Heart, Hunger, Honour and Humility You have experience with one or more cloud environments (AWS, Azure preferred) You are an experienced DevOps or DevSecOps practitioner, and have operated production services in cloud environments You have experience with build and deploy tooling - jenkins, spinnaker, and similar You have experience with automation for infrastructure deploy/manage - terraform, cloudformation, resource manager or similar You can easily pick up new technologies and are keen to expand your knowledge You have experience with micro-service architectures  Our Commitment  We are committed to building diverse teams and creating an inclusive workplace that enables all Grabbers to perform at their best, regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity or sexual orientation and other attributes that make each Grabber unique.  About Grab  Grab is the leading superapp platform in Southeast Asia, providing everyday services that matter to consumers. Today, the Grab app has been downloaded onto millions of mobile devices, giving users access to over 9 million drivers, merchants, and agents. Grab offers a wide range of on-demand services in the region, including mobility, food, package and grocery delivery services, mobile payments, and financial services across 428 cities in eight countries.  Join us today to drive Southeast Asia forward, together. Show more Show less']

title: Blockchain Developer
place: Hai Bà Trưng District, Hanoi, Vietnam
description: ["Jobs overview Midas Capital is a venture supports and invests in early-stage blockchain/cryptocurrency projects worldwide. We are looking for a Lead Blockchain Developer in our pursuit to build out a series of sniping bots for various decentralized crypto exchanges starting with either Uniswap or Pancakeswap. You'll have a lot of fun being here and enjoy being part of our teamwork-based culture and family-like atmosphere.     Your role & responsibilities Write crypto trading Bots (sniper bot, arbitrage bot, etc.) Able to develop and run a full node for the Bot\xa0     Your skills & qualifications Proven experience in different blockchain ecosystems Proven working experience with sniper BOT is a huge advantage Proficiency in English (especially reading); knowledge in cryptocurrency and blockchain are MUSTS Problem solving skills, good teamwork skills, ready to support other members of the Team Always ready to learn and update new technology     Benefits Very competitive Income: to be negotiated depending on capacity; Endless Personal Growth Opportunity; Dynamic working environment Being kept up to date with new products of Defi, Blockchain; Amazing Teammates: Working directly with the Portfolio Manager and receiving specialist knowledge is a great opportunity to lift your level up.\xa0     Location and Working time\xa0 Location:\xa0Park 11 Times City, Hai Ba Trung, Hanoi Working time: Monday - Saturday: 9.00 - 18.00 (work on Saturday biweekly)     \xa0Are you interested to join our team? Contact us right away! To apply, please send your CV to email: hr@midascapital.ventures with the title [CV_Dev]_Name Our website: https://midascapital.ventures Show more Show less"]

title: System Engineer (Vulnerability)
industries: IT Services and IT Consulting, Information Services, and Computer and Network Security
description: ["LINKBYNET is a leading provider of private and public cloud computing solutions, associated with full managed services.     Accenture (NYSE: ACN) has completed its acquisition of Linkbynet in Juy 2021,  Founded in 2000, Linkbynet is based in Saint-Denis, France, with additional offices in Belgium, Canada, China, France, Luxembourg, Mauritius, Singapore and Vietnam. The company’s team of more than 900 highly skilled professionals holds 400 certifications from major cloud providers such as Alibaba, Amazon, Google and Microsoft.     Linkbynet will further enhance the global capabilities of Accenture Cloud First. Powered by 70,000 cloud professionals and a $3 billion investment over the next three years, Accenture Cloud First group brings together unmatched depth and breadth of cloud expertise, industry cloud solutions, ecosystem partner capabilities, and assets that help clients realize greater value from cloud at speed and scale.  Job Description  1. Vulnerability remediation  Perform vulnerabilities remediation Ensure proper analysis and provides guidelines Anticipate obsolescence Identify the business impact Identify vulnerability exposure or potential exception  2. Apply SOC process  Vulnerability response Interaction between teams Exception management Customer notification and warning  3. Collaborate with SOC Analyst and report to TL  Provide accurate Vulnerability response plan Advise on remediation or exception Analyze and challenge input from SOC Analyst  4. ITIL V4 Foundation is a plus CISM or CISSP is a plus Cloud security related certification  Critical knowledge & skills including tools, software applications, language, etc.  Security: Familiar with scan tools report (Qualys, Splunk , etc…) § Vulnerability management Proficient in CyberSecurity governance Multidomain investigation: Comfortable on all OSI model and various OS Willing to develop skills on other domains. Communication skills: Present/defend ideas with multi-cultural awareness  Additional Information  Why you'll love being a part of this program:  Dynamic and young work force Great working environment (music band, gym, relax corners, PS4, Baby foot, ping-pong table etc.) 13-month salary Training and development opportunities Allowances (lunch, parking, OT, on-call etc.) Team activities (CSR, team buildings, company trips, monthly birthdays etc. Show more Show less"]

title: Junior PHP Development
description: ["Giới thiệu về chúng tôi:  UOYMedia là công ty chuyên về thiết kế và sản xuất các mặt hàng in ấn POD (Print On Demand) cho thị trường Châu Mỹ và Châu Âu. Your Skills and Experience     Tốt nghiệp chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin Có kinh nghiệm 1 - 2 năm về PHP, dự án WordPress, ưu tiên từng làm dự án về Woocommerce Có kiến thức về Web và Kiến trúc Ứng dụng Có kiến thức về các loại Database (MySQL, NoSQL, ...) Có khả năng học hỏi và phân tích hệ thống hiện có Kỹ năng khác: tiếng Anh, ham học hỏi, đã từng tham gia các dự án công nghệ thông tin ngắn hạn, có tư duy logic, giải quyết vấn đề tốt, ...  \xa0  Why You'll Love Working Here     Thưởng quý, thưởng lễ Tết Lương tháng 13 Cơ hội huấn luyện: Được đào tạo về chuyên môn nghiệp vụ và các kỹ năng mềm phục vụ công việc.\xa0 Trang bị máy tính và các trang thiết bị cần thiết để làm việc Môi trường làm việc thân thiện, đội ngũ nhân sự trẻ - năng động – đoàn kết – chuyên nghiệp. Có 12 ngày nghỉ phép và 10 ngày nghỉ lễ theo luật lao động Quà sinh nhật, quà kết hôn, phúng điếu, hỗ trợ khó khăn đột xuất. Hotline: 0905 95 05 89  Show more Show less"]

title: [HN/HCM] DevSecOps Engineer
description: ["1. Responsibilities  A. Continuous Delivery through DevSecOps Factory  - Build, map and optimize delivery of the Continuous Delivery Pipeline (CDP) by addressing key  elements like: process time, lead time, delay time and percent of complete and accurate and  visualize the progress of these process on kanban project.  - Continuous Exploration (CE) – understand the market problem / customer need by analysing and  researching to identify the solution required to meet that need, from which suggest development  of new features or modification from existing architectures, define and prioritize activities in the  Program Backlog.  - Continuous Integration (CI) – take features from the Program Backlog and implement them to  deliver a completed work which is committed to version control, built and integrated into a full  system or solution, and tested end• to• end before being validated in a staging environment.  Continuous Deployment (CD) - take the changes from the staging environment and deploy them  to production.  - Release on Demand (RoD) - make value available to customers all at once, or in a staggered  fashion based market and business needs.     B. DevSecOps Factory  - Build, automate, enhance and integrate threat modeling.  - Build, automate, enhance and integrate application security.  - Build, automate, enhance and integrate penetration testing.  - Build, automate, enhance and integrate continuous security monitoring.     C. Software Development  - Responsible for ensuring that the bank's digital platforms work well by managing back end site  database, performance issues, security and that the server, application and database communicate  with each other.  - Responsible for collaborating with business tribes to understand the needs and technical  requirement before building a web application.  - Responsible for the server• side web application logic and integration with front• end codes.  Collaborate with Front End and Backend Developers to design more functional and cohesive  codes to enhance DevOps / DevSecOps and customer experience.  - Responsible for driving the application lifecycle with a key focus in coding and debugging of  web applications based on feedback from testers and users.  - Compile and analyze data, process and codes to troubleshoot problems and identify areas for  improvement.     D. Software Documentation  - Work closely with tribe and squad members to translate business requirements into technical  design documents.  - Review and implement technical requirement documents by coding flowcharts, layouts,  diagrams, charts, code comments and guides for the program     2. Qualifications  - About 3+ years of relevant experience in DevOps/DevSecOps  - Experience with CI/CD, Kubernetes (K8s), Openshift, Docker, Ansible, Jenkins, GitLab, ... and deploying applications  - Experience with Cloud (AWS, GCP, Azure) is a plus  - Ability to learn/use a wide variety of open source technologies and tools     3. Contact  Ngô Linh Chi - IT Recruiter  Email: chinl.rpo@techcombank.com.vn  Mobile: 0981221292  Show more Show less"]

title: DevOps Engineer ~ $3500 gross (open for remote from HN and DN areas)
description: ["LeapXpert, the enterprise-grade responsible business communication platform, provides organizations peace of mind by creating an accessible digital record of all business interactions carried out over mobile messaging applications.     LeapXpert's Federated Messaging Orchestration Platform (FMOPTM) is an interoperable, mobile-first solution that provides unparalleled visibility into data from instant messaging applications, as well as governance and control. This enables enterprises to embrace a customer-centered approach while maintaining professional conduct and ensuring compliance.     We are proud to have achieved some of the most prestigious awards in the regulatory and fintech industries. And to take it further, we need to find our best teammates!     RESPONSIBILITIES:  After joining our team, your main responsibility is to deploy, automate, maintain and manage the production system to ensure high levels of availability, performance and scalability. This involves:  ● Develop an automation pipeline to support the CI/CD process.  ● Deploy and monitor the infrastructure of our services on various cloud platforms.  ● Lead initiatives for upgrading the systems to improve security, availability, reliability and  performance.  ● Work closely with the development team by rapidly deploying instances, monitoring  operating efficiencies, and responding as needs arise.  ● Suggesting architecture improvements, recommending process improvements.  ● Evaluate new technology options and vendor products.  ● Ensuring critical system security through the use of best in class cloud security solutions.     YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCES:  At least 3+ years of experience as a DevOps Engineer, together with the below:     Must-have:  ● Experience with DBA or data management (ideally in Cloud environment)  ● Experience with Kubernetes  ● Hand-on experience in administration of AWS, GCP or Azure infrastructure, optimizing  instance types, autoscaling group and multi-region networking.     Good-to-have:  ● Familiarity with CircleCI or other CI platform  ● Experience with Istio  ● Experience optimizing Docker images  ● Experience work with a distributed platform/ microservices  ● Experience with Helm  ● Experience with Terraform  ● Experience with Prometheus     As a team player:  ● Highly collaborative with fast actions and response  ● Commitment to perfection and continuous improvement  ● Agile methodologies  ● Good English communication.     YOU ARE LOOKING FOR:  ● An awesome job with an attractive remuneration package  ● Hybrid working model with flexible working time and place. Available office in Binh Thanh  District with good, comfortable environment and settings.  ● Friendly colleagues who support each other to win as a team  ● A flat, product-focused organization and Agile team to let you add your value and ideas to  the product and company  ● Opportunities to learn and be trained in applied new technologies and methodologies  ● Facing new and innovative challenges to deliver commercial-grade, world-class product  ● Career growth in multiple directions, based on your preferences and abilities     BENEFITS:  ● 13th Salary, paid pro-rata, every month to allow more flexible financial plans  ● 14 Annual Leaves  ● Full salary on probation  ● Fully social insurance according to Vietnam Labor Law  ● Premium Health Care Insurance  ● Annual health check and vaccination  ● Lunch and parking allowances  ● Team building, fun monthly, quarterly activities and so much more fun are waiting for you!  ● Relax with Table top foosball, Playstation, Massage Chair in the office  ● Annual Performance Review  ● Attractive career path  ● Flexible working time and place with a hybrid working model.  ● Personal Learning & Development Budget  ● Advanced technical solutions, agile culture and the opportunity to work with the latest  technologies  ● ESOP based on contribution     Feel fit? Come and work at LeapXpert!  Show more Show less"]

title: Lead Data Engineer
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
industries: Software Development, Internet Publishing, and Financial Services
description: ['Global Fashion Group (GFG) is the leading fashion and lifestyle retail destination in Asia Pacific, Latin America, and CIS. We connect over 10,000 global, local, and own brands to a market of more than one billion consumers through four established e-commerce platforms: THE ICONIC, ZALORA, dafiti and lamoda. Through an inspiring and seamless customer experience enabled by our own technology ecosystem and operational infrastructure, we are dedicated to being the #1 fashion and lifestyle destination in our markets. With 17 offices and 10 fulfilment centres across four continents, GFG proudly employs a dynamic and diverse team with deep local knowledge and expertise. In 2019, GFG delivered more than 34 million orders to over 13 million Active Customers.\xa0    ABOUT THE DATA TEAM    Our vision to bring affordable and sustainable fashion to customers in our markets is powered by technology and data. The GFG Data Team is an integral part of GFG and is essential to enabling a data-driven decision-making culture.\xa0    ABOUT THE ROLE\xa0    As the Lead Data Engineer in the Data team, you will be working on all aspects of Data, from Platform and Infra build out to pipeline engineering and writing tooling/services for augmenting and fronting the core platform. You will be responsible for building and maintaining the state-of-the-art data Life Cycle management platform, including acquisition, storage, processing and consumption channels. The team works closely with Data Scientists, Data Analytics, Business Intelligence and business stakeholders across the GFG in understanding and tailoring the offerings to their needs.    THE IMPACT YOU’LL MAKE    Build and manage the data asset using some of the most scalable and resilient open source big data technologies like Airflow, Spark, Kafka, etc Build and manage a highly scalable, efficient Data and ML Infrastructure by adopting microservices driven design and architecture with proper DevOps principles and practices Design and deliver the next-gen data lifecycle management suite of tools/frameworks, including ingestion and consumption on the top of the data lake to support real-time as well as batch use cases Help the team in integrating various data sources across GFGs group vertical Build and expose metadata catalog for the Data Lake for easy exploration, profiling as well as lineage requirements  WHAT WILL YOU BRING TO THE TEAM    At least 3+ years of relevant experience in developing scalable, secured, fault tolerant, resilient & mission-critical Big Data platform. Able to maintain and monitor the ecosystem with high availability. Must have sound understanding for all Big Data components & Administration Fundamentals. Hands-on in building a complete data platform using various open source technologies. Must have good fundamental hands-on knowledge of Linux and building big data stack on top of AWS/GCP using Kubernetes. Strong understanding of big data and related technologies like HDFS, Spark, Presto, Airflow, Kafka, Apache Atlas etc. Good knowledge of Complex Event Processing systems like Spark Streaming, Kafka, Apache Flink, Beam etc. Able to drive devops best practices like CI/CD, containerization, blue-green deployments, secrets management etc in the Data ecosystem. Able to develop an agile platform with auto scale capability up & down as well vertically and horizontally. Able to develop an observability and monitoring ecosystem for all the components in use in the data ecosystem. Proficiency in at least one of the programming languages Java, Scala, Python or Go.  WHAT WE OFFER YOU    The unique opportunity to have a serious impact on a growing organisation A dynamic working environment shaping the face of fashion e-commerce in growth markets Significant career growth opportunities in a fast-growing business, gain working exposure in the 20+ countries across the group Work closely with a global talent pool with international mindset\xa0  \xa0    Apply today and join GFG in this exciting role shaping the face of fashion e-commerce! \xa0    Global Fashion Group embraces diversity and equality of opportunity. We are committed to building an inclusive and diverse team representing all backgrounds, with as wide a range of perspectives as possible, and harnessing industry-leading skills. We believe that the more inclusive we are, the better our work will be. We welcome and consider applications to join our team from all qualified candidates, regardless of their characteristics. We comply with all applicable laws and regulations on non-discrimination in employment (and recruitment), as well as work authorization and employment eligibility verification requirements.    \xa0    Show more Show less']

title: World Online Admin Expert - Senior PHP Developer
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['Company Description  Are You Looking For a Fun Place to Work?  Join The Game!  Leader in the development and publishing of games, Gameloft® has established itself as one of the top innovators in its field since 2000. Gameloft creates games for all digital platforms, two of which are featured in the “Top 10 iOS Games by All-Time Worldwide Downloads” from App Annie. Gameloft operates its own established franchises such as Asphalt®, Order & Chaos, Modern Combat and Dungeon Hunter and also partners with major rights holders including Disney®, LEGO®, Universal, Illumination Entertainment, Marvel®, Hasbro®, Fox Digital Entertainment, Mattel® and Ferrari®. Gameloft distributes its games in over 100 countries and employs 4,600 people worldwide. Every month, 114 million unique users can be reached by advertisers in Gameloft games with Gameloft Advertising Solutions, a leading B2B offering dedicated to brands and agencies. Gameloft is a Vivendi company.  All trademarks referenced above are owned by their respective trademark owners.  Job Description  As a member of the Gameloft team, you will specialize in the development of internal libraries and tools that will be used worldwide by multiple departments in their day-to-day operational activities.  The team you will be joining, World Online Admin, is responsible for the development of both internal tools and systems used worldwide by multiple departments, and for operational activities that contribute to the stability of our central APIs.  Imagine that someone wants to reach millions of users by sending push notifications; managing the downloadable content used by games, as well as game versions and configurations; and monitoring and displaying statistics about infrastructure and API usage.  Do you want to be deeply involved in all of these tasks and many more?  If you join us, you will be part of an experienced development team where you will have the opportunity to use various technologies and see what it’s like to work in an Agile environment.  Responsibilities  Developing new projects that provide an optimized and stable backend and that offer a user-friendly experience Developing new features for existing projects Handling database and project design for new projects based on the specifications provided Consulting with and advising other teams regarding the use of our central APIs Maintaining and supporting existing features  Qualifications  3+ years of overall development experience with PHP Knowledge of OOP principles Experience with PHP frameworks (preferably Symfony) Experience with database design and query optimization in MySQL Good written and verbal communication skills – especially the ability to explain technical solutions  Assets  Experience with UNIX systems and networking Good knowledge of Python  Essential Skills  Innovative and passionate about technology Rigor, autonomy and good organizational skills Good spoken and written English skills  Additional Information  Work Location and Hour  Work location 26 Ung Van Khiem, Binh Thanh, HCMC (hybrid working model) Work hours 0830 A.M - 0600 P.M, Monday - Friday  Why Join Us?  Because you\'ll be a part of the team powering up AAA titles on Google Play and the App Store Because you\'ll be improving your programming skills and techniques to meet the demands of millions of users Because you\'ll work on a suite of tools used as a standard by all Gameloft studios around the world Because you\'ll work with large-scale user databases (hundreds of millions of new entries daily) Because you\'ll improve your skills in database optimization, caching, systems architecture, API integration and developing best practices for modern technologies  What We Offer  An attractive salary, with Tet Holiday bonus ("13th-month salary"), and other performance bonuses paid every 2 quarters, or on the spot. Full coverage of SI, HI, UI, and extra insurance (PTI). A hybrid working model. A range of policies to support employees physically, mentally and emotionally while working from home. A dynamic workplace environment, with over 18 nationalities, where hundreds of world-renowned game titles (Asphalt, Minion Rush, Modern Combat, Dungeon Hunter etc.) were born. An open-space office, a cafeteria, a terrace and a Gaming Area. Other benefits from "One of the best companies to work for in Asia 2021" (#HRAA2021).  Application  Send your CV and cover letter (optional) to sai-recruitment@gameloft.com, titled WOA_Your full name or apply here via SmartRecruiters.  Find Out More About Us  Facebook (Gameloft SEA) www.facebook.com/gameloftsea Website (Gameloft SEA) www.game-sea.com Show more Show less']

title: Developer
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ["Description  [Hot News] Go1 raises $200M at a $1B+ valuation to boost its curated enterprise learning platform  Join Go1 and help people around the world learn and grow. Build the technology that powers the largest digital learning library on earth. Join us in making the world a little smarter every day. Due to our ongoing growth, we now have multiple opportunities for Senior Developers to join our team.  About The Role  You’ll join one of our small but growing teams of developers with diverse backgrounds building technology to help people access learning around the world. You will work with experienced Technical Leads and Senior Developers that help you to deliver software solutions, both front-end and back-end while investing in your growth as a developer. You will talk through problems with Product Managers who represent your customers to find out why your solutions are needed and how they help learning.  Day To Day, Your Responsibilities Will Include  Writing, testing, building and deploying high-quality software. Perform code reviews, write tests and troubleshoot software issues. Collaborate with team members to problem solve and design solutions. Participate in, and contribute to, the team's agile processes  Must-haves  Requirements  A growth mindset: you need to be passionate about learning. 2+ years of experience in a software development role. Proficiency of at least one of our core development platforms: NodeJS, PHP, React/Typescript. An understanding of how to test software, from unit testing to system testing. Good at English written and verbal communication.  Nice-to-haves  Experience in SaaS or product development. Experience with Azure, Service-Oriented Architectures, API development or microservices.  Key Performance Indicators  Individual contribution to the Engineer’s assigned Working Team OKRs or KPIs  Benefits  We work as a team - we are open to new ideas, resolve issues together, and continue to learn from each other.  We Offer Extensive Benefits, Including But Not Limited To  Top-quality gears to work with (Macbook Pro, High-end Windows laptops) 13th-month salary and company performance bonus; Biannual salary review in January and July; 20 days of paid annual leave; Global premium healthcare coverage for you and your beloved one(s) right after you join us; Life insurance; Premium annual health check-up; Annual company trip and year-end party; Monthly team-building budget of 550,000 VND per person Remote working support; Free in-house food and drink: we have an in house barista that makes you nice coffee & fresh juices every day; Unlimited access to the Go1 Content Hub - thousands of training courses are waiting for you!  Last but not least, Go1 is on a stable and rapid-growth curve and you will have the opportunity to grow with us!   Show more Show less"]

title: Regional Systems Engineer
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['Job Requirements  At Baker Hughes, we are building a Talent Community of highly talented and motivated professionals for future job roles. If you match the described job role and are as excited as we are to have you on-board in the future, please hit the apply button to be a part of our Talent Community.  As a member of our talent community, you will be amongst the first to get exclusive news about Baker Hughes, various cool projects we are working on, our employee success stories and new job opportunities you may be interested in.  The Systems Engineer for the systems group within subsea controls systems group will provide technical guidance and development/deployment of world class control systems, with the ability to be deployed on multiple EPC and Brownfield projects globally. You’ll have a systems mindset, with the ability to challenge the norms and have an affinity for problem solving. Previous experience in the Oil & Gas industry is not essential.  Essential Responsibilities:   A client facing role that will be responsible for growing the relationship through project delivery and tendering new work Working with the global team to ensure unit engineering is executed to contract specifications and local regulatory requirements General ownership of key systems engineering deliverables; System FDS, system schematics, Scope of supply information and system test procedures Play a pivotal role in interface management, ensuring the timely closure of interfaces Responsibility for developing and delivering safe and compliant products across the engineering Group. Working with the allocated project team to deliver the required systems engineering scope, acting as the technical interface to the customer Responsibility and accountability for delivery of work scopes with allocated project teams. Ownership of system engineering design files as required, FMEA, HAZOP and other system level processes/analyses. Collaboration across the organization (both peers and senior leaders) to ensure smooth and effective delivery of projects Champion quality and lead a seamless execution of reliable products Support the organization with technical guidance and development of a world class product offering. Interface to internal and external regional clients, building relationships and timely response/interaction. Full review and understanding of technical scope, requirements and specifications Execute system level tests, providing assurance that the overall system design meets the customer requirements Lead the regional test activities, leveraging the global knowledge base to make the system test a success Support in gathering Industry VoC and translating that into technical and product offerings. Leading and supporting engineering bid work as required.   Work Experience  Qualifications/Requirements:   Bachelor or Master’s degree in Engineering or Science based discipline or equivalent knowledge and experience. Must have aptitude for learning new technology, techniques, methods and principles Strong analytical experience and the ability to use analytical tools to aid & enhance product/offering development Practical knowledge of project requisition processes Ability to champion and promote the good culture/behaviors within the work place Experience developing world class, market leading products Experience delivering projects on both small and large scales Ability to travel internationally, as required Strong inter-personal and communication skills Strong knowledge sharing and mentoring capabilities Excellent report writing & presentation skills Ability to provide senior leadership updates in a concise and accurate manner Fluent English Speaker   Desired characteristics:   Understanding of subsea architecture and ability to translate that into a winning subsea offering. Proven systems based experience across production and/or intervention controls technology. Please remember that joining the Talent Community is not an application for any specific job at Baker Hughes but to have the privilege of being considered for an opportunity that suits your profile on priority.   P-100459 Show more Show less']

title: Junior Front-End Developer
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['Company Description  Are You Looking For a Fun Place to Work?  Join The Game!  Leader in the development and publishing of games, Gameloft® has established itself as one of the top innovators in its field since 2000. Gameloft creates games for all digital platforms, two of which are featured in the “Top 10 iOS Games by All-Time Worldwide Downloads” from App Annie. Gameloft operates its own established franchises such as Asphalt®, Order & Chaos, Modern Combat and Dungeon Hunter and also partners with major rights holders including Disney®, LEGO®, Universal, Illumination Entertainment, Marvel®, Hasbro®, Fox Digital Entertainment, Mattel® and Ferrari®. Gameloft distributes its games in over 100 countries and employs 4,600 people worldwide. Every month, 114 million unique users can be reached by advertisers in Gameloft games with Gameloft Advertising Solutions, a leading B2B offering dedicated to brands and agencies. Gameloft is a Vivendi company.  All trademarks referenced above are owned by their respective trademark owners.  Job Description  Main Responsibilities  Perform web and legacy system development, update and support. Must have strong knowledge of front-end web technologies. Good understanding of Web analytics and SEO techniques and how to implement them. Optimize web applications to ensure they are rendered consistently and efficiently in a cross-browser environment Support the development team to boost website security and propose initiatives to deliver full website performance and optimization. Contribute to continuous improvement by suggesting improvement to user interface or new technologies. Analyze customer requirements and define front-end solutions while providing assistance to the team for any problem and technical roadblocks. Recommend new technologies and development strategies Provide production support Perform other duties that maybe assigned from time to time.  Qualifications  Bachelor’s degree, preferably in Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent 1+ years developing front-end and user interface code for Web sites and mobile apps Familiarity with the latest mobile UI and UX design patterns Have strong knowledge of the following technologies and languages Responsive Web Design; HTML5, Advanced HTML (Canvas, SVG); CSS Pre-processors (SASS); CSS Framework (Bootstrap); CSS3 Animation; DOM Manipulation frameworks such as jQuery; JS frameworks (Angular, Node, React); Javascript/Typescript; IT flow; Have experience using Version control tools such as Git Bash and Tortoise SVN; Shell scripts and FTP/SFTP/SSH; JSON and REST APIs Have knowledge of the following technologies and languages is a plus Animation libs (gsap, anim.js), Angular, VueJS, React native, CICD, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, PHP (Zend framework) Excellent leadership potential coupled with a solid work ethic. Ability to communicate clearly and concisely, both orally and in writing. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Knowledge of basic project management methodology. Knowledge of Scrum and Kanban is a plus Knowledge of any CMS (Content Management System) template is a plus  Additional Information  Recruitment Process  (1) 20-minute Call. Only qualified candidates will be contacted by our recruiters, (2) Test (duration is TBD, depending on your profile), (3) 1-hour Interview, (4) Offer.  Work Location and Hour  Work location 26 Ung Van Khiem, Binh Thanh, HCMC (hybrid working model). Work hour 0830 A.M. - 0600 P.M, Monday to Friday.  What We Offer  An attractive salary, with Tet Holiday bonus ("13th-month salary"), and other performance bonuses paid every 2 quarters, or on the spot. Full coverage of SI, HI, UI, and extra insurance (PTI). A hybrid working model. A range of policies to support employees physically, mentally and emotionally while working from home. A dynamic workplace environment, with over 18 nationalities, where hundreds of world-renowned game titles (Asphalt, Minion Rush, Modern Combat, Dungeon Hunter etc.) were born. An open-space office, a cafeteria, a terrace and a Gaming Area. Other benefits from "One of the best companies to work for in Asia 2021" (#HRAA2021).  Application  Send your CV and cover letter (optional) to sai-recruitment@gameloft.com, titled FE WMT_Your full name or apply here via SmartRecruiters.  Find Out More About Us  Facebook (Gameloft SEA) www.facebook.com/gameloftsea Website (Gameloft SEA) www.game-sea.com Show more Show less']

title: Junior Python Engineer
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ["Parcel Perform is looking for an amazing team member to support us in Software engineering!  You have good web development skills, experiences in Back-end development, you’re technically savvy, and have a nice grasp on coding techniques? Are you also interested in e-commerce and like to take on new challenges? Help us drive Parcel Perform’s growth and join our team! We are looking for you!  WE NEED YOU ON OUR TEAM!  As a backend engineer, you will be building scalable systems with microservices. You will get to write codebases that are small and focused on doing one thing well. We choose microservices for technology freedom, resilience, and scalability, though there will be a lot of communication between services, much automation and tons of metrics we need to keep an eye on.  Such a system isn’t easy, especially with a focus on good engineering practices. But that is ok. We aren’t here for ease anyway. We are here for people who want to operate at the next level in their careers.  WHAT YOU SHOULD BRING ALONG!  About  You need to feel the same way about our offering and bring along the following things  We at Parcel Perform believe in innovation, energy, and resourcefulness for everything we do. We will not stop delivering an outstanding product that we can be proud of and need you to help us to inform the world.  The skills  1 year of experience in Software development. Familiar with Python. Knowledge of scaling practices such as in-memory databases, load balancing, caching, etc. Comfortable with both SQL and NoSQL databases. Know-how of any MQ as a communication hub. If you start one today, that still counts. Comfortable RESTful and real-time communication protocols. Familiar with AWS stack to get the most out of infrastructure. Eager to get involved in the data engineering process. English communication is a must.  The mindset  Be responsible for tasks and open discussion, giving questions to build up high-quality products and rich front-end experiences for our users. Understand Object-Oriented Programming and design patterns. Willing to learn and research new technology or jump out of your comfort zone. Passionate about quality and the design of the code, productivity of the work, and maintainability of the result.  WHAT YOU WILL RECEIVE IN RETURN!  We at Parcel Perform are dedicated to being a platform for growth for all our team members, regardless of function and location.  The opportunity to work in a fast-growing, super exciting, and innovative business that will revolutionize the e-commerce logistics industry. You will be the needle of success on the growth of a global product that will become a key platform behind successful e-commerce logistics worldwide. The ability to continuously learn and develop in an international setting with you is critical for our success in achieving our mission. An environment where everybody never stops growing and focuses on succeeding - we continuously work with you on your strengths and weaknesses across many important dimensions and look at ways for you to address them and further your development Your entry ticket into being part of the Parcel Perform journey, where you will work with and alongside people from around the world that share the same passion and dedication.  WHO ARE WE AT PARCEL PERFORM!  Parcel Perform is the leading delivery experience platform. It enables modern e-commerce enterprises to create unique end-to-end customer journeys and optimize logistics operations with powerful data integrations, parcel tracking, delivery notifications and logistics performance reports in real-time.  Parcel Perform's scalable SaaS platform executes more than 100M parcel updates daily and integrates with 700+ carriers. The data-first company is pioneering innovative ML / AI use cases in e-commerce logistics including its 'Date of Arrival' prediction engine. Parcel Perform is the partner of choice for top brands, marketplaces and carriers across all major verticals globally.  LEARN MORE ABOUT US!  Our homepage - Learn more about our B2B offering & the most global B2C tracking page Our blog - Hear what Employees say about Parcel Perform Our social media accounts - For the latest updates, follow us on LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter Show more Show less"]

description: ['Preparing the appropriate templates to prepare the budget by all concerned departments. Receiving the budget estimates from all the departments and critically examines them for correctness, accuracy and completeness; and conformance with established procedures, regulations, and organizational objectives; Suggesting suitable amendments in the budget to the higher authorities of the concerned department; Consolidating the data for budget presentation and also providing an overview of the financial status of all the operations; Rendering financial advice to the management officials of different operations, to undertake proper financial planning and decision making; Analyzing actual results to budgets and forecasts; Submitting budget reports to the line manager for further scrutiny and approval in accordance with the approved policy; Monitoring the budget throughout the year; Ad-hoc requests to provide data support to line manager/ other business functions.   Job requirements:  0-2+ years of industry experience with proven business impact; degree in quantitative field preferred; Have experience with SQL, Python, R (or other tools for statistical analysis), data visualisation tools is a plus; Proficiency in MS Excel/Google Sheet; Experience working with multiple stakeholders across various divisions; Comfortable working with large data sets and numbers; Excellence written and verbal communication skills in English and Vietnamese; Self-starter with can-do attitude; Able to work in a team; Working well under pressure.   At ShopeeFood, your benefits are our commitment, what you can get when joining us:  Attractive salary package with the annual performance review. 13th-month salary, annual performance bonus. Full Social insurance, Health insurance, and Unemployment insurance contribution. 14 annual leave days and 06 sick leave days Annual company trip, many company activities throughout the year. Annual health examinations. Regular internal training courses and programs. Show more Show less']

title: Machine Learning Engineer
industries: IT Services and IT Consulting, Software Development, and Banking
description: ['Objectives:  The job holder is responsible for developing programs, algorithms and automated processes & pipelines to cleanse, integrate and evaluate large datasets from disparate sources and implement complex business logic as needed with the available data processing tools. The job holder will be responsible for helping design, build, optimize and operate a reliable, sustainable and scalable data processing platform, manage on-premise & cloud data pipelines that facilitate robust machine learning system, convert models to production machine learning codes and recommend Big Data reporting and visualization applications.  Key Responsibilities:  Deliver functionality required for business, data analysts, data scientists among other business roles to advance the overall analytic performance and strategy of the bank Identify opportunities to manage data and provide solutions for complex data feeds within the bank. Maintain data integration processes into the data platform by building data pipelines and align with business representatives and business information needs. Evaluate various data architectures in the bank and utilize them to develop data solutions to meet business requirements. Build best practices and strategies for data infrastructure to fulfill data analytics and utilization needs of the business with emerging latest technologies and capabilities. Review internal and external business and product requirements for data operations and activity and suggests changes and upgrades to systems and storage to accommodate ongoing needs. Drive the delivery of data products and services into systems and business processes in compliance with internal regulatory requirements. Collaborate with Data Scientists to understand data requirements and create re-usable data assets to enable data scientists to build and deploy machine learning models faster. Ensure data assets are organized and stored in an efficient way so that information is easy to access and retrieve. Design, build, and maintain optimized data pipelines and ETL solutions as business support tools in providing analysis and real time analytics platform for critical decision making Designing, building & optimizing machine learning systems and self-running artificial intelligence (AI) software to automate predictive models. Drive the development of cloud based machine learning pipelines for data-driven products and services Contribute to architecture and technical decisions to onboard existing on-prem machine learning workflows and pipelines to public cloud (e.g. Azure, AWS, GCP) Collaborate with data scientists and engineers to deploy new machine learning and deep learning models into complex and mission critical production systems Select the right tool(s)/services(s) for the job and make it work in production Promote a culture of self-serve data analytics by minimizing technical barriers to data access and understanding Stay current with the latest research and technology and communicate your knowledge throughout the enterprise  Key Relationship:  Line Manager: Analytics Head, Head of Data & Advanced Analytics Internal: BI Head, Use Case Leads External: Digital Factory leaders, Business Divisions leaders, IT leaders  Qualification and Experiences:  Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Quantitative Analysis, Computer Science, Software Engineering or Information Technology 2 to 4 years of relevant experience with: Relational database systems (e.g. Oracle, MySQL, MS SQLServer) Database technologies (e.g. SQL, NoSQL, Graph Databases) Developing, debugging, scripting and employing big data technologies (e.g. Hadoop, HDFS, Presto, Trino, Spark, Flink, Kafka, Pulsar, Arrow, Databricks) Containers and containerized application deployment (e.g. Docker, Kubernetes) Workflow orchestration systems (e.g. Airflow, Kubeflow, MLFlow) Programming languages (e.g. Python, Scala, Java, Rust, Kotlin) with both object-oriented and functional programing paradigms 3+ years’ experience in developing ML applications on a public cloud platform (e.g. AWS, GCP, Azure etc.) Expertise in developing software with container deployment and orchestration technologies at scale, with strong knowledge of the fundamentals including service discovery, deployments, monitoring, scheduling, load balancing Experience in designing and building dimensional data models, ETL processes, applied data warehouse concepts and methodologies, optimized data pipelines and assisted the architect as needed Experience monitoring complex system and solving data and systems issues having a consistent and algorithmic approach to resolving them Has some know-how and partial scripting and coding experience to set up, configure & maintain a machine learning model development environment Some experience architecting, coding and delivering high performance micro services and/or recommenders delivering recommendations to a large user-base Very strong Linux skills with a passion for automating everything Deep understanding of Information Security principles to ensure compliant handling and management of all data English proficiency requirements are pursuant to MSB’s policy Experience working in Agile teams to support digital transformation projects, having a clear understanding of Agile principles, practices and Scrum methodologies Show more Show less']
