title: IT Business Analyst - HIREFITVN157
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['Are you looking for a supportive, collaborative workplace with great teams and inspiring leaders? You’ve come to the right place. We’re looking for ambitious people who share our values and want to make every day better for people around the world. If this sounds like you, and the career below sounds exciting, we’d like to hear from you.  Working Arrangement  Hybrid  Job Description  The Business Analyst is responsible to ensuring client requirements are fully understood and specified in a manner that will enable full understanding from development team. The Business Analyst is reporting directly to Project Manager for specific project related items to the project manager and has authority on all the matters related to workflow of product and client requirement. Detail below  Gather business and system requirements from client Assist client to define requirements and suggest ideas Create Business Requirement Spec, SRS (System Requirement Spec), User story detail and its acceptance criteria from epic. Transfer knowledge to offshore team Assist PM on project scope, estimation and planning Assist PM on requirement sign off process and project change requests Act as the bridge between client and offshore to clarify requirement with development team (developers, testers, UI designer) in both business and system analysis view, and facilitate communication among internal team members Work with QC to verify that all requirements of the system are fulfilled by the implementation in the traceability manner among requirements, CR and implementation Write testing scenarios for UAT Support UAT in testing, verifying bugs/issues with client Assist Bid Manager in pre-sales support activities especially on analysis phase Analyze and reverse engineer the existing system to describe it in the requirement specifications that can be understood by project team  Requirements  Bachelor degree preferably in Computer Science and Business Information System Obtaining IT knowledge-base Fluent English to be able to communicate directly with customers At least 04 years of working experience of which 03 year in analyzing requirements Basic knowledge on database such as database schema and simple SQL query Knowledge of testing approaches and techniques General understanding and experience of business processes as well as an interest to understand a broad range of business models and needs Excellent communication skill and interpersonal skill Have a proactive, can do attitude Willing to travel onsite Insurance business domain knowledge is a plus  Every career at Manulife/John Hancock provides the opportunity to learn new skills and move your career forward. Ready to make an impact somewhere? What are you waiting for? Apply today.  About John Hancock And Manulife  John Hancock is a unit of Manulife Financial Corporation, a leading international financial services group that helps people make their decisions easier and lives better. We operate primarily as John Hancock in the United States, and Manulife globally, including Canada, Asia and Europe. We provide financial advice, insurance and wealth and asset management solutions for individuals, groups and institutions. Assets under management and administration by Manulife and its subsidiaries were CAD$1.3 trillion (US$1.1 trillion) as of June 30, 2021. Manulife Financial Corporation trades as MFC on the TSX, NYSE, and PSE, and under 945 on the SEHK. Manulife can be found at manulife.com.  One of the largest life insurers in the United States, John Hancock supports more than 10 million Americans with a broad range of financial products, including life insurance, annuities, investments, 401(k) plans, and education savings plans. Additional information about John Hancock may be found at johnhancock.com.  Manulife is an Equal Opportunity Employer  At Manulife/John Hancock, we embrace our diversity. We strive to attract, develop and retain a workforce that is as diverse as the customers we serve and to foster an inclusive work environment that embraces the strength of cultures and individuals. We are committed to fair recruitment, retention, advancement and compensation, and we administer all of our practices and programs without discrimination on the basis of race, ancestry, place of origin, colour, ethnic origin, citizenship, religion or religious beliefs, creed, sex (including pregnancy and pregnancy-related conditions), sexual orientation, genetic characteristics, veteran status, gender identity, gender expression, age, marital status, family status, disability, or any other ground protected by applicable law.  It is our priority to remove barriers to provide equal access to employment. A Human Resources representative will work with applicants who request a reasonable accommodation during the application process. All information shared during the accommodation request process will be stored and used in a manner that is consistent with applicable laws and Manulife/John Hancock policies. To request a reasonable accommodation in the application process, contact recruitment@manulife.com. Show more Show less']

title: Python Developer - (Fully Remote)
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['Flex is a one of the most innovative technology companies around that provides platform driven SME finance solutions to its consumers. Our team comprises of seasoned veterans from banking, supply chain management, data science and technology with proven track records. We are a team with several years of experience across Singapore, India and the rest of Asia. Our founders and key management have decades of financial and startup experience. We are backed by 500 Startups, Monk’s Hill Ventures and our solutions are built by people that understand the financing needs and challenges of small and medium businesses.  As a Software Engineer, you will design and develop elegant and performant code, predominantly in Python and related technologies. You will join a growing multi-disciplinary team of Data Scientists, Engineers, and Solutions Experts with deep domain knowledge working to develop new capabilities and workflows to solve real-world client problems.  Our ideal candidate has a strong work ethic, fantastic attitude, and is comfortable tackling any challenge set before them. We provide significant flexibility and autonomy to team members, have high expectations, and expect everyone to contribute meaningfully to our broader collective goals.  Roles And Responsibilities  Develop well-designed performant and scalable applications and micro services Writing reusable, testable, and efficient code aligning to software development best practices Integrate data storage solutions including databases, key-value stores, blob stores, etc. Build integrations with 3rd party applications through apis’ to ingest and process data Develop state-of-the-art analytics tools to support diverse tasks ranging from ad hoc analysis to production-grade pipelines and workflows for customer applications Ensure security and data protection aspects within the applications Partner with Data Scientists and Analytics Engineers to improve performance and reliability of advanced algorithms Ensure high performance and availability of distributed systems and applications Interact directly with client project team members and operational staff to support live customer deployments and production issues   Requirements  3-5+ years of experience in developing applications using python and related technologies. Familiarity in data ingestion and processing libraries in python. Thorough understanding of REST and GRPC technologies. Experience in using ORM (Object Relational Mapper) libraries for data access. Experiencing in developing and hosting APIs and integration with external applications. Experience in building data models and repositories using relational and NoSql databases. Knowledge of JIRA, Bitbucket and agile methodologies. Good to have knowledge of AWS services like Lambda, dynamodb, kinesis and others. Understanding of fundamental design principles behind a scalable application Familiarity with event-driven programming Strong unit test and debugging skills Affinity for learning and applying new technologies and solving new problems Effective organizational skills with strong attention to detail Experience in working with docker is a plus Comfortable in working with Unix/Linux environment Strong English communication skills — both written and verbal   Benefits  Tech culture of trust and empowerment Work Environment. Self-organized, autonomous teams and flexible working hours. Finaxar is a Fintech backed Tier-1 VCs, Hedge Funds and Family offices, therefore you can expect that your work will have immediate impact and you will participate in developing significant improvements. Show more Show less']

title: Junior Software Engineer
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['Description  Top Reasons to Join Skedulo!  A dynamic product company with great tech. You get your own Macbook Pro. Balanced Workload. Perform at your Best!  Skedulo Introduction  Founded in 2013, Skedulo is a fast-growing SaaS company headquartered in San Francisco and with offices in Australia, Vietnam, and the United Kingdom. Here, we use the latest technologies and best engineering practices to deliver groundbreaking software that is making a difference around the world.  If you’re drawn to solving interesting hard problems, Skedulo is for you. Over the past 20 years, less than 5% of software investment has been focused on the needs of the world’s 2.7 billion mobile workers, and the mobile workforce is our sole focus. Join us as we build a scalable platform for the world’s largest brands working with the most respected technology partners.  Skedulo is a momentum leader in Field Service Management (based on G2 Winter 2021 rating) and is growing rapidly to meet the demands of a post-Covid world. This is a compelling opportunity to join a fast-growth, enterprise grade, SaaS based business where an outstanding mobile experience is at the heart of our product and user experience.  As a Junior Software Engineer you will be embedded within the Engineering department and act as a key interface between our Customer Experience and Engineering teams. You will troubleshoot and drive the resolution of complex, escalated customer issues that arise from business as usual product operations and from customer go-lives.  In this role you will be required to develop broad product expertise and an understanding of our product code-base, so that you can develop production-ready bug fixes. You will be a customer advocate and ensure that the customer voice is heard and incorporated into future product development activities. You will proactively identify opportunities to improve and mature our product documentation and support processes based on your customer interactions and knowledge.  Requirements  Responsibilities Day to Day Triage, trouble-shoot and resolve escalated customer issues from multiple inbound channels Works with internal and external stakeholders to facilitate the timely resolution of customer issues Create, update and enhance external and internal product documentation based on customer interactions Anticipates and communicates blockers or delays for your work before they require escalation Providing a clear end of day hand-over of critical issues for continued investigation by the global technical support engineering team Participate in customer calls and meetings where required to assist in issue resolution Drive product enhancements with the Product Development team based on your product expertise and frontline knowledge of customer needs Proactively identify and implement improvements to the global support engineering team processes Technical Duties Provides technical advice and product expertise to customers and internal stakeholders to assist in the timely resolution of customer escalated issues Collaborate with Product Development team and submit merge requests to resolve bugs Develops production-ready bug fixes that are easily testable, understood by other engineers, and accounts for edge cases and errors Ensures their commitments are realistic, understands their priority and urgency, and delivers upon them accordingly. Communication Duties Communicates with their team, internal stakeholders and with customers in an effective, clear, concise manner in both written and verbal form on technical and non technical subjects. Helps their fellow team members overcome obstacles, resolve blockers, and complete work tasks  Minimum Qualifications  Requirements  Excellent written and oral English communication skills for internal and customer communication Excellent problem solving and diagnostic skills  Desired Skills & Experience Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, Engineering, Mathematics or similar field of study Previous experience in a customer facing role Previous experience with one or more of the following: Javascript, CSS, React.js, NodeJS Unit testing frameworks Kotlin Typescript CI/CD tooling and automation Experience working with agile development methodologies Knowledge and experience with issue tracking tools such as Jira and Zendesk 1+ years experience in a similar role  Benefits  MacBook Pro provided Competitive salary & 13th Month Bonus Working from home set up stipend: $150 Learning & Development stipend: $500 per year 7 paid sick days per year 20 paid leave days per year 8 paid Mental Healths days per year 3 paid Volunteer days per year 12 days of paid Public Holiday per year Paid Parental Leave (12 weeks) in-conjunction with eligible government benefits Miscarriage & Bereavement leave Equity in the form of SARS (Stock Appreciation Rights) Medical Benefits for employee & family Employee Referral Bonus Annual Mental Wellness Week event & Calm subscription to help support in the mental wellbeing Leadership, Mentorship, DEIB Program Fun, creative and fast-paced working environment Kitchen stocked with snacks & drinks Our offices have creative, open workspaces with room to play, reflect, and relax Our team is extremely competitive, and we will challenge your best table tennis skills Show more Show less']

description: ['Job Purpose Thiết kế, triển khai và đánh giá các biện pháp sử dụng nền tảng đám mây, đảm bảo giải pháp đưa ra phù hợp với luật và chính sách bảo mật của TCB  Key Accountabilities (1)  Quản lý và điều hành công việc: Phân tích nhu cầu của các đơn vị và giúp họ lựa chọn công nghệ đám mây phù hợp. Thiết kế cho các đơn vị/ dự án trong ngân hàng về các giải pháp công nghệ dựa vào công nghệ đám mây. Công tác quản trị rủi ro và tuân thủ: Nhận biết các rủi ro và phối hợp với các đơn vị liên quan để đề xuất phương pháp đo lường và giảm thiểu các rủi ro trong hoạt động. Đảm bảo các nhóm trong bộ phận hoàn thành những cam kết về chất lượng phục vụ, tuân thủ các quy định, chính sách của Ngân hàng  Success Profile - Qualification and Experiences  Bằng tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên, chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin Kinh nghiệm công tác: 3-6 năm Kinh nghiệm với cloud (aws/gcp) Kinh nghiệm với hệ thống lớn Kinh nghiệm với container/microservice/container orchestration/kubernetes (k8s) Kinh nghiệm với configuration management (ansible/puppet), infrastructure as code (terraform/cloudformation), GitOps model Familiar with 1 or more scripting language (bash/python). Golang is plus. Trình độ ngoại ngữ: Tiếng Anh tương đương TOEIC 550 trở lên Show more Show less']

title: Developer (Nodejs/Reactjs)
description: ['Số lượng cần tuyển: 02 nhân viên  Mô tả công việc:  • Thiết kế và xây dựng hệ thống bằng Nodejs/ReactJS  • Đảm bảo hiệu suất và bảo mật  • Tham gia phân tích yêu cầu, thực thi, xem xét code, kiểm thử, thử nghiệm và triển khai  • Làm việc trực tiếp với các nhóm Frontend, DevOps, Project Owner, Business Owner, v.v.  • Luôn cập nhật các xu hướng mới, đề xuất các giải pháp tốt nhất trong quá trình phát triển và chia sẻ kiến thức với đồng nghiệp  Yêu cầu:  • Kinh nghiệm đã được chứng minh từ 2-3 năm với tư cách là kỹ sư phần mềm với kiến thức chuyên môn về NodeJS/ReactJS  • Có kinh nghiệm với một trong các khung NodeJS/Golang/Python và các mẫu thiết kế / kiến trúc  • Có kinh nghiệm với các kiểu kiến trúc / API (REST, RPC)  • Khả năng tương tác, giao tiếp và trình bày ý tưởng  • Kỹ năng làm việc độc lập và làm việc nhóm hiệu quả  • Có tiếng Anh là một lợi thế  Quyền lợi:  • Mức lương thỏa thuận up to $1300, quy trình phỏng vấn gọn gàng với chỉ 01 vòng phỏng vấn  • Tham gia các hoạt động giao lưu văn hóa, thể dục thể thao, giải trí (sinh nhật, liên hoan, du lịch thường niên cùng công ty, v.v.)  • Môi trường làm việc năng động, sáng tạo, chuyên nghiệp  • Được ký hợp đồng lao động chính thức và hưởng các quyền lợi theo đúng luật lao động, các chính sách đãi ngộ xứng đáng, phù hợp với năng lực và kinh nghiệm  Show more Show less']

title: [Sign-on 3000AUD] Senior .NET
job_function: Information Technology, Health Care Provider, and Analyst
description: ['THE OPPORTUNITY:  Our client is a well-established and highly successful leading provider with over 2200 talented employees worldwide of an extensive range of healthcare advice, strategies, and solutions with operations in the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, and Australia for the past 35 years. They are currently having a fantastic opportunity for experienced and passionate customer-focused software developers who are self-motivated, have a passion to deep dive into technology, and seeking to work in a dynamic and engaged organization to join in their growing team. You will be reported to the Team Leader and responsible for the delivery of high-quality software and innovation through technology. You will also be pivotal in several key projects and initiatives.     KEY RESPONSIBILITIES WILL INCLUDE BUT ARE NOT LIMITED TO:  Designing, developing, reviewing, testing, and delivering custom software solutions whilst collaborating with stakeholders. Ensuring the code produced is of high quality and follows our coding guidelines. Reviewing code from other team members and critically assessing the code for high-quality design and adherence to our coding guidelines. Actively contribute to solution design discussions and present technical design options for consideration. System configuration and integration. Maintaining and supporting existing software. Support team members to solve application-related issues.     TO BE SUCCESSFUL IN THIS ROLE YOU WILL HAVE:  From 5 years of working experience in software development with Microsoft technologies (C#, .NET frameworks, Entity framework) and Agile software development. Strong experience in web development is a big plus. A passion for SOLID Principles, Clean Code, and solution design. Ability to review code and support for middle and junior developers. A desire to deeply understand how technologies work. Competent English communication skills, both verbal and written. Company Tech stack: ASP.NET Core, MVC4, Vue.js, HTML5, CSS3+, JavaScript, LINQ, Entity Framework, MS SQL, ASP.NET. Tools: Visual Studio, SQL Server Management Studio, ReSharper, Git.     ASW OFFERS:  Attractive annual bonuses (13th, 14th-month fixed salary) Sign-on bonus of 3000AUD We are experts in Offshoring partnerships. This means that you will be a trusted member of the ASW family, and get access to our great benefits, plus you also get to work directly with ONE of our clients as a part of their international team from the US, UK, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, and much more. Premium Insurance Package for employee and 1 family member of choice Great Paid Leave entitlements (20 days annual leave & 10 days sick leave) Our own ASW Toastmasters Club with Native English Speaker- perfect your English! Free LinkedIn learning & Coursera account. Stocked fridges and pantries - free coffee, cold beverages, snacks. A diverse, inclusive, and supportive company culture. Exposure to an international environment, working with people across Malaysia, Vietnam, and Australia. Opportunity to collaborate and work with global clients and stakeholders. Team outings, travel abroad opportunities, company parties/events, and other exciting activities. Industry and role-related training. Ongoing career opportunities. Show more Show less']

title: ZaloPay - (Middle/Senior) Backend Engineer
description: ['Founded in 2004, VNG is proud to be Vietnam\'s first-ever unicorn with the mission to: "Build technologies and Grow people. For a Better Life." Our products focus on enhancing the lives of citizens, with four main categories: Online Games; Social Platforms; Finance and Payment; Cloud Services, impactful products such as Zalo, ZaloPay, zing MP3, and many more have acquired over 100 million users around the world, which proves that we truly live up to our own expectations.     As a Backend Engineer (Java/Golang), you will:  Design and develop high-quality & high-performance webs/services, working with architects and other team members. Review, clarify & contribute to business/product requirements then work with Business/Product teams to transform ideas into reality. Research, assess, and adopt new technologies as required. Tracking and monitoring product metrics to get fast feedback from end-users. Actively participate in writing unit tests, and automation tests to maintain high-quality deliveries. Build reusable components and libraries for future use.     Requirements:  Experience in Java/Golang or confidence that you can pick it up in no time. Familiar with Microservices, event-driven architecture. Being familiar with RDBMS such as MySQL/PostgreSQL or NoSQL databases such as MongoDB. Experience with designing and developing event-driven and message-driven applications using Kafka, RabitMQ, or similar. Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, and Google Cloud is a plus. Understood, practice programming design patterns and SOLID principles BS, MS in computer science or a related field, or equivalent work experience     Our attractive benefits:  Financial Well-being  A competitive salary with a fixed 13th-month salary and a variety of allowances Annual performance bonus, VNG Birthday Bonus, and gifts on special occasions. Personal finance coach/ sharing workshop. Special support for all employees/ dependents who are under treatment for serious disease or impacts of storm/ flood/ fire.  Leave & time-off  Annual leave: 14 - 20 days/year and other leave in accordance with the Labor Law of Vietnam. Up to 30 days sick leave with full-paid salary. 05 days per year to build up teamwork, challenge/sports events.  Health and Wellness  Annual periodic medical checkup. Health/ Social Insurances & Generali Insurance. Gym, Swimming pool, Kid yard, library, and clinic room are available at Campus for employees and their kids. Sports sponsorship for all employees who join challenging sports events. Show more Show less']

title: React Native
description: ['MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC  -\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Phát triển các phần mềm quản trị, mobile app các lĩnh vực  -\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Tham gia quá trình nghiên cứu công nghệ, phân tích, thiết kế sản phẩm.  -\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Phối hợp với Designer để triển khai, thiết kế giao diện  Phối hợp với team back-end để tích hợp API truy xuất dữ liệu cho app Xuất bản ứng dụng lên store  \xa0  YÊU CẦU ỨNG VIÊN  Có ít nhất từ 03 tháng- đến 3 năm kinh nghiệm thực tiễn với ReactJS và ReactNative Sử dụng thành thạo React Native. Đã tham gia ít nhất 1 dự án sử dụng React Native Sử dụng thành thạo Javascript/TypeScript, ES6, biết thêm về native là một lợi thế Thành thạo thư viện quản lý state như redux, redux thunk Có kiến thức tốt về Firebase/push notification, Google API Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với RESTful API Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với công cụ Git  \xa0  QUYỀN LỢI ĐƯỢC HƯỞNG  Mức lương: Theo năng lực ứng viên và mong muốn của ứng viên UPTO 20M Phụ cấp ăn trưa, gửi xe theo quy định. Tham gia các Câu lạc bộ dưới sự tài trợ chính thức của Công ty: CLB Bóng đá, các CLB Game, tham gia các bữa tiệc, hoạt động ngoại khóa của công ty … Tham gia các buổi Happy hour ăn nhẹ cùng nhân viên trong công ty hàng tuần. Được xét duyệt tăng lương định kỳ ( 2 lần/năm) vào tháng 1 và tháng 7 hàng năm. Thưởng cuối năm theo kết quả công việc của nhân viên và kết quả kinh doanh của công ty. Tặng quà sinh nhật hiếu hỉ đầy đủ theo quy định của công ty. Du lịch/nghỉ mát/teambuiding 2 -3 lần/năm (Nghỉ hè, thu, đông). Phụ cấp ăn trưa, gửi xe theo quy định. Thưởng cổ phần ESOP cho nhân viên có thâm niên gắn bó với công ty. Thời gian làm việc: 8h15-17h30, Thứ 2- Thứ 6 và Thứ 7 cách tuần nghỉ chủ nhật.  Thông tin liên hệ:  Email: huyennt@winds.vn, Điện thoại: 0385348838 (Ms Huyền) Website: https://www.winds.vn ĐC: Toà Housing 299 Trung Kính, HN     Show more Show less']

title: Game Designer
description: ["Company Description  Company Description  Are You Looking For a Fun Place to Work?  Join The Game!  About Gameloft  Leader in the development and publishing of games, Gameloft® has established itself as one of the top innovators in its field since 2000. Gameloft creates games for all digital platforms, two of which are featured in the “Top 10 iOS Games by All-Time Worldwide Downloads” from App Annie. Gameloft operates its own established franchises such as Asphalt®, Order & Chaos, Modern Combat and Dungeon Hunter and also partners with major rights holders including Disney®, LEGO®, Universal, Illumination Entertainment, Marvel®, Hasbro®, Fox Digital Entertainment, Mattel® and Ferrari®. Gameloft distributes its games in over 100 countries and employs 4,600 people worldwide. Every month, 98 million unique users can be reached by advertisers in Gameloft games with Gameloft Advertising Solutions, a leading B2B offering dedicated to brands and agencies. Gameloft is a Vivendi company.  Gameloft Hanoi Studio is always on looking out for the best talent to join our team and help create the best experiences for players.  Job Description  Responsibilities  As a member of the game design team of Gameloft Studio in Vietnam, and under the responsibility of the Lead Game Designer as well as Producer, you will be in charge of the design of top-quality mobile games for international markets.  Your overall responsibilities consist of  Study and master original designs of a wide range of game genres. Creatively modify, adapt or produce gameplay contents, concepts, level layouts, and designs. Creating design documents for new designs, features, contents for improvements. Under producer's coordination, work with artists, programmers, and other GDs to make sure that the creative vision is fulfilled, and assist producer in checking and ensuring the quality of game versions. Creating wireframes for new UI (if any). Implementing new UI and fixing UI bugs via Flash or some other in-house tools. Constantly reviewing game KPIs to check game’s healthy, then propose solutions to fix (if any). Coaching, training the assigned newbie.  Qualifications  Have basic knowledge of game mechanics. Have basic knowledge of programming. Passionate and Understand video games in a wide variety of genres on various platforms; Good understanding of target audience, user motivation, and market. Good at written & spoken English. Good at communication and presentation. Good at both self-management and teamwork. Be able to work under high pressure and within strict deadlines. Be creative at gaming ideas and working solutions. Understanding of game KPIs. Be open to learn new skills and knowledge. Bachelor's degree or equivalent in information technology, or multimedia, or graphics... is a plus. Know about some popular game engines such as Unity is a plus. Have experience with Abobe Flash/ Animate is a big plus.  And above all, motivation and a passion for video games!  Additional Information  Why Join Gameloft?  You want to be part of an exceptional experience, within a company that is constantly growing. You want to work with talented people who are industry pioneers. You want to join a global company and meet great people around the world from all walks of life. Or, you are just looking for a fun place to work!  What We Offer  05 working days/ week From Monday to Friday, applying flexible working time. Lunch Allowance VND600,000/ month Health, Social and Unemployment Insurance (based on gross-based salary, according to Labor Code) and PTI Accident & Health Insurance Tet Bonus (13th month salary) and Project bonus (twice/ year) Annual salary review Leave entitlement 30 days (12 days annual leave, 5 paid days sick leave, 01 company leave, 11 days public holiday, 01 birthday leave) Teambuilding activities & Company events across the year. Sport Clubs (Gym, Soccer, Pingpong), PS4 Game corner, Game Online Contest with attractive rewards. Free technical, soft skill, English and other language training courses (internal and external) for all employees. Opportunity to be trained and participate in at least 01 real game project with great titles such as Asphalt, Minion Rush, March of Empire, ... Opportunity to access international game making technology, with a huge knowledge base from Gameloft studios around the globe. Opportunities to work with a team of young, talented staff from countries around the world. A culture of relentless learning with free courses in specialized skills, soft skills, and English.  We can’t wait to find our next great talent!  Please submit your CV, cover letter, and portfolio (if applicable) to recruitment.hn@gameloft.com  Please note that only selected candidates will be contacted and your CV will be saved in our database for future suitable open jobs.  Want to learn more? Please visit our Website http//gameloft-sea.com/  Survey  As you are interested in career opportunities at Gameloft, please take the below survey to help us better understand how candidates define our employer value proposition.  The survey may take you less than 5 minutes to complete, and is totally anonymous.  https//www.surveymonkey.com/r/PVFDD2P  Thank you for your cooperation! Show more Show less"]

title: Sr. IT Business Analyst
description: ['Location: Candidates located in Hanoi, Vietnam are preferred, but we are open to remote work for well-qualified candidates.     About Skyven  Skyven Technologies is a US-based, growing startup that builds thermal energy solutions for the manufacturing sector. We focus on decarbonization and sustainability, and work with industrial manufacturers to reduce fuel consumption and impact on the environment.\xa0  Our mission is to move the needle on climate change by contributing to global GHG emission reduction. Skyven has built a strong pipeline of industrial projects and is building out the software that powers our end-to-end decarbonization service for industrial manufacturers. We are scaling rapidly and are at an exciting turning point in our business.     Job Overview  This role is a liaison between business and technical teams. As part of the product team, you play a key role in building our unique platform to optimize customer journey to decarbonization and sustainability. You will take on a variety of responsibilities from coordinating the creation and development of product features & solutions, eliciting and documenting requirements, to maintaining a healthy product backlog.  The ideal candidate has a combination of strong analytical skills, problem-solving abilities, and excellent interpersonal skills who embraces and tackles challenges and uncertainties with resilience and creativity. The individual keeps abreast of current technologies and brings expert knowledge of industry best practices in product development.  If you have a passion for entrepreneurship, a sense of drive and autonomy to juggle multiple roles, and a fire to help create a more sustainable future, then this is the role for you.     Responsibilities  Coordinate the creation and development of product features & solutions to ensure that capabilities are in-scope, on-time, and of high quality. Elicit, analyze, refine, and document requirements from stakeholders. Facilitate workshops to discover, discuss, and validate requirements.\xa0 Construct workflow diagrams, wire frames designs, and create product specifications in accordance with business requirements.\xa0 Analyze and evaluate technological solutions to business requirements. Own and translate business and technical requirements into epics and user stories with clearly articulated acceptance criteria for Scrum teams to implement. Refine, prioritize, and maintain a healthy product backlog that optimizes value for the customer while adhering to company strategy. Deliver data-driven recommendations and reports to executives and stakeholders.     Qualifications  BS/BA degree in computer science, computer engineering or related field. 5+ years of experience as Technical Business Analyst or similar role in an Agile environment. Experience working with industrial ecosystems and/or SaaS enterprise solutions. Experience in the Business Analysis Process, Process Improvement, Documentation, Diagrams, Data Flow, Process Flow, and other related documentation in the area. Excellent problem-solving skills and analytical mindset with the ability to see problems from different perspectives.\xa0 Ability to influence cross-functional teams.\xa0 Exceptional interpersonal skills, including facilitation skills, verbal and written communication skills. Self-directed, detail oriented, organized, multi tasker. IIBA, PMI, and/or Agile certification is a plus. Fluent in English.     Compensation and Benefits  Competitive salary with monthly performance bonus up to 50% Flexible working time Flexible PTO Health insurance Vacation     Contact  Giang La | Product Manager | giangla@skyven.co  Show more Show less']

title: Back-end Engineer (Python)
description: ["In love with Python and want to utilize it for B2B software solutions in e-commerce logistics?     Parcel Perform is looking for an amazing team member to support us in software engineering!     You have good web development skills, 2+ year experiences in Back-end development, you’re technically savvy, and have a nice grasp on coding techniques? Are you also interested in e-commerce and like to take on new challenges? Help us drive Parcel Perform’s growth and join our team! We are looking for you!     WE NEED YOU ON OUR TEAM!     As a backend engineer, you will be building scalable systems with microservices. You will get to write codebases that are small and focused on doing one thing well. We choose microservices for technology freedom, resilience, and scalability, though there will be a lot of communication between services, much automation and tons of metrics we need to keep an eye on.     Such a system isn’t easy, especially with a focus on good engineering practices. But that is ok. We aren’t here for ease anyway. We are here for people who want to operate at the next level in their careers.     WHAT YOU SHOULD BRING ALONG!     The Skills     We at Parcel Perform believe in innovation, energy, and resourcefulness for everything we do. We will not stop delivering an outstanding product that we can be proud of and need you to help us to inform the world. You need to feel the same way about our offering and bring along the following things:  At least 2 years of experience as Backend Engineer Solid knowledge of Backend (preferably Python or Scala). Knowledge of scaling practices such as in-memory databases, load balancing, caching, etc. Comfortable with both SQL and NoSQL databases. Know-how of any MQ as a communication hub. If you start one today, that still counts. Comfortable with RESTful and real-time communication protocols. Familiar with AWS stack to get the most out of infrastructure. Eager to get involved in the data engineering process. Wide exposure to multiple technology stacks is an advantage, we love full-stack guys. English communication is a must.  The mindset  Be responsible with tasks and be open discussing, giving questions to build up products with high quality and rich front-end experiences for our users. Understand clearly object-oriented programming and design pattern. Willing to learn and research new technology or jump out of your comfort zone. Passionate about quality and the design of the code, productivity of the work, and maintainability of the result.     WHAT YOU WILL RECEIVE IN RETURN!     We at Parcel Perform are dedicated to being a platform for growth for all our team members, regardless of function and location.  The opportunity to work in a fast-growing, super exciting and innovative business that will revolutionize the e-commerce logistics industry. You will be the needle of success on the growth of a global product that will become a key platform behind successful e-commerce logistics worldwide. The ability to continuously learn and develop in an international setting with you is a critical driver behind our success in achieving our mission. An environment where everybody never stops growing and focuses on succeeding - we continuously work with you on your strengths and weaknesses across many important dimensions and look at ways for you to address them and further your development. Your entry ticket into being part of the Parcel Perform journey, where you will work with and alongside people from around the world that share the same passion and dedication.     WHO ARE WE AT PARCEL PERFORM!     Parcel Perform is the leading delivery experience platform. It enables modern e-commerce enterprises to create unique end-to-end customer journeys and optimize logistics operations with powerful data integrations, parcel tracking, delivery notifications and logistics performance reports in real-time.     Parcel Perform's scalable SaaS platform executes more than 100M parcel updates daily and integrates with 700+ carriers. The data-first company is pioneering innovative ML / AI use cases in e-commerce logistics including its 'Date of Arrival' prediction engine. Parcel Perform is the partner of choice for top brands, marketplaces and carriers across all major verticals globally.     LEARN MORE ABOUT US!  Our homepage - Learn more about our B2B offering & the most global B2C tracking page Our blog - Hear what Employees say about Parcel Perform Our social media accounts - For the latest updates, follow us on LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter Show more Show less"]

title: Security Engineer
description: ["A. Principal duties:     1. Security Operation  2. Security Design.  3. Security Compliance.     B. Responsibilities:     1. Security Operation  - Perform vulnerability scanning and application penetration testing (OWASP).  - Provide security information and reports (including vulnerability and exploitation news, security patches, and fixes) and assist the operational team in implementing the fixes/patches in place.  - Member of Change Advisory Board, which makes recommendations for other teams when it comes to implementing important changes.  - Train and support staff on IT security matters.     2. Security Design  - Design and implement security systems to defend network systems from security threats (viruses, Trojans, malware, spyware, malicious code, attackers/hackers, etc.).  - Consult and collaborate with the Architecture team on the security design of a new project.     3. Security Compliance  - Ensured SPS Viet Nam's information security posture is aligned with the SPS Global group.  - Ensured that IT security met company policy and ISMS/ISO 27001 standard.  - Respond to client, global group, internal/external auditor security questionnaires, and join audit sections.  - Ensured that the BoD (Board of Directors) is fully informed about the risks identified and the status of rectification, with the ability to report immediately to the CEO in the event of an emergency.  - Other duties as assigned by IT Manager     C. Requirements:  *** Education:  - University Degree in Computer Science or IT equivalent training  *** Technology skills and experience:  - Information system design and implementation  - Wide knowledge in different area (network, server hardware, system, database, software …)  - Deep knowledge in TCP/IP, security & system analysis / hacking  - Linux, Windows Server, Virtualization, Cloud Security Controls  - ISMS/ISO 27001 working knowledge or technical implementation knowledge is required, PCI DSS is an advantage  *** Soft-skills:  - English communication  - Strong troubleshooting & analyzing  - Customer oriented  - Problem solving, negotiation.     The combination of a European Management team and ambitious employees from well-known local and international universities give us the chance to offer our products and services of European quality, but made in Vietnam. This concept provides us with an important competitive advantage in the international market. We strive to provide a friendly working-environment where people feel like a family and are free to voice their opinions.     What are you waiting for? Join our international team today!     1. Great Benefits:     - Salary: 1,900$ - 2,200$ and bonus package (13th salary, KPIs bonus up to 3-month salary)     - Personal accident & health-care     - At least 12+ annual leave     - Meal & Parking Allowances     - Flexible working time     - Company trip, Team building, Sports and Gyms.     2. Advance your career:     We provide you with support to sharpen your skills and knowledge for further steps in your career path     Opportunities to learn and grow through different types of training: Talent Development program, Succession planning as well as promotions or transfers.     3. Break your limits:     The innovation is a key value of SPS Vietnam. Joining our team, you are encouraged to think out of the box, cross your boundaries and improve yourself in our continuous improvement process during daily business operation.     4. Go Global:     The moment you join SPS Vietnam is the moment you take the chance to extend your horizon. You will work, cooperate and exchange your creative ideas with 7,500 employees of Swiss Post Solutions. Our customers, which are 20% of Fortune 100, are located from around the world.     Notes: Only suitable candidates will be contacted and invited to participate an interview.     Kindly visit our website for further information www.spsvietnam.vn     Thank you for applying at Swiss Post Solutions Vietnam.  Show more Show less"]

title: DevOps Engineer
description: ['The Technology department of SPS Vietnam delivers and maintains software projects in the area of document processing. Our software is used by SPS Vietnam and SPS affiliates in Europe, US and Asia to process millions of documents per year from our end customers from various industries (finance, insurance, transportation, logistics, consumer, etc.).     This position is open for DevOps candidates (with software development background is preferred), who is part of the Architecture Team where your contribution as well as your challenges are to observe, seek and study new potential technologies and optimization that might bring benefit and efficiency to the company business. Besides, you will mainly join with the teams to develop our platform and deliver IT projects for our customers.     A. Responsibilities:  Build, test and maintain the applications, infrastructure and the tools (e.g. CI/CD, Kubernetes) to allow for the speedy development and release of software. Integrate the project functions and resources across the product life cycle, right from planning, building, testing, deployment to support. Be conversant with all the technical as well as IT operations aspects of integrated operations. Take part in research & development of strategic technologies and provide relevant technical solutions. Act as level-3 support Understand business/project needs to design technical needs. Understand the Software Development Lifecycle and the platform in the company. Plan, implement, and keep improving CI/CD pipelines and various automation tools to support the pipelines. Research, design and implement various technical solutions and Cloud services aligned with business needs. Ensure the implementation of agreed architecture. Work with Developers and IT staff to oversee the code releases, to integrate and maintain the infrastructure and applications(including Kubernetes and its monitoring/logging tools, Microservices, Cloud services) needed for projects. Oversee application deployment activities and provide guidance to project team members (Application Administrators / Deployment Team). Evaluate and select appropriate software or infrastructure solutions, and suggest integration methods. Assist with solving technical problems when they arise. Address technical concerns, ideas and suggestions. Provide technical documents.     B. Requirements:  *** Education: College or Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or Information Technology.     *** Technical skills and experience:  Experience in various automation tools for developing CI/CD. Experience in Cloud technologies (e.g. AWS, Azure). Experience in Kubernetes (and its monitoring/logging tools) and microservices. Capability to work with Linux OS, scripting and coding (e.g. Python,……), Infrastructure as Code. Experience in software engineering (with software development background is preferred). Excellent understanding of Java,Python, Ruby, Perl. Excellent technical troubleshooting. Awareness of critical concepts in DevOps and Agile principles. Capability to understand and do system design. Wide-ranging knowledge of IT infrastructure (including system, network, storage, database, security)is Plus Understanding of strategic IT solutions is Plus Familiarity with various operating systems (e.g. Windows, UNIX) and databases (e.g. MSSQL)is Plus     *** Soft-skills:  Self-managing Problem solving and analytical skills Good at English Communication skills Customer focus, business oriented     *** Minimum Experience: above 2 years in DevOps role.     @The combination of a European Management team and ambitious employees from well-known local and international universities give us the chance to offer our products and services of European quality, but made in Vietnam. This concept provides us with an important competitive advantage in the international market. We strive to provide a friendly working-environment where people feel like a family and are free to voice their opinions.     What are you waiting for? Join our international team today!     1. Great Benefits:     - Salary: $1800 - 2000$ and bonus package (13th salary, KPIs bonus up to 3-month salary)     - Personal accident & health-care     - At least 12+ annual leave     - Meal & Parking Allowances     - Flexible working time     - Company trip, Team building, Sports and Gyms.     2. Advance your career:     We provide you with support to sharpen your skills and knowledge for further steps in your career path     Opportunities to learn and grow through different types of training: Talent Development program, Succession planning as well as promotions or transfers.     3. Break your limits:     The innovation is a key value of SPS Vietnam. Joining our team, you are encouraged to think out of the box, cross your boundaries and improve yourself in our continuous improvement process during daily business operation.     4. Go Global:     The moment you join SPS Vietnam is the moment you take the chance to extend your horizon. You will work, cooperate and exchange your creative ideas with 7,500 employees of Swiss Post Solutions. Our customers, which are 20% of Fortune 100, are located from around the world.     Notes: Only suitable candidates will be contacted and invited to participate an interview.     Kindly visit our website for further information www.spsvietnam.vn     Thank you for applying to Swiss Post Solutions Vietnam.  Show more Show less']

title: Frontend Developer
description: ['FRONTEND DEVELOPER - SALARY UP TO 1500$\xa0  GIỚI THIỆU CHUNG VỀ CÔNG TY  Công ty Cổ phần ToVChain hoạt động trong lĩnh vực Công nghệ thông tin, xuất bản phần mềm chủ yếu trong thị trường Âu Mỹ. Website sản phẩm: trava.finance Facebook: TOVCHAIN JSC Twitter: Trava.finance Địa chỉ: Tầng 10, Số 19 Lê Thanh Nghị, Phường Bách Khoa, Quận Hai Bà Trưng, Hà Nội.  MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC  Tìm hiểu, phân tích nhu cầu của khách hàng đối với các sản phẩm/dịch vụ. Thu thập, phân tích dữ liệu, tiến hành thiết kế, phát triển và xây dựng các sản phẩm/dịch vụ của công ty. Tiến hành kiểm thử, xác định và tập hợp những phản hồi từ các Tester. Hỗ trợ các bộ phận liên quan để phản hồi và xử lý khi nhận góp ý/đánh giá từ phía người dùng. Thực hiện các công việc khác theo sự phân công của cấp trên.  YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC  Có ít nhất một năm kinh nghiệm làm việc tại các vị trí tương đương. Nhanh nhẹn, chủ động và có khả năng làm việc nhóm. Có khả năng tự học và nghiên cứu công nghệ mới. Nắm vững và sử dụng tốt JavaScript/ TypeScript, HTML, CSS. Có kinh nghiệm và hiểu biết với ReactJS/VueJS, React Native/Flutter là lợi thế. Có kinh nghiệm triển khai các ứng dụng phi tập trung sử dụng web3js/ether-js là một lợi thế. Có kiến thức và kinh nghiệm về các hệ thống phân tán, mật mã và công nghệ Blockchain là một lợi thế. Có khả năng đọc/hiểu và giao tiếp bằng tiếng Anh là một lợi thế.        PHÚC LỢI     Thưởng hiệu quả công việc hàng quý và không giới hạn tùy theo năng lực. Hỗ trợ Macbook làm việc. Lương tháng 13 và thưởng các dịp 30/4, 1/5, 2/9, tết dương lịch … Xét tăng lương theo năng lực và kết quả công việc định kỳ lên đến 4 lần/năm. Hoặc tăng lương đột xuất theo hiệu quả công việc. Hỗ trợ 100% tiền ăn trưa, Tea break hoa quả, bánh kẹo, liên hoan hàng ngày/ hàng tuần miễn phí. Chế độ du lịch hàng năm và tham gia các hoạt động teambuilding, sự kiện công ty… Bảo hiểm xã hội, Bảo hiểm y tế, Bảo hiểm thất nghiệp theo chế độ nhà nước ban hành. Nghỉ phép: 12 ngày/ năm. Chế độ nghỉ phép và làm việc linh hoạt, không chấm công, ưu tiên hiệu quả công việc của mỗi cá nhân và Team. Được đào tạo và làm việc với các leaders giỏi, có nhiều năm kinh nghiệm làm việc với thành tích xuất sắc; Chính sách phát triển bản thân phù hợp với từng vị trí. Có cơ hội tiếp cận với các công nghệ mới nhất. Hỗ trợ 100% phí gửi xe.     THÔNG TIN LIÊN HỆ     Ứng viên quan tâm vui lòng gửi CV về địa chỉ email: ngocnb@trava.finance với tiêu đề\xa0[TOVCHAIN] - Vị trí - Họ Tên.     Liên hệ: 0385.752.499\xa0(Ms Ngọc).  Show more Show less']

title: Senior Database Developer, Product Support Team (Bangkok based, relocation provided)
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['About Agoda  Agoda is an online travel booking platform for accommodations, flights, and more. We build and deploy cutting-edge technology that connects travelers with more than 2.5 million accommodations globally. Based in Asia and part of Booking Holdings, our 4,000+ employees representing 90+ nationalities foster a work environment rich in diversity, creativity, and collaboration. We innovate through a culture of experimentation and ownership,\u202fenhancing the ability for our customers to experience the world.  Get to Know our Team:  The Data department oversees all of Agoda’s data-related requirements. Our ultimate goal is to enable and increase the use of data in the company through creative approaches and the implementation of powerful resources such as operational and analytical databases, queue systems, BI tools, and data science technology. We hire the brightest minds from around the world to take on this challenge and equip them with the knowledge and tools that contribute to their personal growth and success while supporting our company’s culture of diversity and experimentation. The role the Data team plays at Agoda is critical as business users, product managers, engineers, and many others rely on us to empower their decision making. We are equally dedicated to our customers by improving their search experience with faster results and protecting them from any fraudulent activities. Data is interesting only when you have enough of it, and we have plenty. This is what drives up the challenge as part of the Data department, but also the reward.  The Opportunity:  As part of Database Development team you will be involved in the database design, data managing and database development with automated database Continuous Integration/Continuous delivery (CI/CD) pipelines. We are working closely with product teams to provide support and solution with technical excellence to meet business requirements.  In this Role, you’ll get to:   Assist with database schema and architecture design Support product team by providing a quality of developing and design database solutions Develop database SQL code with quality and performance optimization Work and communicate with product team and others i.e. data services, dev-ops and database operation Use automated database CI/CD for development process Proactively and regularly make recommendations for service & process improvements Understand the database architecture and database technology   What you’ll Need to Succeed:   4+ years’ experience in a database development – Microsoft SQL, Oracle, etc B.Sc. in Computer Science / Information Systems / Computer Engineering or related field Good knowledge of relational database and ability to write SQL/Advance SQL query Deep knowledge of MSSQL Server and query optimization is a plus Excellent English written and verbal communication Multi-tasking and problem-solving person, fast learning and willing to learn technology and business Organized and structured and be able to prioritize and deliver results under deadlines and pressure Ability to work as a team player Ability to work in a highly multi-cultural team   It’s Great if you have:   Familiarity with CI/CD concepts and best practices including build and source control Knowledge of automation tools such as Gitlab, TeamCity and Docker Understand Agile Methodologies and software development life cycle   #london #taipei #seoul #tokyo #hongkong #beijing #sydney #hcmc #london #munich #telaviv #sanfrancisco #shanghai  Equal Opportunity Employer  At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.  We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .  To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes. Show more Show less']

title: Salesforce Architect
description: ['Lương: deal theo năng lực (up to $10 000) Yêu cầu: - 5 years of experience in Saleforce delivery management, business analysis, and technology implementation in full life-cycle enterprise CRM engagements  - 3-5 years of experience working with the Saleforce customization web services, Apex, SOQL, Visual Force, Visual Code/Eclipse IDE, Data Loader, Reports and Dashboards.  - 2 years of experience with customization on the Saleforce Lightning platform which should include: Lightning Components using the Lightning Design System framework, Apex, Apex data loader, and declarative platform tools. (Process builder, visual workflow, lightning app builder, etc.)  - At least 2 Saleforce projects experience ideally with FSC  - Strong working knowledge of Saleforce platform out-of-the-box functionality, including best practices regard security options  - Extensive solution definition experience including evident experience and knowledge of :  CRM System and Solution Architecture design (functional & technical)  Deep knowledge with Cloud and Data Architecture  Excellent listening skills to understand and interpret stakeholder responses  Strong facilitation skills to lead requirements and user story sessions Show more Show less']

title: Cloud Engineer
description: ['CMC Telecom là 1 trong 3 trụ cột kinh doanh của tập đoàn CMC tập trung cung cấp dịch vụ Viễn thông - Công nghệ thông tin chất lượng cao cho nhóm khách hàng doanh nghiệp, tổ chức chính phủ, tập đoàn nước ngoài tại Việt Nam. Chúng tôi đang cần tuyển số lượng lớn ứng viên cho vị trí Triển khai giải pháp Cloud Quốc Tế (Fresher/ Junior) tại Hà Nội. * Mô tả công việc: – Tìm hiểu, làm quen với hệ thống ở On-prem: Network, System, Linux, Window, VMware, Hyper-V – Tìm hiểu, làm quen với dịch vụ Public Cloud: AWS, Azure, GCP – Phối hợp cùng team trong việc Khảo sát, đánh giá hệ thống và phân tích nhu cầu của Khách hàng – Thường xuyên cập nhật công nghệ từ hãng, thi chứng chỉ và tham gia các khóa đào tạo nội bộ để nâng cao năng lực – Cộng tác và phối hợp với các bộ phận nội bộ, đối tác và khách hàng trong quá trình làm dự án * Yêu cầu ứng viên – Nam/Nữ 20-24 – Tốt nghiệp hoặc năm cuối các trường ĐH như ĐH BK, ĐH Công nghệ, HV BCVT, ĐH FPT… chuyên ngành CNTT hoặc Mạng – Có kiến thức căn bản về hệ điều hành, database, network – Kỹ năng giao tiếp và làm việc nhóm tốt – Nhanh nhẹn, chủ động, có tính tự giác, tự học – Có kĩ năng research, kĩ năng tìm kiếm – Tiếng Anh đọc, nghe tốt – TOEIC > 500 hoặc tương đương – Từng tham gia các hoạt động phong trào, ngoại khóa, tình nguyện là lợi thế * Quyền lợi: - Đãi ngộ (lương, thưởng, review lương): + Mức lương: 12 triệu – 20 triệu + KPI tháng/quý/năm + phúc lợi Lễ tết + Ký Hợp đồng lao động, đóng bảo hiểm đầy đủ, nghỉ 12 ngày phép năm, các ngày Lễ, Tết theo quy định Nhà nước. + Xét thưởng và xét tăng lương 2 lần/ năm. + Cơ chế lương 3 vòng thu nhập, có thưởng KPI tháng và KPI năm. Công thức lương gói thu nhập năm (Trung bình thu nhập 14 – 15 tháng lương/năm). + Được tham gia các khóa huấn luyện, đào tạo nâng cao kỹ năng, nghiệp vụ của CMC cũng như các hãng công nghệ lớn như Microsoft, IBM, Google … + Bảo hiểm chăm sóc sức khỏe Aon Care (điều trị nội trú và ngoại trú) dành cho nhân viên + Các ngày nghỉ lễ Tết theo quy định của nhà nước và có thưởng theo quy định của công ty - Cơ hội thử thách và phát triển: + Cơ hội được làm việc tại công ty công nghệ viễn thông tư nhân hàng đầu Việt Nam (As an AWS Advanced Consulting Partner, First Premier Partner of Google Cloud in Viet Nam) + Cơ hội được tiếp cận, đào sâu những công nghệ mới nhất, tiên tiến nhất với tập khách hàng đa ngành và những dự án siêu khủng + Được dẫn dắt, hỗ trợ bởi team lead/chuyên gia ưu tú, đầu ngành trong lĩnh vực + Được ủng hộ, trao quyền cho sáng tạo và đột phá từ người trẻ * Văn hóa, môi trường làm việc: – Làm việc 5 ngày/tuần (khoảng 44h/tuần), nghỉ thứ 7, Chủ Nhật – Môi trường làm việc trẻ, năng động, sáng tạo, công bằng, kỷ luật – Văn phòng xanh, đạt tiêu chuẩn quốc tế – Tham gia gắn kết với tập thể, tổ chức với các hoạt động team building thú vị, các clb chạy và đá bóng, esport,…các party liên hoan của Công ty (sinh nhật, lễ Tết,…) – Chế độ chăm sóc y tế đặc biệt cho CBNV * Thông tin liên hệ: Ms. Hường 0353044144 tuyendung@cmctelecom.vn Show more Show less']

title: Chuyên Viên Đào Tạo
place: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
description: ['Nhiệm vụ chính  Xác định nhu cầu đào tạo, huấn luyện và phát triển nghề nghiệp nhân sự các cấp  Xác định nhu cầu đào tạo của Tập đoàn trên cơ sở đề nghị của các Phòng/Ban/Đơn vị và chính sách, chiến lược của Tập đoàn hàng năm. Giới thiệu, đề nghị các khoá học nâng cao chuyên môn nghiệp vụ; các khoá đào tạo quản lý phù hợp và các giảng viên có trình độ và uy tín cao từ các trường, trung tâm đào tạo. Đề cử và tổng hợp lên danh sách CBNV tham gia các khoá học tại Tập đoàn và bên ngoài  Đánh giá và lựa chọn các tổ chức đào tạo bên ngoài  Phối hợp với các Trưởng Phòng/Ban/Đơn vị tìm kiếm, đánh giá và lựa chọn các trường, các tổ chức đào tạo, các giảng viên có uy tín bên ngoài để đào tạo về các kỹ năng quản lý, chuyên môn và những chương trình ngoài khả năng của Phòng Đào tạo nhằm nâng cao hiệu quả làm việc cho CBNV  Xây dựng hệ thống tài liệu (quy trình, quy định,…) liên quan đến công tác đào tạo  Tham gia xây dựng quy chế, quy trình đào tạo và các biểu mẫu liên quan. Trực tiếp tham gia hoặc chịu trách nhiệm thống nhất các giáo án, chương trình đào tạo hội nhập cho CBNV Tập đoàn. Biên soạn tài liệu đào tạo. Xây dựng chỉ tiêu, chương trình và triển khai đánh giá sau đào tạo. Lưu trữ toàn bộ tài liệu, hồ sơ và kết quả đào tạo của CBNV tham gia khoá học.  Tổ chức và giám sát các hoạt động đào tạo  Hỗ trợ các cộng tác viên đào tạo/nhân sự đào tạo nội bộ trong việc thiết kế và xây dựng các khoá đào tạo tại chỗ. Đào tạo hội nhập cho các nhân viên mới thuộc Tập đoàn. Tổ chức đào tạo (tuần, tháng, quý, năm, đột xuất,…) nhằm nâng cao chất lượng và năng xuất làm việc của CBNV. Đào tạo và hướng dẫn việc tuân thủ các quy trình, quy định trong Tập đoàn. Giám sát công tác đào tạo, báo cáo đánh giá chất lượng sau đào tạo. Theo dõi việc thiết lập, duy trì và cập nhật hồ sơ phát triển nhân sự các cấp trong Tập đoàn. Thực hiện công tác truyền thông đào tạo (Truyền thông khóa học, viết bài tổng hợp sau khi tổ chức đào tạo và đăng bài lên facebook, website Phòng Đào tạo).  Tham mưu cho Ban Lãnh đạo các chiến lược liên quan đến công tác đào tạo  Tham mưu Ban Lãnh đạo xây dựng chiến lược phát triển nhân tài, thiết lập và triển khai thực hiện kế hoạch đào tạo, bồi dưỡng kỹ năng, kiến thức và nhận thức cho CBNV nhằm đáp ứng yêu cầu công việc chuyên môn cho CBNV cho toàn Tập đoàn.  Yêu cầu  1. Độ tuổi: 27 - 40 tuổi 2. Trình độ: Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên. 3. Chuyên ngành: Sư phạm, Quản trị kinh doanh, Quản trị nguồn nhân lực hoặc các chuyên ngành liên quan. 4. Kinh nghiệm: Tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí tương đương. 5. Ngoại ngữ: Sử dụng thành thạo tiếng Anh (nghe, nói, đọc, viết). 6. Tin học: Sử dụng thành thạo máy vi tính, các phần mềm văn phòng, chuyên ngành,… 7. Kỹ năng: - Thiết lập quan hệ - Giao tiếp tốt và rõ ràng. - Kỹ năng lập kế hoạch. - Giải quyết vấn đề. - Làm việc nhóm. - Huấn luyện & thuyết trình tốt. - Kỹ năng sư phạm 8. Chứng chỉ liên quan: Chứng chỉ giảng dạy. 9. Kiến thức liên quan: Kiến thức tổng quát. 10. Các tố chất cần thiết khác: Sáng tạo, năng động, nhiệt tình, nhanh nhẹn, thông minh, nhạy bén, tác phong chuyên nghiệp. Show more Show less']

title: Web Developer
description: ['Aimesoft là nơi quy tụ những chuyên gia ứng dụng AI nhằm giải quyết những vấn đề thực tiễn. Sứ mệnh của Aimesoft là đồng hành trong đời sống con người thông qua các ứng dụng trí tuệ nhân tạo đa thể thức chân thực và sống động. Tài sản lớn nhất của Aimesoft là đội ngũ hơn 50 chuyên gia và kĩ sư nghiên cứu với nền tảng lập trình vững chắc và kinh nghiệm thực chiến các dự án “khó nhằn”. Dưới dự dẫn dắt của TS. Nguyễn Tuấn Đức (CEO) và cố vấn của các chuyên gia đến từ Đại học Tokyo, Nhật Bản, Aimesoft đang có những bước chuyển mình mạnh mẽ nhằm khẳng định vị trí số 1 về cung cấp giải pháp ứng dụng Trí tuệ nhân tạo. Hiện tại, Aimesoft đang tìm kiếm\xa0Web Developer (Fresher/Junior/Senior)\xa0và nhiều vị trí khác.     Mô tả công việc:  Làm việc trong môi trường tốc độ cao, yêu cầu sự chính xác và chất lượng trong việc thực thi. Công việc chính: nâng cấp kiến trúc các hệ thống lớn, đồng thời quản lý và duy trì các dự án website của công ty và khách hàng. Đặc biệt, vị trí này có cơ hội phát triển lên full-stack developer và thử sức với các ứng dụng desktop để xây dựng các sản phẩm trí tuệ nhân tạo. Làm việc chặt chẽ với các team AI để đảm bảo đúng yêu cầu chất lượng của sản phẩm và chức năng được giao. Phát triển trau dồi thêm kỹ năng, ngôn ngữ và framework mới khi cần thiết để hỗ trợ công việc.     Yêu cầu:  Sử dụng PHP hoặc Python để lập trình các Web services. Có kỹ năng làm việc với các framework (Laravel, CakePHP, Flask, Django...) Có kỹ năng lập trình và thiết kế web application dựa theo mô hình MVC. Sử dụng tốt HTML, CSS, Javascript. Có kinh nghiệm sử dụng các framework SPA (react, angular, vuejs,...) Có thể sử dụng hệ thống quản lý source (svn/git, v.v...) Nắm được kỹ thuật tạo dựng và thiết kế web responsive, single page,...     Quyền lợi:  Lương $600-$1700/tháng hoặc trao đổi thêm dựa trên kinh nghiệm và kiến thức thực tế. Thưởng Tết và lương tháng 13. Bảo hiểm, chương trình khám sức khỏe. 3 tháng review 1 lần xét duyệt thưởng/ tăng lương. Bạn được đảm xây dựng lộ trình phát triển sự nghiệp và kỹ năng ngay tại công ty, 3 tháng review 1 lần để cập nhật tiến độ phát triển và điều chỉnh khi cần. Được đào tạo, training với các khóa đào tạo miễn phí của công ty bởi các giảng viên, chuyên gia hàng đầu. Tham gia teambuilding, du lịch hằng năm. Thời gian làm việc từ thứ 2 - thứ 6 (8h30 -18h00). Không OT.     Email: huechi@aimesoft.com  Mobile: 0986 828 032  Address: 2F Hoang Ngoc Building, No.4, Ln.82 Dich Vong Hau, Cau Giay, Ha Noi.  Show more Show less']

title: Middle DevOps
industries: IT Services and IT Consulting and Software Development
description: ["Apply to this vacancy and get a sign on bonus of up to 115 million VND.  We are currently inviting a remote Middle DevOps with 2+ years of DevOps experience and Docker and AWS expertise to join our team.  The customer is one of the largest Parcel Delivery in Europe. It has more than one million doorstep contacts each day and with its wide range of innovative services, it provides top-drawer B2C parcel services for a broad spectrum of vendors. The customer is the leading expert for integrated solutions along the supply chain and a partner for national and international trading companies.  Requirements  2+ years of experience in DevOps Experience with Docker, Docker-Compose, ECS Knowledge of AWS Constructs – EC2, S3, Lambda, Cloud Trail, Cloud Watch, Event Bridge, RDS, IAM, AWS Managed Services Experience in Scripting – Bash, Python (2-3+), Typescript, Groovy, AWS-CLI Experience with Provisioning / Configuration Management: Ansible, Packer, Terraform, IaaS Knowledge of Orchestration: Cloud Formation, CDK, Docker Knowledge of Alerting and Dashboarding: App Dynamics Knowledge of Source Control: Git Knowledge of Process Management: Jira Experience in Application languages / Frameworks: Java / Springboot Experience with Continuous Integration / Continuous Delivery: Jenkins and Concourse Understanding of: Relational/Non-relational DB experience; Cloud Storages   We offer  Medical insurance with 100% of insurance cost covered for you and your legal dependents Paid time off Stable income 100% remote work forever Free licensed software Possibility to work on your own device (BYOD) Stable workload Relocation opportunities Flexible engagement models Free trainings for technical and soft skills Language courses Access to internal communities and competency centers Access to internal and external e-Libraries Certification opportunities Skill advisory service   This is a remote position and we welcome applications from anywhere in Viet Nam  We accept CVs only in English.  Please note that even though you are applying for this position, you may be offered other projects to join within EPAM Anywhere.  Once you apply, you'll receive a confirmation email with a link to EPAM Anywhere platform. Sign up with this link to automate your prescreening, be able to monitor your application statuses, and enjoy a faster job application process.  EPAM Anywhere — an online remote jobs platform for IT professionals. EPAM Anywhere allows technical specialists to quickly and easily find projects that match their knowledge and experience while working remotely with Forbes Global 2000 clients, building a successful IT career, and earning competitive rewards. EPAM Anywhere provides additional perks, including a flexible schedule, professional development opportunities, and access to a community of experts. The program offers open positions in 15+ countries—with plans to expand in the future. As of today, the platform is used by thousands of IT specialists across more than 165 cities around the world. Join EPAM Anywhere today at anywhere.epam.com.  EPAM Anywhere is a part of EPAM Systems, Inc. Since 1993, EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM) has leveraged its software engineering expertise to become a leading global product development, digital platform engineering, and top digital and product design agency. EPAM’s global teams serve customers in more than 35 countries across North America, Europe, Asia, and Australia.     Show more Show less"]
